tadā tadāpasmarati naiṣa kliśyati santatam ||

2.8.15 jvarasya śoṣagulmānāṃ kāsināmatha kuṣṭhinām |
pramehonmādināṃ caiva tathāpasmāriṇām api ||

2.8.16 ity aṣṭau vai pradiṣṭāni nidānāni śarīriṇām |
vimānāni pravakṣyāmi yathāvadanupūrvaśaḥ || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele aṣṭamo ' dhyāyaḥ || iti bhelasaṃhitāyāṃ nidānasthānaṃ samāptam || || vimānasthānam || |
|prathamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto rasavimānaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

3.1.1 śarīraṃ dhārayantīha ṣaḍrasāḥsamamāhṛtāḥ |
ato ' nyathā vikārāṃs tu janayanti śarīriṇām ||

3.1.2 rūkṣo laghuḥsthiraśśītaḥ kaṣāyastikta eva ca |
tīkṣṇoṣṇāvamlalavaṇaukaṭurvāpivikāśyatha ||

3.1.3 śītaḥ snigdho gururbalyaḥ picchilo madhuro rasaḥ |
kaṣāyatiktakaṭukaḥ śīto rūkṣo ' nilaḥ smṛtaḥ ||

3.1.4 rūkṣoṣṇamamlaṃ pittantu kaṭukaṃ ca pracakṣate |
śleṣmā tu madhuraḥ snigdhaḥ śīto mandaḥ sthiro guruḥ ||

3.1.5 ity etān rasadoṣāṇāṃ sahotpannān guṇānviduḥ |
tatra vāyuguṇaistulyān kaṣāyakaṭutiktakān ||

3.1.6 kaṭvamlalavaṇaistulyāṃs tathā pittaguṇānviduḥ |
madhuraṃ lavaṇāmlau ca vidyāt kaphasamān rasān ||

3.1.7 tasmād abhyasyamānais taiḥ śleṣmā dehe pravardhate |
atraikatra kṛtorāśirdvirmahatvamiharcchati ||

3.1.8 guṇasāmyādvivardhante yathāsvaṃ dhātavo nṛṇām |
rasais tadviparītaiś ca yāntyete kṣayamāhṛtaiḥ ||

3.1.9 yathodakaṃ samāsādya śāntiṃ gacchati pāvakaḥ |
kaṣāyatiktakaṭukai rūkṣo rūkṣairvivardhate ||

3.1.10 mārutaḥ snigdhabhāvaiś ca tato ' nyair upaśāmyati |
kaṭvamlalavaṇaiḥ pittamuṣṇamuṣṇairvivardhate ||

3.1.11śītaiśśāmyati śeṣais tu guṇānāṃhi viśeṣataḥ |
snigdhaḥ snigdhaiḥ kaphaś cāpi vardhate madhurādibhiḥ ||

3.1.12 rasaiḥ śāmyati rūkṣaiś ca kaṣāyakaṭutiktakaiḥ |
ekaikamekasāmānyādvardhayanti trayastrayaḥ ||

3.1.13 ghnanti cānyaguṇatvena rasā doṣaṃ śarīriṇām |
na vāyussaha tailena snehauṣṇyādvyapalīyate ||

3.1.14 śītatvānmadhuratvāc ca na pittaṃ saha sarpiṣā |
raukṣyāt kaṣāyabhāvāc casnigdho madhura eva ca ||

3.1.15 na śleṣmā madhunā sārdhaṃ dehe paryavatiṣṭhate |
ānūpamāṃsajā vāpi vasā majjāna eva ca ||

3.1.16 tailavanmārutaṃghnanti snehauṣṇyagurubhāvataḥ |
śākādaviṣkirāṇāṃ ca rasā majjāna eva ca ||

3.1.17ghṛtavad ghnanti te pittaṃśītamādhuryabhāvataḥ |
kaṣāyatiktakaṭukaṃ yac ca kiñcidihauṣadham ||

3.1.18 madhuraṃ tatkaphaṃ hantiguṇānyatvena dehinām |
athanātyupayuñjīta pippalīṃ kṣāram eva ca ||

3.1.19 lavaṇaṃ caiva,bahvetad bhuktaṃ doṣāya kalpate |
śleṣmāṇaṃ cyāvayitvā tu notsahetāpakarṣitum ||

3.1.20 pippalī pākamadhurā tasmāt tāṃ nātibhakṣayet |
atyāhṛtā paceddehaṃ tīkṣṇoṣṇakaṭubhāvataḥ ||

3.1.21 kṣāraṃ ca lavaṇaṃ caiva bhoktuṃneheta kevalam |
mātrāvaduṣṇaṃ snigdhaṃ ca sātmyaṃ svādu ca bhojanam ||

3.1.22 avidāhi ca yat pāke jīrṇe tadupayojayet |
balavarṇakaraṃ snigdhamuṣṇaṃ śleṣmānilāpaham ||

3.1.23 vidahyate na mātrā ca sātmyatāṃ ca karotyatha |
svādu puṣṭikaraṃ jantoravidāhi prasādanam ||

3.1.24 nṛṇāmāyuṣkaraṃ caiva jīrṇe bhojanamiṣyate |
na jalpanna hasaṃś cāpi na drutaṃ na vilambitam ||

3.1.25bhuñjītābhyādṛtaḥ snigdhaṃ dehe nirvartate rasaḥ |
yathehavodyato vahniḥ pravarteta sudāruṇi ||

3.1.26 pacyamāne tathā bhukte rasādirupacīyate |
jīvayanti paraṃ varṣā hemantaḥ pāyayaty api ||

3.1.27 grīṣmaḥ pacati cāpy enaṃ pariṇāma ivāparaḥ |
bhṛśamauṣṇyāt kaṭurgrīṣmaḥ sarvadhātuviśoṣaṇaḥ ||

3.1.28 dhairyasthairyakaraṃ śītaṃ, varṣāmadyaba.... |
|....... || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ || |tṛtīyo ' dhyāyaḥ ||

3.3.1 |.. |.. yasya bhuktaṃ vipacyate |
bhuñjānasyāpi cānnāni balaṃ varṇaś ca hīyate ||

3.3.2 alpaṃ laghvapi yaccānnaṃ bhuktaṃ duḥkhena jīryati |
nāpnoti balavarṇau ca durbalāgniḥ sa ucyate ||

3.3.3 kadācitpacyate bhuktaṃ kadācinna vipacyate |
guru vā laghu vā yasya viṣamāgniḥ sa ucyate ||

3.3.4 mitaṃ pacyetayasyānnamatibhuktaṃ na pacyate |
samāgniṃ taṃ naraṃ vidyāt samapittakaphānilam ||

3.3.5 naro bhavati tīkṣṇāgniḥ prakṛtyā vātapaittikaḥ |
vātiko viṣamāgniśca, mandāgniś ca kaphān naraḥ ||

3.3.6 yasya hīnādhikas tv agniḥ kṣipraṃ dehaṃ sa muñcati |
samāgniś ca samātmā yaḥ sadīrghāyuṣṭvamṛcchati ||

3.3.7 gavyamāhiṣavārāhaiḥ kulīrairmatsyakarkaṭaiḥ |
māṃsaissapalalaiḥ snigdhairatyagniṃ pratibhojayet ||

3.3.8 godhāniṣkvathite kṣīresiddhaṃ bhuñjīta pāyasam |
pibeddadhi sasarpiṣkaṃ māṣasūpena miśritam ||

3.3.9 tathā palalasammiśraṃ kacchapāṇḍarasaṃ pibet |
guḍaṃ ca tailasammiśraṃ kuryād anyac ca taddhitam ||

3.3.10 snigdhasyaviṣamāgnes tu vamanādīni kārayet |
grahaṇīdūṣaṇīyoktaṃmandāgnes tu cikitsitam ||

3.3.11 antarauṣadhapānānibahirlepe ca yā kriyā |
śastrakarmavidhānaṃ ca bheṣajaṃ trividhaṃ smṛtam ||

3.3.12 madhuro ' mlaḥ kaṭuś caivapaktimārgāstrayaḥ smṛtāḥ |
kaṭur bhavati pakvasya pacyamānasya cetarau ||

3.3.13 ihānnapānaṃ bhojyaṃ ca madhurāmlaṃ pracakṣate |
vātajeṣu vikāreṣu yadā vā tairna śāmyati ||

3.3.14 dadyādathāsmai snigdhāya bhiṣak snehavirecanam |
vastibhir vā cikitsetahyadhobhāge ca mārutaḥ ||

3.3.15 tathā ca tiktamadhuraṃ pānamannaṃ pradāpayet |
paittikeṣu vikāreṣu yadivātanna śāmyati ||

3.3.16 tasya snigdhasya vamanaṃ śirasaś ca virecanam |
kuryād yathābalaṃ śleṣmā hyūrdhvabhāgaprakīrtitaḥ ||

3.3.17 śakṛnmūtrānilāś caiva raktamāṃsādayaś ca ṣaṭ |
vidyānnibandhanānīti tāni deheṣu dehinām ||

3.3.18 balaṃ vayaḥ śarīraṃ ca pratyekaṃ trividhaṃ smṛtam |
uttamādhamamadhyaṃ tu bhedenātha niśāmayet ||

3.3.19 āhāraś ca vihāraś ca sevyamānau krameṇa tu |
kālena prakṛtiṃ yātas tad āhuḥ sātmyalakṣaṇam ||
ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ | iti bhele vimāne tṛtīyo ' dhyāyaḥ || || caturtho ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto rogaprakṛtiviniścayaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

3.4.1 pramṛśya dṛṣṭvāpṛṣṭvā ca parīkṣetāturaṃ bhiṣak |
pūrvaṃ tu rogavijñānaṃ tataḥ paś cāccikitsitam ||

3.4.2 rūpaṃ chāyām upacayaṃ prāgvyādhervyādhitasya ca |
dṛṣṭvā bhiṣak parīkṣeta prākṛtaṃ vaikṛtaṃ tathā ||

3.4.3 jvarasya sāmyaṃ vaiṣamyaṃ gātraṃ vā ślakṣṇakarkaśam |
dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭvāvagaccheddhi śaity amauṣṇyaṃ ca pāṇinā ||

3.4.4 mātāpitṛsamācāraṃ sātmyaṃgarbheṇa dauhṛdam |
vyādhikālaparīṇāmaṃ śakṛnmūtravivarṇatām ||

3.4.5 pūrvarūpasamutthānaṃ śarīrāgnivayobalam |
prakṛtiṃ janmadeśaṃ ca bhojanaṃ ca yathocitam ||

3.4.6 vyāyāmaniṣṭhāsātmyaṃ ca mātrāmātre ca bhojane |
praśnoktānivijānīyādyadanyadapi tadvidham ||

3.4.7 kecidicchanti munayo doṣamekamihādhikam |
vikārasyāviśiṣṭatvād aniṣṭaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca tat ||

3.4.8 rūkṣāsaho naro yas tu sa vātaprakṛtiḥ smṛtaḥ |
pettiko ' mbusahaś cāpi madhurāmlāsahaḥ kaphāt ||

3.4.9 svabhāvaprabhavo hyeṣa sahotpanno guṇāgamaḥ |
prakṛtiṃ vai vijānīyāt tasya vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam ||

3.4.10 avyaktaṃ ca mahāṃś caiva mahābhūtāni pañca ca |
parāḥ prakṛtayassapta svabhāvaḥ kāla eva ca ||

3.4.11tebhyo bhavanti bhūtāni tānyeva pratiyānti ca |
indriyāṇīndriyārthāś ca buddhayaḥ pañca tās tathā ||

3.4.12 ṛtukāle yadā nārī rūkṣāṇyannāni sevate |
udāvarte tathāpīha karma cātiniṣevate ||

3.4.13 tadaivaṃ vātasanduṣṭaṃ raktaṃ garbhāśayasthitam |
tadvidhenaiva śuklena yadā yogam upaiti vai ||

3.4.14 tadā vātapraduṣṭena śuklena rudhireṇa ca |
vātaprakṛtitāmetigarbhaḥ prāgātmanaḥ sa vai ||

3.4.15 evam evartukāle vai bhajantyāḥ kaphapaittikam |
ślaiṣmikī paittikī cāpi prakṛtirjāyate tataḥ ||

3.4.16 hrasvaḥ śīghraḥ kṛśaś cāṇuḥpralāpī paruṣapriyaḥ |
stabdhāṅgo viṣamaśliṣṭo gaṇarūpe gaṇe dhṛtiḥ ||

3.4.17 sahaḥ kleśasya visrambhī rūkṣatvaganavasthitaḥ |
kharamūrdhajaromāṅgaḥ kṣipragrāhī tathā smṛtaḥ ||

3.4.18 svapneṣu coṣṭreṇāyāti viyaty api tu gacchati |
yasyopaśete susnigdhaṃ sa vātaprakṛtirnaraḥ ||

3.4.19 śithilāṅgo ' garugandhaścaṇḍaḥ śīghro mahāśanaḥ |
valīpalitakhālity aśīghrapākī tathākṣamaḥ ||

3.4.20vṛttākṣaḥ krodhanoyaś ca durbalo durbalendriyaḥ |
nāmlāśaḥśītaśītāśīduṣprajāḥ śītalapriyaḥ ||

3.4.21 ativarṇo ' timedhāvī svapne pāvakadṛk tathā |
śīghramāvāti yaḥ snātaḥ paittikaprakṛtirnaraḥ ||

3.4.22 susnigdhaḥ ślakṣṇabaddhāṅgaḥ subhagaḥ priyadarśanaḥ |
dṛḍhasmṛtiściragrāhī dṛḍhabhaktiparāyaṇaḥ ||

3.4.23priyamāṃsoṣṇakaṭukaḥ priyayoṣidbahupradaḥ |
kṣamāvān balavān dhanyaḥ śītāluraśanapriyaḥ ||

3.4.24 cirād dṛḍhavyādhiratho mitavāgalpabhuk smṛtaḥ |
dīrghadarśī mahotsāho dhīraḥ kleśasahas tathā ||

3.4.25 romadantanakhaiḥ keśairbahulairyassubandhanaiḥ |
cirādāvāti ca snātaḥ svapne paśyati codakam ||

3.4.26 yas tu rūkṣaṃ tu sahate sa śleṣmaprakṛtirnaraḥ |
saṃsṛṣṭaprakṛtiṃ vidyāt saṃsṛṣṭaiś cāpi lakṣaṇaiḥ ||

3.4.27 nivṛttā prakṛtirdhanyā dvandvā bhavati madhyamā |
sannipātātmikā yā tu jaghanyā sā prakīrtitā || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele caturtho ' dhyāyaḥ || || pañcamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto vyādhitarūpīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

3.5.1guruvyādhirnaraḥ kaścinmūrtyā caiva balena ca |
laghuvyādhiḥ naras tv anyaḥ sattvād ibhir ananvitaḥ ||

3.5.2 guruvyādhirivābhāti bhiṣak tatra pramuhyati |
tatrālpamātraṃ bhaiṣajyaṃ sevitaṃ gururogiṇām ||

3.5.3 na nirdahatyataḥ sarvāndoṣānalpena tejasā |
mūrchā chardistimitatā jṛmbhā ca gurugātratā ||

3.5.4tṛṣṇā santatabhāvaś ca bhavanty etāni tasya tu |
mustā kuṣṭhaṃ haridre dve pragrahātiviṣāmayāḥ ||

3.5.5 bhallātakaṃ vayasthā ca citrakaḥ suradāru ca |
etairāsthāpanaṃ tac ca kuryād gomūtrasaṃyutaiḥ ||

3.5.6 pūrṇādiṣṭānadiṣṭāṃś ca tathā śāntiṃ niyacchati |
āragvadhaṃ saptaparṇaṃ madanaṃ svādukaṇṭakam ||

3.5.7śārṅgeṣṭāṃ kaṭukāṃ pāṭhāṃ naktamālaṃ savatsakam |
etadāragvadhārthaṃ tu kuryād āsthāpanaṃ bhiṣak || || ṣaṣṭho ' dhyāyaḥ || athāta ṛtuvimānaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

3.6.1 ādity agativaiśeṣyādṛtūnāṃ parivartanāt |
kṣayaṃ vṛddhiṃ ca gacchanti yathāsvaṃ dhātavo nṛṇām ||

3.6.2 bhūmibāṣpātpurovātādghanacchāyāprasaṅgataḥ |
mahīkaluṣasanduṣṭātpīyamānānnavodakāt ||

3.6.3 graiṣmikātkṛśabhāvāc ca prāṇedurbalatāṃ gate |
varṣāsu dehināmagnirmṛdutvam upagacchati ||

3.6.4 tato viṣṭambhajovāyuryasmāddhītaḥ prakupyati |
tanna seveta varṣāsu kaṭvamlalavaṇān rasān ||

3.6.5 mudgayūṣeṇa vāśnīyāt purāṇān śāliṣaṣṭikān |
athavā yavagodhūmaṃ sṛṣṭavāte hitaṃ smṛtam ||

3.6.6 paṭolāni ca takraṃ ca jāṅgalāṃś ca rasān laghūn |
kaupaṃ divyaṃ jalaṃsiddhaṃbhajedāsthāpanāni ca ||

3.6.7 asaṃsthitatvād varṣāsu jalamamlaṃ vipacyate |
tasmād vivardhate pittaṃ yathāmlaiś ca tathāśanaiḥ ||

3.6.8 sūryopatāpātsahasā gatvācaivauṣadhīkṛtam |
varṣāsunicayaṃ pittaṃ kopaṃ śaradi gacchati ||

3.6.9 snānānulepanaṃ tasmācchītaṃ śaradi kārayet |
vījayet tālavṛntaiś ca vigāheta sarassu ca ||

3.6.10 lājasaktuṃ pibec cāpi śarkarāmadhuvāribhiḥ |
mudgayūṣeṇa cāśnīyāt purāṇān śāliṣāṣṭikān ||

3.6.11 rasān madhurakāṃś cāpi jāṅgalān sarpiṣā kṛtān |
vidārīkṣurasaṃ drākṣāṃ sevetānyac ca tadvidham ||

3.6.12 gatapittapravegaś ca śaratkāle ghṛtaṃ pibet |
tathāsyāpyāyyate dehaḥ śeṣā doṣāś ca yāntyadhaḥ ||

3.6.13 paścādvātasyarūkṣatvāc chītalatvād ṛtos tathā |
hemantena nigacchanti kharatvaṃ dhātavo nṛṇām ||

3.6.14 tasmāt snehaṃ bahuvidhaṃ snānaṃ coṣṇena vāriṇā |
bhajetkharatvapāruṣye tathābhyaṅgātpraśāmyati ||

3.6.15 śakunānaudakānmatsyān snehāmlalavaṇānvitān |
ānūpāni ca māṃsāni sevetānyac ca tadvidham ||

3.6.16kaṭurhi paścimo vāyuḥ śaity aṃ tīvraṃ cavāriṇaḥ |
atyarthaṃ rūkṣayed vāyuḥ śarīraṃ rūkṣabhojāt ||

3.6.17 guruprāvaraṇaś ca syādātapāgnī ca saṃśrayet |
rūkṣe hi tejasā jantoḥśarīrāddhriyate balam ||

3.6.18 āpo hiśītamadhurā hemante tu bhavantyatha |
tasmāt kaphas tathā tābhiḥ snigdhairannaiś ca cīyate ||

3.6.19 śītalatvād ṛtoś cāpi na tāvatparibhidyate |
tasmāt tailaguḍopetāṃ vāruṇīṃ śiśire pibet ||

3.6.20 vividhāni ca māṃsāni bhakṣayec ca prakārataḥ |
evaṃ tu nicitaḥ śleṣmā śītatvād iha dehinām ||

3.6.21 dravatāmeti saṃspṛṣṭo vasante sūryatejasā |
ravirhi madhyamāṃ kāṣṭhāṃ vasante pratipadyate ||

3.6.22 dahyatāmiva śailānāṃ nṛṇāmaṅgeprakupyati |
tataḥ śleṣmā dravībhūto hṛdayaṃ vyapalimpati ||

3.6.23tasmācchardyavipākau ca dṛśyete śiśirātyaye |
tasmād vasante śleṣmaghnaṃmadhumārdvīkamīritam || iti bhele ṣaṣṭho ' dhyāyaḥ || iti bhelasaṃhitāyāṃ vimānasthānaṃ samāptam || || śārīrasthāna || dvitīyo ' dhyāyaḥ || Bhṣ4.2.? || māno ' vatiṣṭhate |
jātasya daśame māse nāmagotre namaskṛte || Bhṣ4.2.? |
taruṇasya kumārasya vardhamāneṣu dhātuṣu |
asthimajjasu pūrṇeṣu śukraṃ na pratipadyate ||

4.2.3 aṅgāṅgeṣu pravṛddheṣu pratimūleṣu dhātuṣu |
śuklaṃ ca ṣoḍaśe varṣe suvyaktaṃ pratipadyate ||

4.2.4 tathā vṛddhasya jantoś ca parikṣīṇeṣu dhātuṣu |
vivekā[ma] na yathāpūrvaṃ vivicyante parikṣayāt ||

4.2.5 tato ' lparetā bhavati sujīrṇo durbalo ' thavā |
na paśyati naraḥ śuklaṃ sarvadhātuparikṣayāt ||

4.2.6 raktaṃ māṃsaṃvasāsthīni[ca] majjā śuklaṃ tathānalaḥ |
śakṛnmūtre ca tairmandaṃ vidyānnavatitaḥ param ||

4.2.7 iha narchati garbhaṃ strī vātenopahatā tathā |
yonidoṣeṇa[yā] cānnena na hi vandhyāsti nā ca na ||

4.2.8 vamanaṃ recanaṃ caivavastimāsthāpanaṃ[vastirā] tathā |
tasmāt tatkārayetstrīṇāṃ prasiddhāḥ prasuvanti[prasa] vai ||

4.2.9 athātra bhavati praśnaḥkasmācchabdaṃ[rasā chardiṃ] na nāsayā |
gṛhṇāsyāsyena[gṛhīṣvā] vā gandhaṃ tulyaṃ sarvatra khaṃ yadi ||

4.2.10tvagbhāge[tvadbhā] ca same kasmānna gṛhṇātyanyayā rasam |
iti tadvacanaṃ śrutvā pratyuvāca punarvasuḥ ||
4.2.11 ghrāṇaṃ gandhaṃ ca bhaumaṃ hirūpaṃ[rūkṣaṃ] cakṣuś ca taijasam |saṃsparśaṃ sparśanaṃ vāyoḥ śrotraṃ śabdātmakhaṃ[śabdātmakaṃ] tathā ||

4.2.12 rasanaṃ ca raso hyāpyaṃ[vyā-] tasmād etairihendriyaiḥ |
yathāsvaṃ tulyayogitvād viṣayagrahaṇaṃ smṛtam ||

4.2.13 svaṃ svaṃ hi viṣayaṃ dhātur vijānāty ātmanānvitaḥ |
ātmendriyamanorthānāṃbandhācceti[bandhiśce] samādiśa || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele dvitīyo ' dhyāyaḥ || tṛtīyo ' dhyāyaḥ |
athāto ' samānagotrīyaṃ śārīraṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

4.3.1 ihāsamānagotrāntu[vai] ṛtusnātāṃ striyaṃ vrajet |
medhāvinamarogaṃ[di-] sā putramevaṃ prasūyate ||

4.3.2 bījadoṣādyathā sasyaṃ na samyakviprarohati[-rohiṇī] |
mātāpitros tu doṣeṇa tathā garbhaḥpraṇaśyati[prayaccha] ||

4.3.3 tasmāt samyagrasāhārāvṛtukāle[dṛ-] ' tha dampatī |
rahas saṃyogam eyātāṃ smarantau manasā vibhum ||

4.3.4 vikṛtāḥ syuragarbhā vai rasāpathyaniṣevaṇe |
sandhāraṇādvā vegānāṃ yonidoṣeṇa vā punaḥ ||

4.3.5 yonaudoṣopasṛṣṭāyāṃ[doṣopavṛ-] na garbho hy avatiṣṭhate |
tathaivabāhyayonau[brāhma] hinirvāhiṇyāṃ[nirvāhinyāṃ] ca sarvadā ||

4.3.6 gṛhṇāti vāyuryasyāṃ ca yonauśukram[ruśraṃ] upāgatam[upāgataḥ] |
bibharti garbhaṇī garbhaṃ śuddhārtavasamanvitā ||

4.3.7 cyavate ca yadā cāsau tadā garbhaḥ praṇaśyati |
vātodaraṃ striyāstadvai tasmādūkṣāṇi[dūpā] varjayet ||

4.3.8 bhavatyabhyadhike śukle puruṣaḥ śoṇite ' ṅganā |
napuṃsakaṃ tayoḥ sāmye tasmācchuklaṃ vivardhayet ||

4.3.9 yadā tu kalalaṃ vāyustad dvidhā kurute balī |
yamau tadā sambhavataḥ kṛṣṇātreyavaco yathā ||

4.3.10 tatra śuklottare bhāge pumān raktottare ' ṅganā |
anenaiva ca kalpena yamakeṣv api nirdiśet ||

4.3.11 vāyus tv aśvavarāhāṇāṃ deheṣu valavān punaḥ |
sa tatra kalalaṃ bhittvā karoti bahuputratām ||

4.3.12 nāpnoti ca yadā garbho rasaṃ duṣṭaiḥ sirāmukhaiḥ |
asaṃpūrṇo vasannāgaḥ tathā varṣāṇi tiṣṭhati ||

4.3.13 sampūrṇagātro bhavati yadā sa rasabhāvitaḥ |
tadāsūto[prasautyathākāśaṃ] yathākālaṃ garbhaḥ strīkukṣivicyutaḥ ||
4.3.14 ye ca te viṃśatiḥ proktā yonidoṣāś cikitsakaiḥ[cikitsite] |etaiś cānyaiś ca bahubhir garbho vyāpadyate striyāḥ ||

4.3.15 tasmād etāṃścikitset tu doṣān putracikīrṣayā |
ibhāśvagarbhasārūpyaṃ[ibhāśvā] prayogāddhi bhavec chuci ||

4.3.16 vāyvākāśartuyukto hi daivateṣv itareṣu tu |
antarjāto jātavedāḥ prabhāvāyopakalpate ||

4.3.17 ṛtau yadā strīpuruṣau prasannamanasau rahaḥ |
upeyātām atha tadā garbho bhavati sāttvikaḥ ||

4.3.18 ṛtau yadā strīpuruṣau vyāyastamanasau bhṛśam |
upeyātām atha tadā garbho bhavati rājasaḥ ||

4.3.19 ṛtau yadā strīpuruṣau pradīnamanasau rahaḥ |
upeyātām atha tadā garbho bhavati tāmasaḥ ||

4.3.20 lakṣaṇaṃ ca samutthānam ity etat samudāhṛtam |
tisṛṇāṃ sattvayonīnāṃ,miśrāṃstenaiva[mitrāntenaira] lakṣayet || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele śārīre tṛtīyo ' dhyāyaḥ || caturtho ' dhyāyaḥ || athātaḥ puruṣanicayaṃ śārīraṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

4.4.1 iha khalu bhoayam[jaya]-annātpuruṣo bhavati |
rasajanmāno ' sya[rajja] vyādhayo bhavanti |
tad yathā khalvayaṃ puruṣo rasajanmā rasajīvī rasajvalano rasasamādhiko rasajīvanaś ca bhavati |
rasānāmasamyagupayogānmithyopayogāttadvikārānṛcchati |
na kaścinmithyopayogādajīrṇāpathyabhojanātsvastho bhavati ||

4.4.2 athātra praśno bhavati |
ko ' tra khalvasyāhāraṃ pacati vātaḥ pittaṃ śleṣmānupānaṃ veti |
netyāha bhagavān punarvasurātreyaḥ |
yadyete pākahetavaḥ syustarhi na kaścidiha durbalāgniḥ syādvātādīnāṃ sannihitatvāt , sānupānatvāc ca |
athāsyoṣmā tejaś ca śarīrasthamāhāraṃ pacataḥ |
te kāyāgnir iti[-agne] vidyāt ||

4.4.3 tatra bhela ātreyamidamuvāca---bhagavan |
pañcadhā yeśārīrāḥ[śārīrā] paṭhyante; ālocakarājakabhrājakasādhaka-pācakabhedena[vā]; teṣāṃ katham idaṃ[idāṃ] pañcābhidhāyināṃ pṛthaktvaṃ bhavatīti ||

4.4.4 atrovāca bhagavān ātreyaḥ tatrālocako nāma varṣaśītātapapravṛddhaḥ |
sa dvividhaḥ |
cakṣurvaiśeṣiko buddhivaiśeṣikaśceti |
cakṣurvaiśeṣiko nāma ya ātmamanasossannikarṣajñānamudīrayitvā citte cittamapyādhāya saṃsvedajāṇḍajodbhijjajarāyujānāṃ caturṇāṃ bhūtagrāmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇasaṃsthānarūpavarṇasvarair uccāvacānāṃ puṣpaphalapatrāṇāṃ rūpanirvṛty arthamekaikasya[arthamaikekaṃ dvau vā trayo vā] dvayostrayāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ vā yugapatpraṇipatitānāṃ cakṣuṣāvaiśeṣyamutpādayatīti[vaiṣamya] ||

4.4.5 buddhivaiśeṣiko nāma yo bhruvormadhye śṛṅgāṭakasthaḥ susūkṣmānarthān adhyātmakṛtān gṛhṇāti jñānena, jñeyaṃ jñānaṃ kṛtsnajñeyakaivalyārtheṣu darśayati |
tasmād jñānajñeyaṃ jñātvā jñānaṃ gṛhṇāti |
gṛhītaṃ dhārayati |
dhāritaṃ pratyudāharati, atītaṃ smarati, pratyutpannaṃ kṛtvā ' nāgataṃ prārthayati, jātamātraś ca punaranupadiṣṭasvabhāvaṃ mātṛstanyamabhilaṣati |
dhyāne pratyāhāre yojanāc ca buddhivaiśeṣyamutpādayatīti ||

4.4.6 tatra bhrājako nāma yohyasya[yasya] śarīraṃ lakṣaṇaṃ copagamayati, prādhānyaṃ pradarśayati, śiraḥpāṇipādapārśvapṛṣṭhodarajaṅghāsyanakhanayanakeśānāṃ ca pratibhāvṛddhiviśeṣānutpādayati, bhrājayatīti bhrājakaḥ ||

4.4.7 prabhaviṣṇutvendriyaprābalyād budhyavasthāhaṃkāreṇa vā-abhimatarthamarthebhya[abhimate] ātmakṛtamādhate |
cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇarasanasparśanavākpāṇipādapāyūpasthebhyaḥ sarveṣāṃ viṣayārthānāṃ svabhāvoparaktānāṃ parasparebhyo rāgamutpādayatīti |
antarmadhye ca pittasthānamantaraṃ praviśya rāgaṃ janayatīti rājakaḥ[rājakam] ||

4.4.8 sādhako nāmayaḥ[yā] śabdasparśagandhebhyo ' rthakāmebhyaś ca devapitṝṣibhyaś ca iha cāmutrakāṇāṃ ca pādārthānāṃ viśreyasama?dhikṛtya sarvapadārthānāpnoti[nāṃ nūti] svayuktyā sādhayatīti sādhakaḥ ||

4.4.9 pācako nāma aśitapītalīḍhakhāditamāhārajātaṃ jātanīryaṃ pācayatīti[ - -ca] pācakaḥ |
yaḥ svakaṃ kāmamevāgniṃ prapūrayati harṣayati ||

4.4.10 bhavanti cātra--- yo ' yaṃ nirdahati kṣipramāhāraṃ sarvadehinām |
apānamadyanidanaḥ? kāyāgniḥparipaṭhyate[pariparyate] ||

4.4.11prabhāvalakṣyassaṃyukto[-lakṣyasati] jīvasyeha sanātanaḥ |
nābhimadhye śarīrasya vijñeyaṃ somamaṇḍalam ||

4.4.12 somamaṇḍalamadhyasthaṃ vidyāt tat sūryamaṇḍalam |
pradīpavac cāpi nṛṇāṃ tasya madhye hutāśanaḥ ||

4.4.13 dehinā bhojanaṃ bhuktaṃ nānāvyañjanasaṃskṛtam |
sūryo divi yathā tiṣṭhan tejoyukto gabhastibhiḥ ||

4.4.14 viśoṣayati sarvāṇi palvalāni payāṃsi ca |
tadvaccharīriṇāṃvyaktaṃ[bhuktaṃ] jāṭharo nābhisaṃsthitaḥ ||

4.4.15 mayūkhaiḥ kṣipramādatte sūryakānto maṇiryathā |
kṣipraṃ samyak pradahati gomayaṃ kāṣṭham eva ca ||

4.4.16 sthūlakāyeṣu sattveṣu yavamātrapramāṇataḥ |
hrasvakāyeṣu sattveṣu truṭimātrapramāṇataḥ ||

4.4.17 krimikīṭapataṅgeṣu vāyumātro ' vatiṣṭhati |
yastaṃcikitsetsīdantaṃ[cikitsiddhantaṃ] vyādhinā cāpi dehinām ||

4.4.18 āyurvedābhiyogena sa vai kāyacikitsakaḥ |
rasaṃ ca śoṇitaṃ caiva medo māṃsamathāpi ca ||

4.4.19 mahatyanaśane nẏṇāṃ sarvāṇy etāni khādati |
agnīṣomātmakaṃ sarvaṃ jagatsthāvarajaṅgamam ||

4.4.20 agnīṣomātmakāḥ sarve dehinas tu caturvidhāḥ |
sūryātmakānisarvāṇi[cāndrāṇi] tathā somātmakāni ca ||

4.4.21 mahatyanaśane nẏṇāṃ tenāntrāṇisa[na] khādati |
jāṭharo jalasambhūtaḥ pāvakaḥ pavanaissaha ||

4.4.22 pradīpyate nṛṇāṃ koṣṭhe sati vendhanapūritaḥ |
ikṣvākukośam[śoka] āsthāya yathā dīpaḥ sthire ' mbhasi ||

4.4.23 tiṣṭhate timire sakto na tathā calite ' mbhasi |
evaṃ śarīriṇāṃkoṣṭhe[rūṣṭhe] vaikṛtena punaḥ punaḥ ||

4.4.24 agnirvaiṣamyamāpnoti pūryamāṇaḥ punaḥ punaḥ |
sa ca yatnena vai rakṣyovipanne[vipanno] doṣadarśanāt |
chardyate[dviyarta] cātisāryeta vikāraṃ cāyamṛcchati ||
4.4.25asāvasamprāptakālo[śvāsaṃ] ya evaṃ mriyate, varṣaśataṃ hi puruṣāyustaccānāptuṃ jīrṇalaghupathyabhojanānuvartinā bhavitavyam iti ||

4.4.26 tatrāha kasmād alasakaviṣūcikāvān[-viṣūcikāvasādhyaye vāgavi] sadya evāgadī bhavati kaścinmriyata iti? atrāha---rūkṣasyādhyaśanena-utpīḍitā[utpiti] vātapittaśleṣmāṇaḥ[-śleṣmāṇi] ūrdhvamadho vā nānulomā bhavanti, udvṛttais tatra taiḥ sadya eva mriyate |
snigdhasyādhyaśamotpīḍitā vātādayaḥ ūrdhvamadho vā+anulomāḥ[anulomāṃsvāṅgasāṃstu] svāṅgadeśāṃs tu pradadyante, tatra taiḥ sadya evāgadī bhavati ||

4.4.27 athadaśāntarguhāḥ[-antahānta], daśa bahirguṇāḥ? |
tad yathā---dvicakṣuṣī dvināsike dveśravasī kaṇṭhanāḍīgudameḍhravāyusrotāṃsīti[srotasī kaṇṭhanābhi-] daśa antarguhāḥ |
daśa dhamanyohṛdaye[hṛdayaṃ] nibaddhā bhavanti |
tāḥprabhave[prabhavaṃ] caturaṃgulamātraṃ gatvā viṃśatirbhavanti |evam etā daśa dhamanyaḥ ṣaṣṭirbhavanti |
tatra tubhavanti[bhavantutrī] trīṇi śatasahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭiriyaṃ[ṣahtaṃśāli] jālāni sirāṇāṃ |
tad yathā---vṛkṣaḥ[vṛkṣa]śākhāvṛtaḥ[śākhāvṛta] phalapalāśairavatarati sarvatra |
tad yathā vāhāgo[hanyo]+aśmabhir atataḥ[aśmabhir ataraḥ] tathāyaṃ[tatāyaṃ] sirābhir avatataḥ |
romakūperomakūpe[rūpakūpe] hy asya sirāmukhaṃ bhavati, yataḥ svedaḥ[svetaḥ]kṣaratīti[kṣiratīti] ||

4.4.28 tatrāha kasmād ayaṃ puruṣo na santatamapasmaratīti? atrocyate---yathā saritāṃ prādurbhāve vārijāni sattvāni prādurbhavanti hāse vā hasanti |
yadā yadā rasavegaṃ prāpnuvanti tadā tadā apasmārayanti |
tasmād dvyahāttryahāt pakṣānmāsāntarāccāpasmarante ||

4.4.29 kecidrakṣopahata ity āhuḥ, taccāyuktam |
yadi hyevaṃ syād dṛśyeran puruṣaśarīre prahārādīni vā |
tataśca[tastaccha] naivam |
vetālābhibhūta[velāvabhūta] iti cetta cāpy anupapannam |
puṇyāni hyeṣāṃmanāṃsi[vanāṃsi]dhyāyanti[dhyāyantye] |
yadi caivaṃ kadācidbhavati |
tasmāt tad eva pāṭhyaṃ rasopahatam iti cedevam eva |
rasapravivekakāle tṛtīyakacaturthakāvapi[va] dṛśyete jvarāvapi |neṣatrāṃ hy ananārthaḥ? ||

4.4.30 atrāha kiṃkhalvasya[jalpa] garbhasya prathamaṃ sambhavati?hastau[hastaṃ] pādāvitibaḍiśaḥ tatpratiṣṭhitatvāt [pratiṣṭatāt]śarīrasya[śaīraśva] |
paścād guda iti śaunakaḥ tadāśritatvād vāyoḥ |
nābhir iti khaṇḍakāpyaḥ tatra nāḍīnāṃpratiṣṭhitatvāt [pratiṣṭa] |
hṛdayam iti parāśaraḥ vijñānamūlakānāṃ tanmūlatvāt |
śira iti bharadvājaḥ śarīrasya tanmūlatvāt |
cakṣuriti kāśyapaḥ |
netyāha bhagavānpunarvasurātreyaḥ |
tasmād arbudamevāsya prathamaṃ sambhavati |
tatra sarve śarīrapradeśāssambhavanti arbudasnehotpannāḥ ||

4.4.31 atrāha---kiṃnu[tu]garbho[garvo] māturudarastho ' śnāti[māturastho] na veti |
atrocyate nāśnāti |
yadi hy aśnīyāt syādasya[asyā puruṣa] purīṣamatītakālaṃ, na cedamasti[cedasi] |
kathaṃ tarhi? nābhyāṃ nāḍī pratiṣṭhitā tasyāmaparā māturhṛdayamāśritā tayā māturannaraso ' bhivahan garbhaṃ prīṇayatyabhivardhayati |
tad yathā kulyāḥ kedāramabhisaṃśrayantyo bhāvayanti tadvat ||

4.4.32 tatrāha kathaṃ garbho māturudare tiṣṭhatīti |
ūrdhvam iti śaunakaḥ |
avākchirā iti bharadvājaḥ |
nety āha bhagavānpunarvasurātreyaḥ |
yady ūrdhvaṃ tiṣṭhet tarhi mātṛghātī syāt |
yady avākchirāḥ svaghātī syāt |
kathaṃ tarhi? tiryak sarvairayamaṅgapratyaṅgaiḥ pratibhugnaḥ śete ||tasya tadananataraṃ tatprathamaṃ pratipadyate [sandarbheṇānena pratipipādayiṣito ' rthaḥ na spaṣṭaḥ] |
tasmāt tasya śiraḥ prathamaṃ punarvasurātreyaḥ pratipadyate |
tadasya gurutaraṃ bhavatīti |
atha khalu vṛkko medo gururiti saṃpravṛddhau parasparamabhivardhayanti ||

4.4.33 tatra ślokaḥ, ūṣmā rasastho dehe ' smiñjīvanaṃ gṛhya tiṣṭhati |
rasodbhavaḥ pumāṃstasmād raso jīvanamucyate || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele śārīre caturtho ' dhyāyaḥ || || pañcamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athātaḥ śarīranicayaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

4.5.1 iha khalvojastejaḥ śarīre nity eca[va] bhavataḥ |
tayoḥ[teyo] sthānāni dvādaśa bhavanti |
tad yathā---tvakśoṇita[vaśoṇīta]-māṃsamedo ' sthimajjāśuklasvedapittaśleṣmamūtrapurīṣāṇīti |
tānyavyāpannāni sukham ity ucyate |
vyāpannaistu[vyāpannestu] vātapittaśleṣmāṇaḥ praduṣṭā rasādiṣu vikārānupajanayanti ||

4.5.2 atha yonayaścatasro bhavanti |
tad yathā---jarāyujāṇḍajodbhijjasvedajāśceti |
tatra jarāyujājarāyuyuktāssaṃbhavanti[-yu] paśumṛgamanuṣyādayaḥ |
śakuna-matsya[macha]-kacchapa-sarpa[sarva]-prabhṛtayoṇḍajāḥ |
yūkāmat-kuṇa[kupa]-pataṅgāśiviṣamakṣikādayaḥ svedajāḥ |
udbhijjās tu tṛṇalatāvṛkṣavanaspataya iti ||

4.5.3 tatra puṣpaphalavanto vṛkṣāḥ |
apuṣpaphalavanto vanaspatayaḥ |
sapuṣpāḥ saphalāś cāpuṣpāś cāphalāś ca bīrudhaḥ |
phalapākā latāścauṣadhayaḥ |
tatra ye śvetakṣīrāḥ saumyāḥ, raktakṣīrāḥ kādrā vāruṇā vāligrahā? iti ||

4.5.4 iha khalu triṣu daśarātreṣu pumān rasena saṃyujyate |
āsāṃ tu khalu catasṛṇāṃ yonīnāṃ ṛtukāle yadā rasāḥ samyak prāptiṃ vā gacchanti tadā garbhaḥtiṣṭhaty[tiṣṭe] avikṛtaḥ viparyaye viparyayaḥ ||

4.5.5tryahantu[-ha] khalu purāṇarudhiraṃ parivarjayet |
kiñ ca tatpurāṇam? yadāditastryahaṃ parisravadṛtukāle tatpurāṇam |
tasmin tryahe garbha-upakramaṇe[upakrameṇa] na tiṣṭhati |
avasthito[avasthi vā] vā nāyuṣi samartho bhavati |
nirgate[nirgave] tu tryaheṇa purāṇe rudhirecāvasthite[ṇa] śuddhasnātāyāścaturthaṣaṣṭha-aṣṭama[aṣṭa]-daśama-dvādaśeṣu[dvādaśamu] ahassu garbhovakramamāṇaḥ pumān bhavati |
pañcamasaptama-navamaikādaśeṣu[-navaikādaśu] strītvāyopakalpate |sa eṣa āsaptarātrātsarvasañcāro ' bhidadhatyataḥ paramasañcārovakṛtatvād vālpāt? ||

4.5.6 strīṇāṃ khalu śoṇitaṃ śarīraṃ śoṣayati tasmānna tāḥ rajaḥ paśyanti |
paripūrṇadhātuśarīrās tu yadā bhavanti tadā vivekajalalohitaṃ māse māse prativedayanti |
pratigatapraveśaṃ ca tatpunarmāsena samāgacchatyārtavam ||

4.5.7 yadā tu tacchoṇitaṃ duṣṭaṃ mārgaṃ pratipadyate tadā strīṇāṃ pradaro bhavati |
taṃ śarīraṃśoṣayantaṃ[śoṣaya] lohitapittabheṣajenopakrameta ||
4.5.8 garbhiṇyās tu tridhā kāye raso ' bhinirvartate, garbhatvāya[garbhātpā] stanyatvāya rasatvāya ceti ||

4.5.9 iha khalu bhoḥ garbhātsthirādantaḥsthādāyatamudaraṃ[-sthitāvasthātamā] bhavati madhye nāryāmantargatāyām |
sthūlamūlasaṃsthitasaṃvṛttamacchidraṃ puruṣo ' ntargate |
droṇīvodaraṃ[droṇicodaraṃ] bhavatyubhayor antargatayoḥ |
vāmaṃ pārśvamāyataṃ māturudarasthā strī, dakṣiṇe pumān, madhye napuṃsakam |
vāmamakṣi hrasati nāryāmantargatāyām, puruṣe dakṣiṇam, ubhe napuṃsake |
savyaṃ pādaṃ pūrvaṃ prakrāmati savyena cākṣṇā bhruvā ca pūrvaṃ prati kurute, ceṣṭateca[na]savyena[sarvena] pārśvena prāyaḥ saṃviśati[śaṃsate] strīsaṃjñāneṣu ca prāyaśo dauhṛdaṃ kurute nāryāmantargatāyām |
viparyaye tadataḥ puruṣaṃ bibhartīti vidyāt ||

4.5.10 athaiha[ye] khalu garbhasya ṣaḍbhyaḥ sthānebhyaḥ śarīramabhinirvartate |
tad yathā---jalakāyād vāyukāyāt tejaḥkāyāt pṛthivīkāyād ākāśakāyād rasakāyāc ceti ||

4.5.11 ṣaḍdhātur evāyaṃ puruṣo bhavati |
dhātavaḥ punaḥ pañca bhūtāni brahmayadavyaktam[padavyaktam] ||

4.5.12 tatra yat kharakaṭhinam, tad yathā---dantakeśaroma-nakha[mukha]-purīṣasnāyvasthi, gandhajñānaghrāṇasaṅghātagauravāṇīti |
yad dravaṃ snigdhaṃ mṛdu vā tadaudakam ||

4.5.13tadyadā[tadyamu] sannipatitayor yatra puruṣaḥ pūrvamarthaṃ[sarvamardha] nandayati jaghanyaṃ strī tatra pumānihāṅgapratyaṅgaiḥ[pumānipratyaṅgaiḥ] sadṛśo jāyate |
yatra tu strī prathamamarthaṃ sādhayati jaghanyaṃ puruṣaḥ, tatra strī vāṅgapratyaṅgaissadṛśī[sadṛśo] jāyate ||

4.5.14 athastrīpuruṣāvṛtukāle[-nāle] rūkṣāṇi vātalānyannāni[vātaśānyannāni] sevete, vegāṃś ca dhārayataḥ, tayor garbhaḥ śoṇitādiṣu vātasaṃdūṣiteṣuniḥsṛto[viḥsṛto] bhavati, gadgadabādhiryaminmiṇatvamanyeṣāṃ ca vātapittavikārāṇāmanyatamaṃ prāpnoti |
evam eva pittaśleṣmalānṛtukāle mātāpitroḥ sevamānayoḥ pittaśleṣmavidūṣito garbhaḥ sambhavati ||

4.5.15 atha khalu garbhaśarīraṃ catrudaśendriyakāyāḥ samanupraviśanti |
vidhṛtāś cānupalabhyamānāś ca saptadivyāḥ saptamānuṣāḥ ||

4.5.16 tatra divyāḥ brahmadeva[brahmadevataṃ]-varuṇagandharvapiśācāsuramahārajakāyā bhavanti |
tān vyākhyāsyāmaḥ |
tatra yaḥ satyārjavānṛśaṃsakṣamādam-adhyāna[advāyāna]-sampanno 'dhyātmatattvadarśī bhavati taṃ brahmakāyam iti vidyāt ||
4.5.17 yastādyaśīlopādānayadyatraiyavān? muditastaṃ deva kāyam iti vidyāt ||
4.5.18 yo yajñananditarāgadṛṣṭiḥ salilapriyaścirasnāyī piṅgākṣaḥ kapilakeśaḥ saṃbhavati taṃ varuṇakāyam iti vidyāt ||
4.5.19 yas tu priyanṛtyagītavāditraḥ strīvihāranity aḥ śucivastragandhamālyānulepanaratir bhavati taṃ gandharvakāyām iti vidyāt ||
4.5.20 yas tu priyamadyamāṃsamatsyas tathā gomahāśano bībhatso bālānāṃ bhīṣayitā nidrābahulaś ca bhavati taṃ piśācakāyam iti vidyāt ||
4.5.21yas tvāt magurūṇāṃ[-gu] mānayitā paścād dveṣī caṇḍaḥ krodhano jñātīnāṃ bhedako bhavati tamāsuraṃ kāyam iti vidyāt ||
4.5.22 yas tu dhīraḥ śūraḥ mahābhogo mahotsāho mahaiśvaryaś ca bhavati taṃ mahārājakāyam iti vidyāt ||

4.5.23 anurāgeṇa mānuṣās tu pratyātmadarśanaśravaṇasparśanarasanaghrāṇasukhaduḥkham iti tatpravidyāsahitāḥ kevalāś cāvatiṣṭhante kārtsnyena |tairanvito janturliṅgati nimiṣati ākuṃcati prasārayati vedyaṃ vedayate ||

4.5.24sa[na] yadā bhedaṃ gacchati tadāyamantataḥ[tathāyaḥ antaḥ kāyam eva yānti] jalaṃ jalakāyam eva yāti, vāyurvāyukāyaṃ, tejaḥ tejaḥkāyaṃ, pṛthivī pṛthivīkāyaṃ, ākāśamākāśakāyam iti |
yathākāyam[dāyam]-indriyakāyaṃ[-kālaṃ] bhajate ||

4.5.25 bhavati cātra--- vidyamāne śarīre vai dhāturdhātuṃ niyacchati |
mano buddhiś ca sarveṣāṃ brahmaṇi pratitiṣṭhati || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele śārīre pañcamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || ṣaṣṭho ' dhyāyaḥ || athātaḥ khaḍḍikāṃ garbhāvakrāntiṃ śārīraṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

4.6.1 iha khalu bho mātṛjaś cāyaṃ garbhaḥ pitṛjaś cātmajaś ca sātmyajaś ca rasajaś ca |
asti ca sattvamaupapādakam[aupavādakam] ity ātreyavacanam |
neti bharadvājaḥ |
amātṛjaś cāyaṃ garbhaḥ apitṛjaś cānātmajaśca-asātmyajaś[anātmajaś] cārasajaś ca |
nāsti ca sattvamaupapādakam[aupavādhikam] iti |
yadi hi mātā putraṃ janyet bhūyiṣṭhaṃ hi strī putrakāmā maithunavargamabhis andhāya putraṃ janayet strīkāmā ca striyam ||

4.6.2yadā[-vi] jīven a saha sūkṣmāvagnimārutau garbhaṃ viśataḥtadā[-va] dvāvetāvaṅgapratyaṅgāni vikurutaḥ,tau ceṣṭayataḥ[ceṣṭataḥ], tau vardhayataḥ, tāveva yadā śarīrād vyavakrāmataḥ tadā tadbhavati nirvāto nirūṣmā preto mṛta iti |
netyāha bharadvājaḥ |
mṛto ' pi jantuḥ vāyunādhmāṣyate, agninā śoṣyate |
netyāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
saha vā tasyāgnimārutau jīvayataḥ, tayor apakrāntayor [apakrāntayor vātya] bahyāgnimārutāvāviśata iti ||

4.6.3 yatpunarāḥ sati cabhūtanānātve[bhūtarnātve] kathamekaḥ syāditi? atrocyate |
yatraitannānātvamāśritaṃ tadetadavyaktamasti pañcamahābhūtasaṃgraha iti ||

4.6.4 yatpunarāhayadyavyaktaṃ sarvaṃ syādavikāraḥ syād iti[ya---sa vivasyādadhi], atrocyate |
vātapittaśleṣmakṛtā rasasamutthā asya vyaktāḥ procyante vikārāḥ, avyakte hyukte te[rute] vyaktāḥ kathamavyaktaṃsrakṣyanti, kathaṃ tarhi śarīre tadvikriyate, unmādaḥ kathamavyaktaṃ manaḥspṛśatīty[spṛśatithena] etaccānupapannam |
kiṃ tarhi yathādity assambhūto ' pimeghāntarito[memāmtarito] na prakāśam upajanayatitathā[---] mano ' ntarhiteṣu vijñānasrotassu tamasā smṛtiṃ nopajanayatīti ||

4.6.5 yatpunarāḥ yadyayaṃ paralokādgarbho ' vakrāmennāsya[garma ukta] kiñcittatrādṛṣṭaṃ syāditi, atrocyate |
iha tāvadayaṃ cirotsṛṣṭāni vijñānāni vividhāni cāścaryabhūtāni na smarati kiṃ punardehāntarāṇi bhūtāni bhāvaviśeṣā-antarāṇi[---] ||

4.6.6 tatra ślokaḥ--- tamasā bhāvito yo vai saṃsmarenna sa mānavaḥ |
saṃsmaretpūrvacaritaṃ sukṛtevedavad[vedavidṛja] dvijaḥ || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele śārīre ṣaṣṭho ' dhyāyaḥ || || saptamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athātaḥ śarīrasaṃkhyāśārīraṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

4.7.1 iha khalu śarīre ṣaṭ tvaco bhavanti |
udakadharā prathamā ' sṛgdharā dvitīyā,sidhmakilāsasaṃbhava[maṃ] adhiṣṭhānā tṛtīyā, dadrukuṣṭhasambhavādhiṣṭhānā caturthī, alajīvidridhisambhavādhiṣṭhānā pañcamī, ṣaṣṭhī tu yasyāṃ chinnāyāmuttāmyati timiramivānupraviśati duṣṭāruṣkāṇi cāsya yāmāśrity a jāyante iti ||

4.7.2 asthigaṇanā---trīṇisaṣaṣṭīni[saṣaṣṭhiṇi śavā] śatānyasthnāṃ tad yathā---dvātriṃśaddantāḥ, dvātriṃśaddantolūkhalāni, viṃśatirnakhāḥ[paṇipādaśalānānyaṅgulyasthīni], ṣaṣṭiḥ pāṇipādāṅgulyasthīni, viṃśatiḥ pāṇipādaśalākāḥ, catvāri pāṇīpādaśalākādhiṣṭhānāni, dvepārṣṇyor asthinī[pārṣorasthīni], catvāraḥ pādayoḥ gulphāḥ, dvau maṇikau, māṇike dve hastayoḥ,catvāryaratnyor asthīni[catvāryaśayo], dve jaṅghayoḥ, dve jānunī, dve jānukapālike, dvāvūrunalakau[dāvūrudvāvūrunaśaktau], dvāvaṃsau, dve aṃsaphalake, dvāvakṣakau, ekaṃ jatru, dve tālunī, dve cibuke, dve śroṇiphalake, ekaṃ bhagāsthi, pañcacatvāriṃśatpṛṣṭhagatānyasthīni[pṛṣṭhagatau dhṛsthini], pañcadaśa grīvāyām, caturdaśorasi, caturviṃśatiḥ parśukāḥ pārśvayoḥ, tāvanti[yāvanti] caiva sthālakāni, tāvanti caiva sthālakārbudakāni, ekaṃ hanvasthi, dve hanubandhane, ekaṃ nāsāsthi-hanu[tathā hanu]-kūṭalalāṭam, catvāri śīrṣakapālāni ||

4.7.3 hṛdayamekaṃ cetanāyatanam |
daśa prāṇāyatanāni tad yathā---mūrdhā kaṇṭho hṛdayaṃ gudo nābhir vastirojaḥ śauklaṃ śoṇitaṃ māṃsam iti ||

4.7.4 pañcadaśakoṣṭhāṅgāni[koṣṭhāni] |
tad yathā---nābhiś ca hṛdayaṃ ca kloma ca yakṛc ca plīhā ca vṛkkau ca vastiś ca purīṣādhānaṃ cāmāśayaścottaragudaś cādharagudaś ca kṣudrāntraṃ ca sthūlāntraṃ ca vapāvahanaṃ ceti ||

4.7.5 ṣaṭpañcāśatpratyaṅgāni tad yathā---dvau gulphau, dve nitambe, dve jaṅghe, dve piṇḍike, dve ūrupiṇḍike, dvau sphicau, dvau vṛṣaṇau, ekaṃ śephaḥ, dvau śaṅkhau, dvau baṅkṣṇau, dvau kukundarau, eko vastiḥ, śīrṣamekamudaramekam, dvau stanau, dvau bāhū, dvāṃvasakau, ekaṃ cubukaṃ, dvāvoṣṭhau, dve dantaveṣṭe, dve sṛkvaṇī[sṛkvaṇīti], ekaṃ tālu, galaśuṇḍikā ekā, dvau karṇau, dve karṇaśaṣkulike, dvau gaṇḍau, dve akṣikūṭe, catvāryakṣivartmāni, dve akṣiṇī[akṣiṇīti] iti ||

4.7.6 śarīradravyāṇī---daśodakasyāñjalayaḥ śarīre pracyavamānaṃ purīṣamanubadhvātyatiyoge, navāñjalayaḥ pūrvasyāhārapariṇāmadhātoryantaṃ rasa ity ācakṣate[ācakṣati] kuśalāḥ, aṣṭau śoṇitasya, sapta purīṣasya, catvāro mūtrasya, dvau medasaḥ, eko majjñaḥ, mastiṣkasyāñjaliḥ śuklasya ceti ||

4.7.7 athātra praśno bhavati--- katamayaṃjīvo[devo] dehāddehāntaram upakramata iti? atrovāca bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
jalūkāyā ivāsya kecidgatiṃ bruvate |
tanna yuktam |
iha vyaktyantāmūrtaṃ yugapatsyādevāpare ' pyevamicchanti |
sarvathāpi mumukṣorasyāyamantarātmā param upakramata iti sarvathāpyasmin parity akte paricaye tāvadasaṃprāptaṃ tarā syāt |
avasthānatvāccettadiṣṭaṃ karmaṇopyevaṃ bhavati vaiyyarthyam api tu khalu pratiśrutyāpahitaḥ paratra gamanaṃ tasya vidyāt |
athavā yathādity asya hṛdaye bhūmau raśmayaḥ pratitiṣṭhante |
vilambitāvevamatasya tatra gamanamanupaścediti |
|

4.7.8 atha khalupuruṣe[puruṣā] ṣoḍaśādhyātmadevatā bhavanti |
tad yathā---agniś ca pṛthivī cāpaś cākāśaś ca vāyuś ca vidyuc ca parjanyaś ca indraśca[-ga] gandharvaś ca mṛtyuś cādity aś ca candramāś ca tvaṣṭā[tṛṣṇā] ca viṣṇuś ca prajāpatiś ca brahmā ceti |
tāḥ karmabhir vidyādutpattitaś ca parimāṇataś ca vidyāt |
ūṣmā hyatrāagneś[-gniś] ca karma dehe |
ghrāṇaṃ ca pṛthivyāḥ, sneho raso jñānaṃ codakasya, sparśanaṃ vāyoḥ, śrotraṃ cākāśasya, rūpādānaṃ parjanyasya saṃvegādānāni vidyutaḥ, balamindrasya, kāmo gandharvāṇāṃ, kopo mṛtyoḥ, cakṣurādity asya,prasādaścandramasaḥ, rūpaṃ tvaṣṭuḥ, ceṣṭā viṣṇoḥ, vyavāyaḥ prajāpateḥ, buddhirbrahmaṇa iti ||

4.7.9 tatra ślokaḥ--- viśuddhanetrāstapaso munayaḥ śāntakalmaṣāḥ |
jagataścopapannāṃś casarvān[svarbhā] paśyanti mānavān || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele śārīre saptamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || aṣṭamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto jātisūtrīyaṃ śārīraṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

4.8.1 iha khalu bhoḥ yāḥ striyaḥ pathyalaghubhojinyo ' nudāvartanaśīlā apraduṣṭā yathāgarbhāśayāḥ suviśuddhasrotaso bhavanti, tā ācakṣate avandhyāḥ iti kuśalāḥ |
tā iṣṭarūpaṃ medhāvi cāpatyaṃ janayanti, viparyaye viparyayaḥ ||

4.8.2 ṛtau ca garbho ' vatiṣṭhate |
tad yathā---sukṛṣṭakṣetre bījaṃ prakṣiptaṃ tatra vrīhiḥ vrīhitvāya kalpate, yavo yavatvāyaevam eva[priya] indriyamṛtukāle visṛṣṭamaduṣṭāyāṃ[-māmaṭṭa] yonau garbhāśayam upagacchati |
tad yathā[tad yathāya]---āvartagṛhītāḥ pratīpaṃ pratidhāvanti tadvat śuklaśoṇitaṃgarbhāśaye[garbhāśaya astikaṃ] āsiktaṃ kṣīramiva |
taccānekakanakamiva[taṃ cānekanakamivo]-udumbareṇa niṣiktamekatvamāpannamṛddhiṃ labhate ||

4.8.3 sā cedevamākāṅkṣetaudvāhike[evayā kāṃkṣā-] śivāvadātaputraṃjanayeyam[janayanti] iti, yavānāṃ manthaṃ[mandaṃ] sarpissamyuktaṃ saptarātramanupahataṃ bhuñjīta |
tatodauhṛdinī[dauhṛtdvi] śvetāyā goḥ sarūpavatsāyāḥ payasi pāyasaṃ pācayitvātadevāśnīyāt [-atmīyāt] |
śukle ca vāsasīparidadhyāt [parirabhyāt] |
sarvaśvetaṃ cāsyāḥ saṃskṛtaṃ vimānaṃ kārayet |

5.7.11 mṛṇmayīmivavā pātrīṃ kṛṣṇāṃ vāpi purīṣitām |
ādity amardhacandraṃ vā kṣipraṃ dṛṣṭvā vinaśyati ||

5.7.12 naktaṃ sūryamahaścandramavahnau dhūmamutthitam |
agniṃ vā niṣprabhaṃ dṛṣṭvā rātrau, maraṇamādiśet ||

5.7.13 prabhāvataḥ prabhāṃ hīnāṃniṣprabhānvā prabhāvataḥ |
narān viliṅgān paśyantibhāvān bhāvajighāṃsavaḥ ||

5.7.14 vyākṛtīni ca varṇāni visaṃkhyopacitāni ca |
nimittāni ca paśyanti rūpāṇyāyuḥparikṣayāt ||

5.7.15yas tu paśyatyadṛśyaṃ vā dṛśyaṃ yas tu na paśyati |
tāvubhau gacchataḥ kṣipraṃ yamakṣayamasaṃśayam ||

5.7.16 aśabdasya ca yaḥśrotā śabdaṃyaś ca na vindati |
dvāvapy etau yathā pretau tathā jñeyau vijānatā ||

5.7.17 viparyayeṇa yo vidyād gandhānāṃ caiva nāma tam |
na vā tat sarvato vidyād vidyāt taṃ vai gatāyuṣam ||

5.7.18 yo rasaṃ na vijānātivipakvaṃ vā ca tattvataḥ |
apakvaṃ dṛśyate,pakvaṃ tam āhuḥ kuśalā narāḥ ||

5.7.19 uṣṇān śītān kharānślakṣṇān mṛdūnapi ca dāruṇān |
spṛśyān spṛṣṭvā tato ' nyac ca mumūrṣusteṣu manyate ||

5.7.20 antareṇa tapastīvraṃ yogaṃ vā vidhipūrvakam |
indriyairadhikaṃ paśyan pañcatvam upapadyate ||

5.7.21 indriyāṇāmṛtedṛṣṭerindriyārthānnadoṣajān |
naraḥ paśyati yaḥ kaścidindriyairna sa jīvati ||

5.7.22 svasthāḥprajñāviparyāsairindriyārtheṣu vaikṛtam |
paśyanti ye tu bahuśaḥ teṣāṃ maraṇamādiśet ||

5.7.23 etad eva ca vijñānaṃ yassamyaganupaśyati |
maraṇaṃ jīvitaṃ caiva sa bhiṣag jñātumarhati || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele indriye saptamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || aṣṭamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto dūtādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

5.8.1 tṛṇānnakhānvā chindan vai bhiṣajaṃ paripṛcchati |
āturasya yadā dūtaḥ pratyākhyeyastathāvidhaḥ ||

5.8.2 viplutaṃ bhāṣamāṇaś ca bhiṣajaṃ paripṛcchati |
āturasya yadā dūtaḥ pratyākhyeyastathāvidhaḥ ||

5.8.3 bhinatti kāṣṭhaṃ kāṣṭhena loṣṭaṃ loṣṭhena vāpy adhaḥ |
āturasya yadā dūtaḥ pratyākhyeyastathāvidhaḥ ||

5.8.4 spṛśannaṅgāni bālāṃś ca bhiṣajaṃ paripṛcchati |
āturasya yadā dūtaḥ pratyākhyeyastathāvidhaḥ ||

5.8.5pidhāya pāṇinā nābhiṃ bhiṣajaṃ paripṛcchati |
āturasya yadā dūtaḥ pratyākhyeyastathāvidhaḥ ||

5.8.6 kapālikāṃ śarkarāṃ vā bhinattyaṅgārikām api |
āturasya yadā dūtaḥ pratyākhyeyastathāvidhaḥ ||

5.8.7 āste bhūmau pariśrānto gṛhṇātyaṅgamatha bhraman |
āturasya yadā dūtaḥ pratyākhyeyastathāvidhaḥ ||

5.8.8 naṣṭaṃ mṛtamatikrāntaṃ nānuśocanti paṇḍitāḥ |
ity āturasya hi yadāvadeddūto na so ' sti vai ||

5.8.9 karaṃ kareṇa gṛhṇāti pāṇinā tāḍayetkaram |
āturasya yadā dūtaḥ pratyākhyeyastathāvidhaḥ ||

5.8.10 khādedoṣṭhau ca jihvāṃ ca nakhān dantaiś ca kalpayet |
āturasya yadā dūtaḥ pratyākhyeyastathāvidhaḥ ||

5.8.11 āturasya yadā gehevaidye vai paryupasthite |
chidyate bhidyate caiva pratyākhyeyastathāvidhaḥ ||

5.8.12parāvartya ghaṭaṃ pūrṇaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ paripṛcchati |
āturasya yadā dūtaḥ pratyākhyeyastathāvidhaḥ ||

5.8.13 gṛdhraḥ sṛgālaḥ kākaś cāpy ulūko vāyasas tathā |
nadeyurdakṣiṇe pārśve rogiṇo yasya nāsti saḥ ||

5.8.14 kaṣāyavastro muṇḍo vā jaṭilo vāthanagnakaḥ |
carmabhir vā parivṛto, mahānasyeva śāṭikaḥ ||

5.8.15 tailābhyaktaśchinnanāso vāgmī conmatta eva vā |
bhagnauṣṭhaḥ kharavāṭo vā na dūtaḥ sampraśasyate ||

5.8.16 iti dūtasamācāro vyādhitānāṃprakīrtitaḥ |
ya evaṃ veda nipuṇaṃ siddhikāmaḥsa vai bhiṣak || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele indriye aṣṭamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || navamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto gomayacūrṇaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

5.9.1 cūrṇaṃ śirasi yasyaiva śuṣkagomayasannibham |
snehino dṛśyate jantormāsāddehaṃ jahāti saḥ ||

5.9.2 kṛśasya kapharogeṇa yasya śleṣmaparikṣayaḥ |
karṇau raktau mukhaṃcaiva dvau māsau nātivartate ||

5.9.3 yasya lohitakābhāsamambu tāluni dṛśyate |
kṣīṇalohitamāṃsasya sa māsaṃ nātivartate ||

5.9.4 arundhatīṃ na paśyet tu sthitāṃ saptarṣisaṃsadi |
sa māsādaṣṭamānmartyaḥ kṣipraṃ prāṇairvimucyate ||

5.9.5aṇukābhiś ca kṛṣṇābhir āsyaṃ jihvā ca tāluke |
sarvatassamanucchinnaṃ na sa jīvati tādṛśaḥ ||

5.9.6 śīrṣābhitāpino yasya śleṣmarogavatas tathā |
hikkā viniṣyandate vai nāyamastīti nirdiśet ||

5.9.7 yasya lomāni keśāś ca pluṣyantīva śarīriṇaḥ |
saṃhṛṣṭānīva vā dehī na sa jīvati tādṛśaḥ ||

5.9.8 yasya kālāntare dantā dṛśyante raktasannibhāḥ |
niṣprabhāś cānuliptā vā na sa jīvati tādṛśaḥ ||

5.9.9 kṣāreṇa vidhṛtaṃ gātraṃ dṛśyate yasya dehinaḥ |
samamuṣṇe ca śīte ca na sa jīvati tādṛśaḥ ||

5.9.10 gātreṣukharavarṇeṣu yasya vārilavaplavaḥ |
anabhyakteṣu gātreṣu na sa jīvati tādṛśaḥ ||

5.9.11 śūlamaṅge bhavedyasya sphuṭitaṃ raktamāsravet |
adho golakasaṃkāśaṃ paretaṃ tasya jīvitam ||

5.9.12 āpāṇḍumadhumehe tu yaś ca mehati mānavaḥ |
abhyantareṇapañcāhātsa pañcatvaṃhi gacchati ||

5.9.13 aratiś cāvipākaś ca kārśyadaurbalyam eva ca |
yasya saṃdṛśyate jantorna sa jīvati tādṛśaḥ ||

5.9.14 yas tu dīnamanātho vā balena parihīyate |
bhidyāmārogamāpnoti yathā pretas tathaiva saḥ ||

5.9.15anuvṛttau yathā jantuḥ pittena parimūrcchitaḥ |
saṃmūḍhavākyo bhavati yathā pretas tathaiva saḥ ||

5.9.16 yas tv āsane ' tha śayane ratiṃ na labhate naraḥ |
sa śīghraṃ kurute kālaṃ yaś ca sāśrūṇi khādati ||

5.9.17 āruhya vānaraṃ yas tu saṃkalpaṃ nāvabudhyate |
tam āhuḥ paralokāyasvapne tu kuśalā narāḥ ||

5.9.18 parisaṃvatsarādyasya jvaro nāpaiti dehinaḥ |
uṣṇo vā yadi vā śīto yathā pretas tathaiva saḥ ||

5.9.19 yasya jātapramehasya piṭakā pāṇḍurā bhavet |
sopadravā śatapadā yathā pretas tathaiva saḥ ||

5.9.20 yasyor dhvaṃkramate vāyuḥ śrotraṃ vādhaḥ pravartate |
sarvāṇi ca prabhidyante yathā pretas tathaiva saḥ ||

5.9.21 ity etairlakṣaṇairyuktaṃ bhiṣak dṛṣṭvaiva mānavam |
nopakramettathā vīra rakṣannātmayaśaḥ sphuṭam || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele indriye navamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || daśamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athātaśchāyādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

5.10.1 anucchāyāthavā jantordṛḍhacchāyāthavā punaḥ |
vicchinnā yasya vā chāyā na sa jīvati tādṛśaḥ ||

5.10.2 yo vidyutamivākāśe vyabhre paśyati mānavaḥ |
dhūmāyate śiraśchāyā yasya nāstīti taṃ viduḥ ||

5.10.3 lākṣāraktaṃ yathā vastramevaṃ paśyati yo mahīm |
athavā raktamākāśaṃ raktapittena hanyate ||

5.10.4 yo hṛṣṭaromā puruṣaḥ kāsena śleṣmaṇācitaḥ |
kaṇṭhaś ca śūkānugato yasya nāstīti taṃ viduḥ ||

5.10.5 yasya śaṅkhāccyutaṃ māṃsaṃ śyāve netre tathaiva ca |
cūrṇakaś ca mukhe jātaḥ paretaṃ tasya jīvitam ||

5.10.6 yasya hastāccyutaṃ māṃsaṃ jantordṛśyeta kuṣṭhinaḥ |
athāviprayuktasya na sa jīvati mānavaḥ ||

5.10.7 avipakvaṃ vipakvaṃ vā bhuktaṃ bhuktaṃ yathā bhavet |
kāśaśvāsajvaraiḥ spṛṣṭo nāsti tasya cikitsitam ||

5.10.8 hṛdayaṃpūrvamāvāti yasya snātasya dehinaḥ |
ardhamāsātparaṃ tasya jīvitaṃ nātivartate ||

5.10.9 ūrdhvaśvāsahato yas tu raktaṃ pracchardayen naraḥ |
śūlaṃ vā bhinnakoṣṭhasya na sa jīvati mānavaḥ ||

5.10.10antardāho ' dhiko yasya śītārtiś cāpi bāhyataḥ |
ākāśaṃ paripūrṇaṃ vā vetti yo na sa jīvati ||

5.10.11 yasya pakvāvubhāvoṣṭhau nīlaujambūphalopamau |
ucchūnaṃ yasya ca śiraḥ paretaṃ tasya jīvitam ||

5.10.12 yasyocchūnaṃ bhavenmadhyamubhāvaṃsau kṛśau tathā |
viriktaḥ punarādhmāti yathā pretas tathaiva saḥ ||

5.10.13 etadindriyavijñānaṃ yassamyaganupaśyati |
sajīvitaṃ ca mṛtyuṃ ca nṛṇāṃ vidyādbhiṣagvaraḥ || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele indriye daśamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || ekadaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || athātaḥ puṣpīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

5.11.1 śirasyaṅge raktavarṇaṃ yo ' nilaṃ vāpi paśyati |
ghaṭikāmekavarṇaṃ vā sa puṣpita ihocyate ||

5.11.2 aṣṭāpadaṃ vā sukṛtaṃ jagatīṃ yaḥ prapaśyati |
sa dṛṣṭiparihīnatvāt puṣpitaḥ procyate naraḥ ||

5.11.3 suptaś ca saṃvṛte gehe paśyatyākāśam eva yaḥ |
romanthayati dantaiś ca sa puṣpita ihocyate ||

5.11.4 dīpyamānamivākāśaṃ pṛthivīṃ ca vanāni ca |
yo vettiromasaṃhṛṣṭaḥ puṣpitaḥ sa ihocyate ||

5.11.5 anullipto yathā dehī vāticetkuṇapaṃ yathā |
sevante makṣikāś caiva puṣpitaḥ sa ihocyate ||

5.11.6 avijñātā naraṃ nārī svapnaeva nivāsinī |
dakṣiṇāṃ diśamehīti yaṃ brūyānna sa jīvati ||

5.11.7 prakīrṇakeśo vikaraḥ svapne yo dakṣiṇāṃ diśam |
pratipadyeta tatraiva na sa jīvati tādṛśaḥ ||

5.11.8 kuśair iva nirūḍhāṅgamātmānaṃ svapna īkṣate |
khaṃ vā sadhūmaṃ yo vetti na sa jīvati tādṛśaḥ ||

5.11.9 yaḥ svapne vṛkṣamāruhya na rogī trāyate gṛhe |
prakīrṇakeśo vikacaḥyo ' gnimāruhya roditi ||

5.11.10 prāsādamekasthūṇaṃ tu svapne yaś cādhirohati |
naro nṛtyati paṅke vāsa pumānna ca jīvati ||

5.11.11 svapne prāsādamāruhya mahāntaṃ kāñcanaṃ tathā |
yonṛttagītapānānnī na sa jīvati mānavaḥ ||

5.11.12 gajenoṣṭreṇa vā gacchan yaḥ paśyeddakṣiṇāṃ diśam |
jīvet tu rogī saptāhaṃ, nīrogaḥ śaradāṃ śatam ||

5.11.13 yāti yo durdine vāpi svapne vā dakṣiṇāṃ diśam |
pratibudhyeta tatraiva na sa jīvati tādṛśaḥ ||

5.11.14 bhāsairbarhivarāhaiś ca śvabhir mahiṣavājibhiḥ |
samaṃ yo taddivā yone svapne yogaphalaṃ bhavet ||

5.11.15 yadā gaṇḍaṃ ca khaḍgaṃ ca svapne cāśnaṃś ca paśyati |
prakīrṇakeśam api ca na sa jīvati tādṛśaḥ ||

5.11.16 yaḥ svapne puruṣaḥ kālaṃ pītaṃ vā vastramṛcchati |
gāyannaceṣṭayanvāpi na sa jīvati tādṛśaḥ ||

5.11.17 yaḥ svapnevītakāmo ' pi pītāṃ pibati vāruṇīm |
citrakaṇṭhaguṇo vāpi na sa jīvati tādṛśaḥ ||

5.11.18ākulāpāṃ nadīṃ svapne yovagāheta mānavaḥ |
jīvetsarogassaptāhaṃ, nīrogasśaradāṃ śatam ||

5.11.19 svapne snātānuliptasya bhraṃśedyasya tuvarṇakaḥ |
gātrasya puruṣasyehasa śastreṇa vinaśyati ||

5.11.20 etadindriyavijñānaṃ yassamyaganupaśyati |
jīvitaṃ caiva mṛtyuṃ ca nṛṇāṃ vidyādvicakṣaṇaḥ || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele indriye ekādaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || || dvādaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto+avākcitīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

5.12.1 avākcitā vā jihmā vā yasya chāyālpikā bhāvet |
netre ca viṣame syātāṃ paretaṃ tasya jīvitam || 5.1

5.12.2 yadi dīnāni pakṣmāṇi na nimīlanti dehinaḥ |
dahyete nayane vāpi paretaṃ tasya jīvitam ||

5.12.3namantyau yasya dṛśyetebhruvau mūrdhani bā sthite |
jīvet tu satryahaṃ rogī ṣaṇmāsān vyādhivarjitaḥ ||

5.12.4luñcyamāneṣu keśeṣuvedayannāti vedanām |
nivṛttasukhaduḥkhaḥ syāt paretaṃ tasya jīvitam ||

5.12.5 yasyāturasya piṭakā vyaṅgo vā dṛśyate mukhe |
adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ prathamaṃ paretaṃ tasya jīvitam ||

5.12.6 śuṣyate nāsikāvaṃśaḥ pṛthutvaṃ yasya gacchati |
aṃso ' nilāt kāsavataḥ paretaṃ tasya jīvitam ||

5.12.7 atyuṣṇaṃ vātiśītaṃ vā stabdhaṃ vā mṛdu vāpy atha |
manyate pāṇipādaṃ ca paretaṃ tasya jībitam ||

5.12.8 yo ' vatīrya nadīṃ pūrṇāṃ toye paśyati jālakam |
gātraṃ liptamathādbhiś ca yasya nāstīti taṃ viduḥ ||

5.12.9 vivartayati yaḥ śīrṣamatyarthaṃ canasā naraḥ |
na svidyate lalāṭaṃ ca nāsti tasya cikitsitam ||

5.12.10 jvaryate kāsate vāpi tathocchavasiti vai dṛḍham |
ākramyate tāmyate ca yathā pretas tathaiva saḥ ||

5.12.11 yasyodaraṃsamādhmātaṃ tadvartma ca vibhāvyate |
bhinnaṃ purīṣaṃ tṛṣṇā ca yathā pretas tathaiva saḥ ||

5.12.12anārataṃ gṛhe yasyakāṃsyaṃ bhidyeta dehinaḥ |
candrastīkṣṇo mṛduścārko yasya syāt taṃ vivarjayet ||

5.12.13 apradhātuḥ pradhāturvā svastho vā yadivā++āturaḥ |
yaścandanamivāvāti na sa jīvati tādṛśaḥ ||

5.12.14 yūthikotpannagaṇḍaśca, vāti yaś cāpi vartmavat |
abhaktaḥ tasimaṃ bālye yo vāti na sa jīvati ||

5.12.15 dviṣadbhiḥ kurute sakhyaṃ yaḥ priyairyāt i vipriyam |
akasmātkupyate yas tu paretaṃ tasya jīvitam ||

5.12.16ebhir evaṃvidhairliṅgairanyaiś cāpi yathāyatham |
nopakrameta medhāvī bhiṣaganvitamāturam ||

5.12.17 etadbhiṣagariṣṭānāṃ yo jñānamanubudhyate |
yathoktaṃ veda vedāyuḥ sa bhiṣak śāstrakovidaḥ || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele indriye dvādaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || iti bhelasaṃhitāyām indriyasthānaṃ samāptam || |
|cikitsāsthānam || || prathamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāta ekādaśasarpiṣkaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

6.1.1 akalpayan na yajñāṅgaṃ purā dakṣastriśūline |
tasmāt praṇāśayāmāsa yajñaṃ dakṣasya śaṅkaraḥ ||

6.1.2 taṃ ca nāśayatā yajñaṃ devyāḥ priyacikīrṣayā |
krodhenoṣṇaṃ viniśvasya tān lokān vyāpito jvaraḥ ||

6.1.3 sa eṣa santāpayati jagatsthāvarajaṅgamam |
nidhane cāpi bhūtānāṃ nānyo heturvinā jvarāt ||

6.1.4 yāvanto ' nye samākhyātā vyādhayas tu śarīriṇām |
saṃvatsareṇa te ghnanti sadyaḥ prāṇaharo jvaraḥ ||

6.1.5 rogānīkasya sarvasya jvaro rājā prakīrtitaḥ |
jvarayatyeṣa bhūtāni tasmājjvara iti smṛtiḥ ||

6.1.6 śārīramānasānāṃ ca rogāṇāṃpravaro jvaraḥ |
tasmāt prathamatas tasya pravakṣyāmi cikitsitam ||

6.1.7 uktarūpasamutthānā jvarāś cāṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ |
śītaścoṣṇaś ca niyataḥ samāsātdvividho jvaraḥ ||

6.1.8 śītasyoṣṇāṃ kriyāṃ kuryād vātaśleṣmātmakasya tu |
uṣṇasyaikāntapittasya śītāṃ kuryāt kriyāṃ bhiṣak ||

6.1.9 vāyur āmāśayāt pūrvamūṣmāṇaṃ samudīrayet |
tvaggato roma cāpannaḥ saṃharṣayati mānavam ||

6.1.10 sa tu pittānubandhena tejasā paripācitaḥ |
prāpnoti vilayaṃ śleṣmā sambandheneva toyadaḥ ||

6.1.11śānte śīte punardāhaṃ pittātprāpnoti mānavaḥ |
utpittamindhanībhūtaṃvapurdahati pāvakaḥ ||

6.1.12gatavegenilaḥpaścādūṣmaṇā paripācitaḥ |
svam evabhajate sthānamānulomyaṃ ca gacchati ||

6.1.13 evaṃ jvaramavāpnotihyevam eva ca mucyate |
etad buddhimatāṃ proktaṃ samāsena cikitsitam ||

6.1.14 durlabhā buddhimantas tu tasmād vakṣyāmi vistaram |
ekādaśaprakāraṃ hijvaritānāṃ cikitsitam ||

6.1.15 sarpiś caikādaśaṃ vidyāt tan me vistarataḥ śṛṇu |
siddhās svedāḥ kaṣāyāś ca lehaḥ pācanakāni ca ||

6.1.16 cūrṇaḥ pradehāssekāś ca vaṭikā modakāḥ payaḥ |
sarpiś caikādaśaṃ proktaṃ siddhamāmamathāpi ca ||

6.1.17 eṣāṃ prayogaṃ vakṣyāmi vīryāṇi ca pṛthak pṛthak |
śleṣmāṇamanilaṃ caiva jitvā pittantu dehinām ||

6.1.18 karoti yasmādūṣmāṇaṃ tasmājjvarita ucyate |
vāyuḥ pittena saṃsṛṣṭaḥ śleṣmā vā pittamūrcchitaḥ ||

6.1.19 ūṣmāṇaṃ kurute yasmāttataḥ pittamupācaret |
tṛṣyate coṣṇasalilaṃ deyaṃ doṣavipācanam ||

6.1.20 jvaraghnaṃ dīpanīyaṃ ca kaphapittānilāpaham |
srotasāṃ śodhanaṃ caiva rucisvedakaraṃ nṛṇām ||

6.1.21 dīpyamāne hi kāyāgnau śleṣmā vāyuś ca śāmyataḥ |
tayoś cāpy anulomatvāt pittamapyupaśāmyati ||
6.1.22 tasmād uṣṇodakaṃ peyaṃ śreṣṭhamāhurnavajvare ||

6.1.23 śītaṃ hi salilaṃ pītaṃ kopayetkaphamārutau |
kuryād bhūyo ' gnimṛdutāṃ staimity amaruciṃ tathā ||

6.1.24 kāmaṃtu tiktakaissiddhaṃ hitaṃ kvathitaśītalam |
teṣāṃsāmiśṛtaṃ pānaṃye cāpy ekāntaśītalāḥ ||

6.1.25 bhojanārthaṃ hi ṣaḍrātraṃ peyā deyā bubhukṣite |
kṣutpipāsāpahā pathyā śakṛnmūtrānilāpahā ||

6.1.26 auṣṇyādvātakaphau hanyāt llaghutvāt param eva ca |
hṛdvyathāṃ vidhiyuktā tu sāhanyāt svedamāvahet ||

6.1.27 tasmājjvareṣu sarveṣu jvaramukte ca mānave |
pāyayed vidhivatpeyāḥ yathāsvauṣadhasādhitāḥ ||

6.1.28 śītajjvaraharaṃ kṛtsnamuktamevaṃ cikitsitam |
ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi bhojyābhojyaṃ savistaram ||

6.1.29 śālayaḥ ṣaṣṭikāś caiva nīvārāssapramodakāḥ |
yavānnavikṛtiś cāpi bhojaneṣu hitāssadā ||

6.1.30 kapiñjalāssahariṇā vartakāḥ kālapucchakāḥ |
eṇāvartīrakāś caiva jāṅgalā jvarite hitāḥ ||

6.1.31 mudgāḍhakīmasūrāṇāṃsatīnānāṃ tathaiva ca |
siddhāssūpāḥ praśasyante yūṣāś ca jvaranāśanāḥ ||

6.1.32uṣṇān vrīhīn sayavakān saktukāṃścitrakānapi |
māṣāṃstilāṃścoṣṇavīryān jvaritaḥ parivarjayet ||

6.1.33grāmyānūpaudakaṃ māṃsaṃtathobhe gavyamāhiṣe |
chāgaso raṇavārāhaṃ dadhi śuktaṃ ca varjayet ||

6.1.34 piṣṭānnāni ca sarvāṇi śākāni vividhāni ca |
vidāhīnyuṣṇavīryāṇi jvaritaḥ parivarjayet ||

6.1.35 barhiṇastittirikrauñcān kapotānatha kukkuṭān |
pañcaitānviṣkirānuṣṇān jvaritaḥ parivarjayet ||

6.1.36vamane ca vireke ca snehane laṅghane tathā |
proktā me jvariṇaḥ kālāḥ sūtrasthāne savistarāḥ ||

6.1.37 amātyāś cālayaś cāpi suhṛdaś cānuśāsinaḥ |
chandajñā matisampannāḥśāstrajñāneṣu kovidāḥ ||

6.1.38 te vadeyuḥ kathāścitrā dharmakāmārthasaṃhitāḥ |
āturasya vinodārthaṃ tandrāśokavināśanāḥ ||

6.1.39dāruṇāś cāmanojñāś ca naca prītivivardhanāḥ |
pittavyādhiparītānāṃ kathāś caparivarjayet ||

6.1.40 utsāhameva janayed āturasya cikitsakaḥ |
udagrasya hi bhaiṣajyamamṛtatvāya kalpate ||

6.1.41 candrānanāḥ pīnakucāḥ sugandhāḥ śuklavāsasaḥ |
rujāklamavināśārthamupāsīta ca yoṣitaḥ ||

6.1.42 atyāśanamatisthānamaticaṅkramaṇāni ca |
jvarito varjayennityaṃ prāṇān rakṣec ca sarvaśaḥ ||

6.1.43 krodhaṃ striyaṃ caṅkramaṇaṃ divāsvapnātibhāṣaṇam |
gurūṇyadhvā viruddhāni vyāyāmo vegadhāraṇam ||

6.1.44 praduṣṭo mārutaḥ pānaṃ niśi jāgaraṇaṃ ca yat |
kāraṇānyupaśāntasya jvarasya prabhave punaḥ ||

6.1.45 nacainaṃ snāpayejjātu sahasā jvarakarśitam |
saṃdūṣitāṃ hy asya tanuṃ punarāvartate jvaraḥ ||

6.1.46maheśvarakrodhabhavo jvaraḥ prokto maharṣibhiḥ |
tasmājjvaravimokṣārthaṃ pūjayet ṛṣabhadhvajam ||

6.1.47 snānāni śāntayo homavratāni niyamo yamaḥ |
śasyante ceṣṭayaḥ kāmyā vedoktā jvaranāśanāḥ ||

6.1.48 rogādhipatirugraujāḥ vyādhīnāṃ prasavo jvaraḥ |
sarvabhūtāntako ghorohutāśātmā jvaraḥ smṛtaḥ ||

6.1.49prasaṅgī duścikitsyaḥ syādbhiṣagbhiḥ pāpasambhavaḥ |
tasmād vedoditairmantrairhomaiś ca vinivartayet ||

6.1.50bhūtavidyāsamutpannaṃ caṇḍakarma jvarāpaham |
tatkāryaṃ bhūtavaidyena tathā nāviśati jvaraḥ ||

6.1.51 rudrabhaktena śucinā vaidyenātha tapasvinā |
prayatena prayoktavyaṃcirajvaracikitsitam || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele cikitsite prathamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || dvitīyo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto viṣamajvaracikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

6.2.1 kecidvātātmakaṃprāhurbhiṣajo viṣamajvaram |
sannipātodbhavaṃ kecidapare pittasambhavam ||

6.2.2. śleṣmajaṃ tvapare prāhurapare bhūtasambhavam |
janmanakṣatrapīḍābhir apare devacintakāḥ ||

6.2.3īdṛśaḥ śāstrakārāṇāṃ matayo ' tha pṛthagvidhāḥ |
sannipātodbhavaṃ hyetadahaṃ vakṣyāmi hetubhiḥ ||
6.2.4 pakvāśayasthapavano hy asthimajjagatastathā |(ṃadhukośa on ṃṇ2.38)) kupitaḥ kopayatyāśu śleṣmāṇaṃ pittam eva ca ||

6.2.5 sagambhīrasamutpattisthānatantratrayo mahān |
anyedyuṣkaikāntaritau kuryād vāpi caturthakam ||

6.2.6 majjānamasthi medaś ca dūṣayetprathame ' hani |
dvitīye ' hani samprāpte dūṣayenmāṃsaśoṇitam ||

6.2.7 tatastṛtīye divase dūṣayet kaphamārutau |
abhigamyatataḥ pittaṃ dūṣayet tu caturthake ||

6.2.8 jvaro ' yaṃ prāṇināṃ dehe raudro māheśvaras tathā |
prayateta praśāntau tu tasmād asya vicakṣaṇaḥ ||

6.2.9 gambhīrasthānasambhūtodhātusaṃkaradūṣitaḥ |
tasmāc caturthako nāmaduścikitsyatamo mataḥ ||

6.2.10 śoṣayatyeṣa bhūtāni dāruṇo viṣamajvaraḥ |
tasmāc choṣopacāreṇa kuryāt tasya cikitsitam ||

6.2.11 triphalākvāthasiddhena ghṛtena matimān bhiṣak |
snehayet taṃ yathānyāyaṃ yuktyāvṛṣaghṛtena vā ||

6.2.12 sraṃsayet tamadhobhāgaṃ yathāvyādhibalābalam |
doṣeṣvāmāśayastheṣu kārayed vamanaṃ bhiṣak ||

6.2.13 āsthāpanaṃ ca kurvīta tathā cāpy anuvāsanam |
etanmahāpañcagavyaṃ vikhyātaṃ sarpiruttamam ||

6.2.14 caturthakaṃ mokṣayati mantrasiddhiyutoyathā |
śvayathuṃ pāṇḍurogaṃ ca plīhānaṃ sabhagandaram ||
6.2.15 udarāṇi tathā gulmān kāmilāṃ cāpakarṣati ||

6.2.16 śakṛdrasaṃ payo mūtraṃ dadhi sarpiś ca pāyayet |
tatpañcagavyaṃ śamayecchvayathuṃ pāṇḍutāṃ jvaram ||

6.2.17 samūlapatraśākhasya śataṃ kṛtvā vṛṣasyatu |
jaladroṇe vipaktavyamaṣṭabhāgāvaśeṣitam ||
6.2.18 garbheṇa vṛṣapuṣpāṇāmāḍhakaṃ sarpiṣaḥpacet || tatsiddhaṃ pāyayed yuktyā madhupādasamanvitam ||

6.2.19 kāsaṃ śvāsaṃ pāṇḍurogaṃ tṛtīyakacaturthakau |
raktapittaṃ kṣayaṃ caiva vṛṣasarpirniyacchati ||

6.2.20 nāgaraṃ saindhavaṃ cavyaṃpippalīkṣāracitrakau |
eteṣāṃ palikairbhāgairghṛtaprasthaṃ vipācayet ||

6.2.21 kṣīraprasthena saṃyojya śanairmṛdvagninā pacet |
etena gulmāḥ śāmyanti kuṣṭhāni jaṭharāṇi ca ||

6.2.22 jvare ca viṣame peyaṃ plīhaśvayathumehinām |
śūle pāṇḍvāmaye caiva grahaṇīdīpaneṣu ca ||

6.2.23 ūrdhvavātāś ca ye kecitsarveṣāmauṣadhaṃ param |
tryūṣaṇaṃ citrakaṃ hiṃsrāṃ vilaṅgāni harītakīm ||

6.2.24 vibhītakānyāmalakaṃ cirabilvatvacaṃ tathā |
daśaitāni samāṃśāni ślakṣṇānyakṣasamāni ca ||

6.2.25 taiḥ pācayed dhṛtaprasthaṃ samyakpayasi ṣaḍguṇe |
grahaṇī dīpyate tena vātagulmaś ca śāmyati ||

6.2.26 arśasāṃ śamanaṃ caiva gudaśophe ca pūjitam |
etad eva hi vai śreṣṭhamudāvarte ghṛtaṃ bhavet ||

6.2.27 darbhavetasamūlāni candanaṃ madhukaṃ balā |
phenilā padmakośīramubhe ca kamalotpale ||

6.2.28 kiṃśukaśceti bhāgāḥ syuḥ pṛthakpañcapalonmitāḥ |
jaladroṇe vipaktavyaṃ caturbhāgāvaśeṣitam ||

6.2.29 jīvakarṣabhakau medāṃ lodhraṃ lāmajjakaṃ tathā |
kāleyakaṃ sapriyakaṃ dadyāt kesaram eva ca ||

6.2.30 tripuṇḍarīkaṃ lodhraṃ ca padmakaṃ padmakesaram |
surabhiṃ kuṅkumaṃ caiva mañjiṣṭhāṃ madayantikām ||

6.2.31 mācipatraṃ ca tulyāni dviguṇaṃ kuṅkumaṃ bhavet |
caturguṇāṃ ca mañjiṣṭhāṃ sauvīraṃ snehasammitam ||

6.2.32 tailaprasthaṃ pacettena kaṣāyeṇārdhapeṣitam |
etadabhyañjanaṃ tailaṃ viṣamajvaranāśanam ||

6.2.33mahāpadmakam ākhyātam etat sarvajvarāpaham |
vātapittodbhavaṃ kṣipraṃ jvarametanniyacchati ||

6.2.34 trāyamāṇāṃ jayāṃ vīrāṃ nākulīṃ gandhanākulīm |
kāyasthāṃ cavayaḥsthāṃ ca jīrakaṃ sapalaṅkaṣam ||

6.2.35chatrāticchatrajaṭilāṃ sūkarīṃ karkaṭīṃ tathā |
cāraṭīṃ pūtanāṃ keśīṃ vacāṃ kaṭukarohiṇīm ||

6.2.36 mahāpuruṣadantāṃ ca vṛścikālīṃkaṭambharām |
sthirāṃ ca piṣṭvā taissiddhaṃ caturthakavināśanam ||

6.2.37 mahāpaiśācikaṃ nāma sarpiretajjvarāpaham |
bhūtagrahānapasmārānunmādāṃś cāpakarṣati ||

6.2.38 etair eva uṣadhagaṇaiḥ pradehaṃ kārayed bhiṣak |
dhūpayejjvaritaṃ caiva tathā sampadyate sukhī ||

6.2.39 balayaḥ śāntikarmāṇi homasvastyayanāni ca |
snānāni copavāsaś ca śamayanti caturthakam ||

6.2.40 sraṣṭāraṃ cāsya rogasya bhūtādhipatimacyutam |
pūjayaṃś cābhigacchec ca śmaśāne vṛṣabhadhvajam ||

6.2.41 bhūtavidyāsamutpannairbandhanaissādhanair api |
homairbalividhānaiś ca nāśayed viṣamajvaram || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele cikitsite dvitīyo ' dhyāyaḥ || || tṛtīyo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto raktapittacikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

6.3.1 ūrdhvaṃ cādhaś ca martyānāṃ raktapittaṃ pravartate |
atas tu dvividhā proktā cikitsā raktapittinaḥ ||

6.3.2 atyamlalavaṇāhārāt satatātapasevanāt |
upavāsād bhramāt trāsādviruddhādhyaśanādibhiḥ ||

6.3.3 tilapiṇyākāśākānāṃ tathā piṣṭakṛtasya ca |
pittalānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ matsyādīnāṃ ca sevanāt ||

6.3.4 ūrdhvaṃ cādhaś ca kupitaṃ raktapittaṃ pravartate |
ghrāṇakarṇākṣimukhataḥ pāyuto meḍhratas tathā ||

6.3.5 niṣṭhīvati saraktaṃ ca tiktamamlamathāpi vā |
na catatpatitaṃ bhūmau bhakṣayanti pipīlikāḥ ||

6.3.6 makṣikā vāpi tiktatvāc chuṣkaṃ pittaṃ ca lakṣyate |
sandahyate dūyate ca kaṇṭhastālu ca śuṣyati ||

6.3.7 lohagandhi mukhaṃ cāsya kaṇṭho dhūmāyate tathā |
etānyevaṃ tvadhobhāge lakṣaṇānyupalakṣayet ||

6.3.8 ūrdhvabhāgaṃ tu sādhyaṃ syādadho vai yāpyamucyate |
sarvasrotaḥpravṛttaṃ tu raktapittaṃ na sidhyati || raktapittamadhobhāgaṃ chardinaissamupācaret || ||caturtho ' dhyāyaḥ ||

6.4.1 svapneṣu nityaṃ paśyanti śuṣkāndagdhāṃś ca pādapān |
makṣikātṛṇakeśāś ca sampatantyasya bhojane ||

6.4.2 romāṇi mūrdhajāś cāsya vivardhante viśeṣataḥ |
avaguṇṭhanaśīlaś ca rahaḥkāmotthakopanaḥ ||

6.4.3 jugupsāluramarṣī ca strīkāmo durbalendriyaḥ |
ucitā hīyate chāyā tāluśoṣś ca jāyate ||

6.4.4 nāsāsrāvaḥ pratiśyāyaḥ svarabhedaśśirorujā |
ūrū ca svidyato ' tyarthaṃ hāniś ca balavarṇayoḥ ||

6.4.5 śirasaḥ paripūrṇatvaṃ hastapādaṃ cadahyate |
aruciś cāvipākaś ca mūrchā śvāso mṛdurjvaraḥ ||

6.4.6 kṣatoraskaś ca kāsena niṣṭhīvati saśoṇitam |
etāni pūrvarūpāṇi yakṣmiṇāṃ kīrtitāni ca ||

6.4.7 ṣaṭ caikādaśarūpāṇi śuṣyatastāni lakṣayet |
ucchritopadravaṃcainaṃ pūrvarūpairabhidrutam ||

6.4.8 prakṣīṇabalamāṃsaṃ ca na cikitsedviśoṣiṇam |
alpopadravasaṃyuktamaciropadravotthitam ||

6.4.9 dravyavantaṃ vayaḥsthaṃ capratyākhyāyārabheta vai |
athāsyānumataṃ pūrvaṃ pravakṣyāmi cikitsitam ||

6.4.10 yadadhītya bhiṣagyuktyā yaśaḥ svargam avāpnuyāt |
śoṣī nity ajugupsāluḥ sukhaśīlaś ca mānavaḥ ||

6.4.11 lolo dveṣṭā nikṛṣṭānāṃ vaidyabhaiṣajyakutsakaḥ |
tasmāt tasyānukūlena bhiṣajā++āśvasanena ca ||

6.4.12 asaṃbhrāntena yuktena prayoktavyaṃ cikitsitam |
śoṣiṇo ' thabalasthasya pañcakarma vidhīyate ||

6.4.13 tad eva kṣīṇamāṃsasya prayuktaṃ viṣamaṃ bhavet |
tasya saṃśuddhākāyasya bhojanānyupakalpayet ||

6.4.14 kalamān dīrghaśūkāṃś ca raktaśāliṃ saṣaṣṭikān |
yavānnavikṛtīś cāpi jāṅgalāṃś ca mṛgadvijān ||

6.4.15 bhojaneṣu praśaṃsanti mudgān sūpārtham eva ca |
saṃvatsarasthitaṃ dhānyaṃ bhojane śoṣiṇāṃ hitam ||

6.4.16 taddhi vīryādahīnaṃ syānmāṃsaṃ sadyohataṃ ca yat |
viśeṣataś ca māṃsāni kravyādabilavāsinām ||

6.4.17 śoṣī nityaṃ niṣeveta madyāni vividhāni ca |
śleṣmā dehe vivṛddho ' pi vāyunā susamīritaḥ ||

6.4.18 pittaṃ raktaṃ ca sandūṣyasrotāṃsyūrdhvaṃ ruṇaddhi hi |
te parasparasaṃruddhā dhātavaḥ pavaneritāḥ ||

6.4.19 kaphapradhānā rundhanti sarvā rasavahāḥ sirāḥ |
tadā tā rasavāhinyaḥsirāhṛdayavāhikāḥ ||

6.4.20 rasamāhārajātānāṃ na vahanti yathā purā |
tasya bhuktaṃ na raktāya na māṃsāya ca kalpate ||

6.4.21 na ca medo+asthimajjabhyo na śuklatvāy dehinām |
teṣāmavṛddhādhātūnāṃbaddhānāmayaneṣv atha ||

6.4.22 bhuñjānānām api sarogāṇi gātrāṇi dehinām |
hetunā tena śuṣyanti śuṣyatāṃ śoṣavanti ca ||

6.4.23 etacchoṣasya śoṣatvaṃmukhyamāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ |
sattveṣv atipramāthitvaṃ vyālakarma yathā++āpadi ||

6.4.24 māṃsāny api tathā teṣāṃsrotāṃsi vikasanty api |
śodhayanti pramāthitvāt srotāṃsi grathitāny api ||

6.4.25 tasmāt kravyādamāṃsāni śoṣīśaktyāvaśīlayet |
rahasyametadvaidyānām upadiṣṭaṃ cikitsakaiḥ ||

6.4.26 madyaṃ kravyādamāṃsaṃ ca śoṣiṇāmamṛtopamam |
vṛkāḥ śṛgālā ṛkṣāḥśvasiṃhavyāghrāssasūkarāḥ ||

6.4.27 eṇaśabdena dātavyā nānādravyābhisaṃskṛtāḥ |
gṛdhrān sahaṃsānulūkānmaṇḍūkāñśyenavāyasān ||

6.4.28 dadyādbarhiṇaśabdena madyaṃ ca niyataṃ pibet |
ākhumārjāralopākān dvijihvāñśalyakānapi ||

6.4.29nakulāṃstāmracūḍāṃś ca bhakṣayecca susaṃskṛtān |
anyamāṃsopadeśena māṃsāny etāni dāpayet ||

6.4.30 jugupsayā vamati vā pāde ' tyavahito bhavet |
tasmād rahasyasiddhāni māṃsāny etāni bhakṣayet ||

6.4.31 bileśayakravyabhujāṃ bhiṣaṅ māṃsāni lābhataḥ |
toyadroṇeṣu daśasu tulāmatha vipācayet ||

6.4.32 aṣṭabhāgāvaśiṣṭantu rasaṃ visrāvayed bhiṣak |
garbheṇa jīvanīyānāṃ sarpirdroṇaṃ vipācayet ||

6.4.33 tatpibenmātrataḥ sarpirmāṃsaṃ tenaiva sādhayet |
kāsaṃ śvāsaṃ sahṛdrogaṃ jvaraṃ pārśvarujām api ||

6.4.34 śvayathuṃ svarabhedaṃ ca śoṣiṇāmapakarṣati |
pañcamūlaṃ mahaddhrasvaṃ golomīṃ madhukaṃ balām ||

6.4.35 vipācayejjaladroṇe caturbhāgāvaśeṣitam |
tatkaṣāyaṃ jalaṃpūtaṃ ghṛtaprasthaṃ vipācayet ||

6.4.36 caturguṇena payasā jīvanīyaiś ca peṣitaiḥ |
vidāryāmalakānāṃ tu tathaivekṣo rasasya ca ||
6.4.37 dadyād ghṛtasamān bhāgān tatpacenmṛdunā ' gninā || rasāyanīyam iti tat khyātaṃsarpirbalāvaham ||

6.4.38 hṛdrogakṣatakāsānāṃ kṣayāṇāṃ ca nivāraṇam |
ataḥ sarpirguḍaṃ kuryāc charkarāmadhusaṃyutam ||

6.4.39 godhūmacūrṇena saha modakānvāpi kārayet |
pūrvokteṣu vikāreṣu śoṣiṇāmamṛtopamam ||

6.4.40 kṣīrānupānaṃ bhakṣyāste modakā balavardhanāḥ |
madyānupānāssevyāste śoṣaḥ śleṣmādhiko yadi ||

6.4.41 prasthārdhaṃdhautaluñcitatilānāṃ kalkapeṣitam |
toyaprasthena saṃyojya ghṛtaprasthaṃ vipācayet ||

6.4.42 atha siddhaṃ ca pūtaṃ ca punastadvipaced ghṛtam |
saha kravyādamāṃsena kṣīreṇeha ca sarvaśaḥ ||

6.4.43 bilvamātreṇa piṇḍenabhāvitena sadāmbunā |
jāṅgalena ca māṃsena sukṛtena vidhānavit ||

6.4.44 atha siddhaṃ ca pūtaṃ ca punaragnāvadhiśrayet |
prasthena payasā sārdhaṃ samyagikṣurasāḍhake ||

6.4.45 vidārīṃ mudgaparṇīṃ ca māṣaparṇīṃ kaserukam |
śṛṅgāṭakamṛṇālāni padmabījaṃ sajīvakam ||

6.4.46 kṣīraśuklāṃsaṛṣabhāṃ medāṃ samadhukāṃ tathā |
payasyāṃ kṣīrakākolīṃ kandaṃ nīlotpalasya ca ||

6.4.47 saha tālakadambena kalkāṃstānakṣasammitān |
tasminnāloḍya tat sarvaṃ vipacenmṛdunāgninā ||

6.4.48 tatsiddhaṃ srāvayitvā tu nirvātaṃ syādyathāmṛtam |
tataḥprātarghanībhūtaṃkhajenābhipramanthayet ||

6.4.49 athātra śarkarācūrṇaṃpañcāśatpalasammitam |
mathyamānaṃ tato dadyāddattvā dattvā ca manthayet ||

6.4.50 gandhārthaṃ cātra deyaṃ syāccūrṇaṃtvaṅnāgapuṣpayoḥ |
ekībhūtaṃ tathā rātrimekāṃ parivasedatha ||

6.4.51 akṣapramāṇasaṃsthānāḥ kāryās tu modakās tathā |
yavagodhūmacūrṇābhyāṃ tugākṣīryā ca cūrṇitān ||

6.4.52 bhakṣayenmodakān kāle kṣīrapānaṃ pibetpunaḥ |
yakṣmāṇaṃ śamayantyete vṛkṣamindrāśaniryathā ||

6.4.53asṛgdaraṃ kṣataṃ kṣīṇaṃ hṛdrogaṃ viṣamajvaram |
unmāda raktapittaṃ ca kāsaṃ caitena sādhayet ||

6.4.54 aśvatthasyātha mūlāni śuṅgāni saphalāni ca |
śatāvarīṃ pṛśniparṇīṃ bṛhatīṃ kaṇṭakārikām ||

6.4.55 golomīṃ śreyasīṃ kālāṃ śāribāṃ sapunarnavām |
kṣīradroṇeṣu daśasu kuṭṭitāni vipācayet ||

6.4.56tacchṛtaṃ śītalaṃ pūtaṃkhajenābhipramanthayet |
yattatra sarpirjāyetataduddhṛtya vipācayet ||

6.4.57 bhaiṣajyāni ca piṣṭāni tatremāni samācaret |
madhukaṃ madhuliṃ drākṣāṃ medāṃ vṛṣabhajīrakau ||

6.4.58 tālamajjāṃsalāmajjaṃ tathāpuṣkarabījakam |
jīvanīṃ trāyamāṇāṃ ca madhukāni kaśerukam ||

6.4.59 nīlotpalaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ vārtākānapi coccaṭām |
kāśmaryāmalakekṣūṇāṃ vidāryāḥ svarasaṃ ca vā ||

6.4.60 tatsiddhaṃ dāpayet pūtaṃ kalaśe rājate dṛḍhe |
tulārdhaṃ śarkarāyāś ca dattvā caivābhimanthayet ||

6.4.61 prakṣipec ca tugākṣīryāḥ prasthaṃ prasthaṃ ca mākṣikāt |
ātmaguptāphalasya syād guḍasya maricasya ca ||

6.4.62 uccaṭīkṣurasābhyāṃ ca dvau prasthau tatra dāpayet |
tvagelānāgapuṣpāṇāṃ cūrṇaṃ tatra pradāpayet ||

6.4.63 palikān modakān kṛtvā sthāpayenmṛṇmaye nave |
aśnīyāttatpalaṃkalyaṃ sāyaṃ bhūyaḥpalaṃ naraḥ ||

6.4.64 śayanaṃ mṛdu seveta brahmacārī samāhitaḥ |
karmaṇānena niyataṃ yakṣmāṇamapakarṣati ||

6.4.65 saṃbṛhayatiśuṣkaṃ ca puruṣaṃdurbalendriyam |
vājīkaraṇamapyetannarāṇāṃ kṣīṇaretasām ||

6.4.66 strībhir hatā bhārahatāḥ jīrṇāś cātītayauvanāḥ |
kṣīṇamāṃsāḥ kṣīṇabalāḥ ye cātha kṣīṇaśoṇitāḥ ||

6.4.67 pittaroge raktapitte śoṣe doṣajvare tathā |
hatendriyā naṣṭaśuklāḥsaktakaṇṭhāś ca ye smṛtāḥ ||

6.4.68 aśaktamandakā ye caratinaṣṭendriyā narāḥ |
punarnavāṃstānkurute yogo ' yamamṛtopamaḥ ||

6.4.69 apasmārānathonmādān hṛdrogānapatantrakam |
tejo vāpahṛtaṃyeṣāṃ bhūtadharmeṇa kenacit ||

6.4.70 kṣīrānupānāttanvanti sadyaḥpoṣaṃ hi modakāḥ |
vyākulātyalpādhātūnāṃ śoṣiṇāṃ mandadehinām ||

6.4.71 api yogaśatenāpi duḥkham eva cikitsitam |
tasmād rasāyanavidhiṃ vardhamāne kṣaye bhiṣak ||

6.4.72 saṃvatsaraṃparamṛtumayanaṃ vā samācaret |
pippalīvardhamānaṃ tu pañcapañcavivardhitam ||

6.4.73nasye cābhyañjane pāne praśastaṃ bastikarmaṇi |
vātavyādhiṣu sarveṣu kṣatakṣīṇe śirograhe ||

6.4.74 pārśvaśūle pramehe ca gulmesārśobhagandare |
cyutabhagnāṅgahīnānāṃ kāse śvāse ca hṛdgrahe ||

6.4.75 jvarātisāreṣv arucauvarṇabhede svarakṣaye |
sukumāram idaṃ tailaṃ bālavṛddhasukhāvaham ||

6.4.76 etaddhi vṛṣyaṃ balyaṃ camāsānmāṃsavivardhanam |
svaravarṇakaraṃ caiva śoṣiṇāmamṛtopamam ||

6.4.77niṣpākaś cāsya tailasya samyak siddhasya yo bhavet |
udaśvidiva dadhyarthaṃ so ' pi kṛtyakaro bhavet ||

6.4.78 ekādaśa ca ṣaṭ caivaśoṣajā ya upadravāḥ |
sukumāraṃ praśamayenmedho ' gnīniva vṛṣṭimān ||

6.4.79 luñcitānāṃ tilānāṃ tu tailaprasthaṃ vipācayet |
palaṃ tu madhukasyātra garbhaṃ kṣīraṃ caturguṇam ||

6.4.80mṛdupākaṃ ca tatsiddhaṃ bhūya eva vipācayet |
caturguṇena payasā madhukasyapalena ca ||

6.4.81 etena vidhinā caiva madhukasyaśataṃ pacet |
śatakṛtvovipakvantu śatapākam iti smṛtam ||

6.4.82 pānābhyañjananasyeṣu bastau vyañjanasādhane |
bhojane cāmṛtaprakhyaṃ narāṇāṃ rājayakṣmiṇām ||

6.4.83 hṛdrogaṃ tāluśoṣaṃ ca pārśvaśūlaṃ pratānakam |
tṛṣṇāmunmādavīsarpaṃ kāsaṃ śvāsamasṛgdaram ||

6.4.84 raktapittaṃ pravṛddhaṃ ca sarvato bhāgamūrcchitam |
kāmalāṃ pāṇḍurogaṃ ca pānādetanniyacchati ||

6.4.85mukhapākākṣipākau ca bādhiryaṃ karṇavedanām |
naktāndhyaṃ timiraṃ kācaṃ liṅganāśaṃsirācayam ||

6.4.86 biḍālikāṃ pūtinasyaṃ śirorogaṃ śirograham |
nastaḥ kṛtaṃ praṇudati khālity aṃ palitāni ca ||

6.4.87 adhobhāge raktapitte raktārśassu bhagandare |
sarvagātragate vāteraktapittasamudbhave ||

6.4.88 aprajassu ca nārīṣu puṃsāṃ naṣṭe ca retasi |
jānutrikādikubjeṣu praśastaṃ bastikarmaṇi ||

6.4.89 bahūparodhāḥ strīnity āḥ teṣāṃ vṛṣyatamaṃ matam |
prayogeṇa prayuktaṃ ca rasāyanamanuttamam ||

6.4.90 sahasrapākam ity etat kalpenaitena sādhayet |
rasāyanamidaṃ prāhurnṛṇāṃ varṣasahasrakṛt ||

6.4.91 aśvagandhā hy apāmārgo nākulī gaurasarṣapāḥ |
tilā bilvaṃ ca kalkaṃ syāt tatra rakṣayonmardanaṃ param ||

6.4.92 maṅgalācārasaṃyukto bhavetsvastyayano naraḥ |
snānāni śāntihomāṃś ca śoṣī nityaṃ samācarete ||

6.4.93 iṣṭayo vedavihitā nāśanā rājayakṣmaṇaḥ |
tāś ca nityaṃ niṣeveta pūjayed vṛṣabhadhvajam ||

6.4.94 upadravāś ca ye śeṣe ṣaṭ caikādaśa coditāḥ |
teṣāṃ cikitsitaṃ kuryād yathā sve sve cikitsite ||

6.4.95 ity evaṃ prayatenoktaṃ rājyakṣacikitsitam |
yaśaḥsvargakaraṃ puṇyaṃ śiṣyāṇāmarthasiddhaye || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele cikitsite caturtho ' dhyāyaḥ || || pañcamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto gulmacikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

6.5.1 pañca gulmāḥ samuddiṣṭā nidāneṣu savistaram |
gulmatvaṃ teṣu vakṣyāmi cikitsāṃ tu pṛthak pṛthak ||

6.5.2 mārutaḥ kupito dehe srotāṃsyunnahya sarvaśaḥ |
abhyāgatya dūṣayati pūrvaṃ pittaṃ kaphaṃ tataḥ ||

6.5.3 dūṣayatyatha raktaṃ ca medo māṃsaṃ vidhāvati |
sa saṅghātasthirībhūto gulmatvam upapadyate ||

6.5.4 duṣṭānāṃ hantukāmānāṃ paraṃ prāṇabhṛtāṃ yathā |
hastyaśvarathayānānāṃ saṃghāto gulma iṣyate ||

6.5.5 evaṃdehe rasādīnāṃ dhātūnāṃ viprakarṣaṇam |
saṃsargo gulma ity uktaḥ saṃghāto gulma ucyate ||

6.5.6stambinistambinīnāṃ tu vallīnāṃ vīrudhām api |
saṃghāto gahanaṃ gulmaḥ tadvad gulmas tu dehinām ||

6.5.7 amūrtatvād dhi vātasyasaṃvittirnopajāyate |
sandhāya pittaśleṣmāṇau māruto gulmatāṃ vrajet ||

6.5.8 madhūcchiṣṭamayaṃ piṇḍaṃ cinvanti bhramarā yathā |
tathā koṣṭheṣu pavano dhātūṃstānvicinoty api ||

6.5.9 sthānāni tasya gulmasya śaṃmanti gurulāghavam |
kukṣikastigato gulmo vātabhūyiṣṭha ucyate ||

6.5.10 sa vātagulmarūpāṇi kuryāt sthānavaśena tu |
tathaiva pittasthānasthaḥ pittarūpāṇi darśayet ||

6.5.11 evaṃ śleṣmaṇi rakte ca sannipāte ca sarvaśaḥ |
sarveṣāṃ sannipāte tu svaṃ svaṃ rūpaṃ nidarśanam ||

6.5.12 āganturdūṣayatyatradhātuṃ sthānasthaulbaṇaḥ |
cikitsitaṃ tusthānasya sa hi tatra balādhikaḥ ||

6.5.13 yadi vastigataḥ pākaṃ vātagulmas tu gacchati |
hṛnnābhyor antaraṃ gulmaḥ pākaṃ gacchati paittikaḥ ||

6.5.14 hṛdi ca śleṣmagulmas tu pākaṃ yāty ananuṣṭhitaḥ |
pacyate sannipātāt tu gulmaśśoṇitajas tathā ||

6.5.15 doṣadvayena saṃsṛṣṭāḥ sarve gulmāḥ pramāthinaḥ |
tasmāt teṣāṃ bhedanīyāḥ kriyāssarvāḥ prayojayet |
atyarthaṃ snihyamāno ' pi gulmo vṛddhim avāpnuyāt ||

6.5.16 atas tu vātagulmasya pravakṣyāmi cikitsitam |
prabhurhi sarvabhūtānāṃ vāyuḥ prāṇeśvaro balī ||

6.5.17harītakī trikaṭukaṃvacā kaṭukarohiṇī |
sauvarcalaṃ yavakṣāro viḍaṅgaṃcitrakas tathā ||

6.5.18 akṣapramāṇairetais tu ghṛtaprasthaṃ vipācayet |
tasmiddhaṃ srāvayitvā tu pāyayet tu yathābalam ||

6.5.19 vātagulmaṃ krimiṃ kāsaṃ śvāsaṃ plīhānam eva ca |
daśāṅgaṃ nāśayatyetadrogān vajramivāsurān ||

6.5.20dvepañcamūlyau suṣavīmaśvagandhāṃ punarnavām |
kālāṃ chinnaruhāṃ rāsnāṃ bhārṅgīṃ gokṣurakaṃ balām ||

6.5.21 śaṭiṃ puṣkaramūlaṃ ca palāśaṃ gandhasaṃjñakam |
eteṣāṃdvipalān bhagān jaladroṇe vipācayet ||

6.5.22 kolānāṃ sakulutthānāṃ māṣāṇāṃ ca yavaissaha |
prasthaṃ prasthaṃ pṛthak kṛtvā tasminn evasamāvapet ||

6.5.23 tena pādāvaśiṣṭena ghṛtaprasthaṃ vipācayet |
dadhyādibhis samaṃ śuktamāranālaṃ tuṣodakam ||

6.5.24dāḍimāmrātakarasaṃ mātuluṅgarasaṃ tathā |
caturguṇaṃ cātra dadhi garbhe caiṣāṃsamāvapet ||

6.5.25 kāravīṃ tryūṣaṇaṃ dantīṃtrīṇyeva lavaṇāni ca |
hiṃsrāṃ rāsnāṃvacāṃ caiva yavānīmamlavetasam ||

6.5.26 viḍaṅgaṃ dāḍimaṃ hiṅgu nīlikāṃ trivṛtām api |
dvau kṣārau cājamodāṃ ca pāṭhāṃ pāṣāṇabhedakam ||

6.5.27ūṣakaṃ vṛṣakaṃ bhārṅgīṃ śvadaṃṣṭrāṃ hapuṣām api |
trapusorvārubījāni śatavīryopakuñcike ||

6.5.28 ajājīṃ citrakaṃmūrvāṃ tumburuṃ gajapippalīm |
dhānyakaṃ surasaṃ caiva dadyādakṣeṇa sammitam ||

6.5.29 garbheṇānena tatsiddhaṃ pāyayetsarpiruttamam |
raktagulmādṛte sarvān gulmānetatpraṇāśayet ||

6.5.30 ekāṅgage pakṣagate gṛdhrasyāṃ plīhni caiva hi |
hṛdroge grahaṇīdoṣe vātagulme ca dāruṇe ||

6.5.31 dādhikaṃ nāma vikhyātaṃ sarpiretanmahāguṇam |
unmādaṃ koṣṭhaśūlāni cāpasmāraṃ ca nāśayet ||

6.5.32 yāvaśūkaṃ tathā kṣāraṃ saindhavaṃ hastipippalīm |
pippalīṃ śṛṅgaberaṃ ca maricaṃ ca samāvapet ||

6.5.33 eṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ ṣaḍeva syuḥ pṛthagbhāgāḥ palaṃ palam |
eṣāmardhapalān bhāgān kaṣāyam upasādhayet ||

6.5.34 peṣyairardhapalīnais tu ghṛtaprasthaṃ vipācayet |
snehatulyaṃ kaṣāyaṃ tu kṣīraṃ taddviguṇaṃ bhavet ||

6.5.35 ity etat ṣaṭpalaṃ nāma sarpirgulmavināśanam |
plīhānamarśāṃsi tathā grahaṇīdoṣam eva ca ||

6.5.36 vastikuṇḍalavardhmāni pānādevāpakarṣati |
eṣāmanyatamaiḥ svehaiḥ snehitaṃ vātagulminam |
virecanena snigdhena yuktyā saṃśodhayed bhiṣak ||

6.5.37 ghṛtaṃ ca saktuṃ ca tathā citrakaṃ saindhavaṃvacām |
pippalīṃ ca pacetkṣīraṃ praśastaṃ cāvatārayet ||

6.5.38 tato biḍālapadakaṃ pibeduṣṇena vāriṇā |
ghṛtena payasā vāpi madyenoṣṇena vāriṇā ||

6.5.39 vātagulmaṃ nudatyeṣa gulmaśūlāni yāni ca |
saplīhānamudāvartaṃ śleṣmagulmaṃ ca nāśayet ||

6.5.40 mahauṣadhaṃ devadāru vāsā kaṭukarohiṇī |
citrakaḥ pippalīmūlaṃ pippalyo hastipippalī ||

6.5.41 kuṣṭhaṃ ca sarpagandhā ca pañcaiva lavaṇāni ca |
dvau kṣārau trivṛtā dantī dravantī copakuñcikā ||

6.5.42 eṣāmardhapalān bhāgān lavaṇānāṃ palaṃ palam |
cūrṇāni dadhnaḥ prasthārdhe samāloḍya vipācayet ||

6.5.43 vasātailaghṛtānāṃ ca prasthaṃ prasthaṃ pradāpayet |
pradīptaṃ ca yathāśāntamathainamavatārayet ||

6.5.44 tato biḍālapadakaṃ pibeduṣṇena vāriṇā |
ghṛtena payasā vāpi madyenāmlena vā punaḥ ||

6.5.45 eṣakṣārāgado nāma vātagulmavināśanaḥ |
plīhānamarśaḥśūlāni vardhmodāvartakuṇḍalam ||

6.5.46 krimīn sagrahaṇīdoṣān viṣān vātāpatānakau |
sarpamūṣakadaṃśāṃś ca granthitān gadayojitān ||

6.5.47 vātaśleṣmasamutthānaṃ sannipātātmakaṃ tathā |
prasahya nāśayed gulmaṃ chinnābhrāṇīva mārutaḥ || vandhyā ca labhate garbhaṃ garānapi ca naśayet |
apasmārānathonmādān
|| ṣaṣṭho ' dhyāyaḥ ||

6.6.1 |pittaṃ bhṛśaṃ dehe prakupyati |
tatpraduṣṭaṃ dūṣayati raktamāṃsamatholbaṇam ||

6.6.2 tatra kuṣṭhāni jāyante dehe bahuvidhāni tu |
teṣāṃ rūpāṇi vakṣyāmi cikitsāṃ ca yathākramam ||

6.6.3 doṣāṇāṃ sañcitānāṃ tutvaṅmāṃsācchāsracāriṇām |
pradūṣaṇaṃ hi sarveṣāṃ kuṣṭham ity abhidhīyate ||

6.6.4 viruddhamāhārayato+apyajīrṇādhyaśanena ca |
chardimūtrapurīṣāṇāṃ vegānāṃ ca vidhāraṇāt ||

6.6.5 grāmyānūpaudakaṃ māṃsaṃ śākaṃ haritakāni ca |
madyamamlamathātyarthaṃ sevitvā yaḥ pibetpayaḥ ||

6.6.6 bhuktvā vāpy uṣṇamāhāraṃ madhu māṃsaṃ ca sevate |
madyaṃ madhu ca yaḥ pītvāt yuṣṇamannaṃ ca sevate ||

6.6.7 vidagdhabhukto yaś cāpi grāmyadharma niṣevate |
uṣṇātapāmyāṃ sahasāyaś cāpy apsu nimajjati ||

6.6.8tasyoṣmā sanniruddhas tuprakopayati mārutam |
udīrayati vāyus tu dūṣito doṣasaṃcayān ||

6.6.9 doṣāśśirāḥ prapannāste rudhiraṃ dūṣayantyati |
raktamāṃsaniruddhās tu vātapittakaphāstrayaḥ ||

6.6.10 janayanty āśu kuṣṭhāni nṛṇāmaṣṭādaśaiva tu |
nidāneṣv api nirdiṣṭaṃ nidānaṃ sāptakuṣṭhikam ||

6.6.11 aṣṭādaśa tu kuṣṭhāni teṣāṃ vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam |
yatkuṣṭhamaruṇābhāsaṃ śyāmaṃ rūkṣaṃ savedanam ||

6.6.12 pipīlikākīrṇamiva karkaśaṃ cāpi vātikam |
kṣipramuttiṣṭhate yas tu dūṣyate paridahyate ||

6.6.13 tāmraṃ śyāvaprakupitaṃ sajvaraṃ cāpi paittikam |
samutpanneṣu vā teṣu stimitaṃ bahulaṃ guru ||

6.6.14 pāṇḍu snigdhaṃ ca guru ca yatkuṣṭhaṃ śleṣmasambhavam |
sphuṭitaṃsrāvabahulaṃ dāharāgarujānvitam ||

6.6.15 tvagromanakhamāṃsaiś ca dīryadbhis sānnipātikam |
prādurbhaviṣyatāṃ caiva pūrvarūpāṇi me śṛṇu ||

6.6.16 tāni saṃlakṣya medhāvī cikitsitamupācaret |
ūṣmāyaṇaṃ parītāpaḥ svedo raukṣyaṃ vivarṇatā ||

6.6.17 suptatvaṃ romaharṣaś ca gātrāṇāṃ gauravaṃ klamaḥ |
rāgaḥ pipāsā daurbalyaṃ davathuḥ piṭakādayaḥ ||

6.6.18tataḥ kuṣṭhāni jāyante teṣāṃ vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam |
svedanaṃ kākaṇābhāsaṃ samuptannaṃ savedanam ||

6.6.19 sphuṭitaṃ nīlaparyantaṃ kākaṇaṃ kuṣṭhamucyate |
udumbaranibhairyat tu maṇḍalairbahubhiścitam ||

6.6.20 nirāsrāvaiḥ sravadbhir vā vidyādaudumbaraṃ tu tat |
maṇḍalairbandhujīvābhair utsannaiś ca vidāhibhiḥ ||

6.6.21 vidyānmaṇḍalakuṣṭhaṃ tadvedanācoṣaṇānvitam |
rśyajihvopamaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ ṛśyajihvaṃ vibhāvayet ||

6.6.22 puṇḍarīkadalābhāsaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ tu tadviduḥ |
alābupuṣpasadṛśaṃ sidhmaṃ kuṣṭhamudāhṛtam ||

6.6.23 kapālakuṣṭhaṃ kṛṣṇantu maṇḍalaiḥ paruṣaṃ tathā |
carmakuṣṭhaṃ tu bahulaṃ hasticarmanibhaṃ kharam ||

6.6.24 sasphoṭakāsasantāpā pāmākaṇḍūrujānvitā |
dṛḍhaṃ punaḥ prasravati kaṇḍūrodhānvitaṃ ca yat ||

6.6.25 vartate ca samutpannaṃ kiṭibaṃ tatprakīrtitam |
śyāvā raktā samutpannā praklinnā srāviṇī tathā ||

6.6.26 māṃsenopacitā yuktā vijñeyā sā vicarcikā |
pariśuṣkāṇi rūkṣāṇi kaṇḍūrāṇi ghanāni ca ||

6.6.27 maṇḍalānyunnatāgrāṇi dudrukuṣṭhaṃ hi tatsmṛtam |
aruḍbhiścīyamānaṃ tu nīlalohitakaiḥ kharaiḥ ||

6.6.28 bahubhiś casravadbhiś ca śatāruṣkantu tadviduḥ |
śāliśūkapratīkāśairlomabhiḥ śuklalohitam ||

6.6.29 anyonyairmaṇḍalairviddhaṃśvitraṃ tadupapādayet |
mīnamūṣikakīṭānāṃ viṣavegena dūṣitam ||

6.6.30 sakaṇḍūrāgapiṭakaṃ viṣajaṃ śyāmam eva vā |
pāṇipādatalāṅguṣṭhapārṣṇideśeṣu jāyate ||

6.6.31 sphuṭitaṃ vedanādāhayuktaṃ vaipādikaṃ smṛtam |
udumbarasavarṇaṃ tu samutpannaṃ savedanam ||

6.6.32picchārāgavivarṇaṃ ca kuṣṭhaṃ sthūlāruruvyate |
visarpaissaṃparikrāntaṃ vikūṇaṃ saparisravam ||

6.6.33 tad ekakuṣṭham ity uktam ekaṃ vīsarpasambhavam |
etānyaṣṭādaśoktānikuṣṭhānīha svalakṣaṇaiḥ ||

6.6.34nava teṣāmasādhyāni cikitsyāni tathaiva ca |
puṇḍarīkamatha śvitraṃ ṛṣyajihvaṃsakākaṇam ||

6.6.35 udumbaraśatāruṣkaṃ carmakuṣṭhaṃ ca yatsmṛtam |
ekakuṣṭhaṃ tu yatproktaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ vaipādikaṃ ca yat ||

6.6.36 etāni nava kuṣṭhāni na sidhyanti kadācana |
sidhmaṃ vicarcikā pāmā dadruś ca kiṭikāni ca ||

6.6.37 kapālakuṣṭhaṃ sthūlārurmaṇḍalaṃ viṣajaṃ ca yat |
etāni nava sādhyāni kuṣṭhānyāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ ||

6.6.38 karmajāni nava hyeṣāṃ doṣajāninavaiva tu |
karmajāni na sidhyanti sidhyanti hītarāṇi tu ||

6.6.39 ātmavānmucyate tebhyaḥ kuśalenasvanuṣṭhitaḥ |
raktodbhavāni kuṣṭhāni sannipātodbhavāni ca ||

6.6.40 tasmāt teṣāṃ prathamataḥ sirākarma vidhīyate |
kuṣṭhasyātyalpato nyāyyaṃ bahuśaḥpracchanaṃ smṛtam ||

6.6.41 jalūkālābuśṛṅgair vā śoṇitaṃ tasya smṛtam |
śṛṇu raktavikārāṃs tu pṛthagdhātusamāśritān ||

6.6.42 saphenamaruṇaṃ rūkṣaṃ vātikaṃ śoṇitaṃ tanu |
nīlapītāsitaṃ taptaṃ raktaṃ pittānvitaṃ smṛtam ||

6.6.43 vijjalaṃ pāṇḍuraṃ snigdhaṃ tantumacca kaphātmakam |
sarveṣāṃ darśane vidyācchoṇitaṃ sānnipātikam ||

6.6.44 indragopakasaṅkāśamaduṣṭaṃ raktamucyate |
narasya muktaraktasya pratibhuktavatas tathā ||

6.6.45siddhairghṛtaiḥ snehitasya kuryāt saṃśodhanaṃ tataḥ |
vamanaṃ recanaṃ caiva tathā śīrṣavirecanam || āsthāpanaṃ ca kurvīta na cainamanuvāsayet ||

6.6.46 śālīna saṣṭaṣṭikāṃś caiva jāṅgalāṃś ca mṛgadvijān |
yavānnavikṛtīś caiva kuṣṭhī nityaṃ samācaret ||

6.6.47grāmyānūpaudakaṃ māṃsamikṣustilaghṛtaṃ surā |
dadhi dugdhaṃ divāsvapnaḥ phalānyamlāni miathunam ||

6.6.48 mūlakaṃ piṣṭavikṛtirvasā haritakāni ca |
kaphaṃ pittaṃ ca raktaṃ ca sarvametatprakopayet ||

6.6.49 evaṃvidhāni cānnānihyabhiṣyandakarāṇi ca |
ajīrṇādhyaśanaṃ caiva kuṣṭhī nityaṃ vivarjayet ||

6.6.50 dhānvantaraṃ pibetsarpiḥ svehanārhteṣu kuṣṭhitaḥ |
mahadvaipañcagavyaṃ vā tailaṃ śairīṣam eva vā ||

6.6.51 pippalīvardhamānaṃ vā mākṣikeṇa samācaret |
ariṣṭamabhayāriṣṭaṃ gaṇḍīrāriṣṭam eva vā ||

6.6.52 muṣṭiṃ khadirasārasya kuṭṭitaṃpratibhojayet |
tryahaṃśṛtaṃ pibettac ca snāyādudvartayet tataḥ ||

6.6.53 tena siddhaṃ cabhuñjīta pānīyārthaṃ ca kārayet |
pakṣaṃ māsamṛtuṃ vāpi ṣaṇmāsānevamācaret ||

6.6.54 prasadya khadiro hanti kuṣṭhāni sugurūṇy api |
saṃvṛddho lokaparyāye yugāntāgnirnagāniva ||

6.6.55pañcābhayās tu savyoṣāḥ saguḍā vāpi cūrṇitāḥ |
lihyāt pathyāśanaḥkuṣṭhaśāntirvā nacirādbhavet ||

6.6.56 gomūtreṇa haridrāṃ tu rasāñjanamathāpi vā |
prayogeṇa pibetkuṣṭhī tathā rogātpramucyate ||

6.6.57 drākṣā haridrā mañjiṣṭhā triphalā devadāru ca |
nāgaraṃ pañcamūlyau dve mustā madhurasā tathā ||

6.6.58 saptaparṇo hy apāmārgaḥ picumandāṭarūṣakau |
viḍaṅgaṃ citrakaṃ dantī pippalyo maricāni ca ||

6.6.59 teṣāṃ tu samabhāgānāṃ kuṣṭhī cūrṇapalaṃ pibet |
māsaṃ gomūtrasaṃyuktaṃ tathā kuṣṭhātpramucyate ||

6.6.60 uṣṭrīkṣīraṃ pibejjīrṇe kṣīravṛttirbhaven naraḥ |
jātakrimīṇi kuṣṭhāni cyutaromanakhāny api ||

6.6.61 api vā śīrṇamāṃsāni kṣīramauṣṭraṃvināśayet |
etās tv ābhyantarāḥ proktāḥ kriyāḥ kuṣṭhanibarhaṇāḥ ||

6.6.62 bāhyāṃ kriyāṃ pravakṣyāmi vistareṇa nibodha me |
ālepanāni kurvīta muktaraktasya dehinaḥ ||

6.6.63 vighṛṣya śastraiḥ patrair vā gomayair api vā punaḥ |
tataḥ kuṣṭhāni lepyāni pralepaiḥ kuṣṭhanāśanaiḥ ||

6.6.64 svarjakākuṣṭhatuthāni viḍaṅgamaricāni ca |
manaḥśilā ca lodhraṃ ca lepaḥ kuṣṭhavināśanaḥ ||

6.6.65 avalgujaphalaṃ dantīṃ śyonākaṃ gajapippalīm |
citrakau sarṣapau dvau tu haridre dve vipeṣayet ||

6.6.66 mātuluṅgarasainaitatsamāloḍya nikhānayet |
saptarātrātparaṃ caiva kuṣṭhānāṃ lepanaṃ param ||

6.6.67dadruṃ kapālakuṣṭāni kiṭikāni vicarcikām |
sthūlāruṣkāṇi viṣajaṃ sidhmāni ca niyacchati ||

6.6.68 karavīrolāṅgalikī dantī hiṃsrāśukānanā |
citrakārkastrikaṭukaṃ triphalā kaṭurohiṇī ||

6.6.69 kośātakī bhadramustā bṛhatī sarṣapā vacā |
karañjabījaṃ sudhā ca svarṇakṣīrī nidigdhikā ||

6.6.70 picumandaś ca jātyāhvaḥ pīlutilvakapallavam |
saudhāmalakabījāni karṇikārohyavalgujaḥ || Bhṣ6.6.? |
|bhallātakam |
|| saptamo ' dhyāyaḥ ||

6.7.1striyaṃ ca yuktyā seveta divāsvapnaṃ ca varjayet |
