kaṣāyasnānanity asya kaṣāyodakasevinaḥ ||

6.7.2 viśeṣataḥ śleṣmamehān tīkṣṇair eva samācaret |
sakaṣāyaṃ ca tiktaṃ ca paittikeṣu prayojayet ||

6.7.3 asādhyavātajānmehāṃścaturaḥ parivarjayet |
aruciś cāṅgamardaś ca tṛṣṇākāsau bhramastamaḥ ||

6.7.4 śūlāni piṭakā kaṇḍūḥ pramehāṇām upadravāḥ |
akriyābhiḥ prameheṣu piṭakāsv apikārayet ||

6.7.5 upadravaiś ca yuktānāṃ piṭakābhis tathaiva ca |
pramehiṇāmidaṃ proktaṃmayābhaiṣajyam uttamam ||

6.7.6 vyastairetaissamastaiś ca yogais tu pravibhāgaśaḥ |
cikitsāṃ kalpayed vaidyo yathādoṣaṃ yathābalam ||

6.7.7viṃśatermūtrarogāṇāṃ lakṣaṇāni nirīkṣya tu |
doṣasaṃsargahetūṃś ca tato yogān prakalpayet ||

6.7.8 uddeśamātraṃ teṣāṃ tu tasmād vakṣyāmi bheṣajam |
bhūyo mūtrapraśāntyarthaṃ pravibhāgaṃ ca tacchṛṇu ||

6.7.9 śatāvarīmūlarasaḥ samāṃśo madhusarpiṣā |
ikṣumehe tupātavyaḥ kaphapittapraśāntaye ||

6.7.10 kirātatiktasvarasaḥ paṭolārukayos tathā |
sakṣaudraḥ śamayenmehaṃ kvāthastūdakasaṃjñitam ||

6.7.11 pippalī śṛṅgiberaṃ ca maricāni tathaiva ca |
pibetsukhāmbunāhyetatsāndramehātpramucyate ||

6.7.12 cavyacitrakamūlāni pūtikasya tvacas tathā |
khale yūṣeṣu saṃskṛtya bhuñjāno vaisukhī bhavet ||

6.7.13 kṣīrasiddhairyavairbhakṣyairyacchastaṃ hiṅgusaṃyutam |
ghṛtaṃ prasaṅgena piban bhasmamehātpramucyate ||

6.7.14 kapitthaś cājamodā ca maricāni tathaiva ca |
tato yutaṃ tairlavaṇaṃ kācaproktaṃ pradāpayet ||

6.7.15 pippalīkaṇasaṃyuktaṃ madhuyuktaṃ saśarkaram |
jayellavaṇamehantu pītaṃ śītena vāriṇā ||

6.7.16mehayuktena bhoktavyaṃsāndraprasravaṇena vā |
etat tu vijayennityaṃ mehaṃ lavaṇasaṃbhavam ||

6.7.17 elāpravālakaṃ hiṅgu lavaṇaṃ ca samaṃ bhavet |
madyenoṣṇena vā pītaṃ mehaṃ sasikataṃ jayet ||

6.7.18 tumburūṇi kapitthānāṃ niryāsaṃ kṣaudrasaṃyutam |
śuklamehe praśaṃsantiyavānnasya ca sevanam ||

6.7.19 sakulutthāni yūṣāṇi sadravāṇi viśeṣataḥ |
bhojyāni śuklameheṣu yavānnavikṛtis tathā ||

6.7.20 śvadaṃṣṭrādarbhamūlais tu kevalaṃ kvathitaṃ payaḥ |
saśarkaraṃ pibejjantuḥ kṣāramehātpramucyate ||

6.7.21 drākṣāśṛtaṃvāpi pibet tathākṣīriśṛtaṃ naraḥ |
pittamehātpramucyeta kṣāramehāc ca sarvaśaḥ ||

6.7.22pītāmañjiṣṭhacūrṇau dvaumehanāc ca prayojayet |
sakṣaudraṃ śītamehe tu yavānnopahitaṃ sadā ||

6.7.23 madayanty āś ca patrāṇāṃ kalkaṃ kṣaudrayutaṃ pibet |
darbhamūlasya ca tathā raktamehī sukhī bhavet ||

6.7.24pibet tu tesapayasī nīlamehātpramucyate |
prarohaiḥ kṣīrivṛkṣāṇāṃ kṣīraṃ saṃkvathitaṃ pibet ||

6.7.25 saśarkareṇa mucyeta nīlamehāattu paittikāt |
kumudotpaladaṇḍaiś ca sanālaiḥ kvathitais tathā ||

6.7.26 pibetprāyo yathāśakti vārimehātpramucyate |
samāṃ kṣīrāśanaś cāpi yavānnamitabhojanaḥ ||

6.7.27 śarkarāsamabhāgaṃ tu kṣaudreṇa saha saṃsṛjet |
śītena toyena pibannambumehātpramucyate ||

6.7.28 ity etat ṣoḍaśānāṃ tu kaphapittaharaṃ pṛthak |
cikitsitaṃ mayā proktaṃpramehāṇāṃ vināśanam ||

6.7.29 asādhyāvātajāś caiva vijñeyā bhṛśadāruṇāḥ |
avagādyātisūkṣmatvād dāyā prasravaṇaṃ śṛtam(?) ||

6.7.30 āsthāpanair vātaharaiḥ sukṛtaiś cānuvāsanaiḥ |
majjapramehiṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā bahuśastamupācaret ||

6.7.31 prātaḥ prātaś ca seveta kevale madhusarpiṣī |
koradūṣayavānnāni sthitāni ca viśeṣataḥ ||

6.7.32 hastimehaṃjayed evaṃ vastisvedaiḥ prayatnataḥ |
yatnavānvātamehaṃ hibastamūtrāṇi vā caret ||

6.7.33 pāyayeccārayec cāpi gajamehaṃbhayāvaham |
kaṣāyaistiktakaṭukaiḥ rasairetaiḥ, pibetpayaḥ ||

6.7.34 śāstroktāmatha saṃprekṣya kriyāmetāṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ |
yathāsvaṃ hisampradhārya pramehān sādhayed bhiṣak ||

6.7.35 etatpramehikaṃ proktaṃ śiṣyāṇāmārthasiddhaye |
cikitsitaṃ vistareṇa yathāvadanupūrvaśaḥ || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele cikitsite saptamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || aṣṭamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāta unmādacikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

6.8.1 pañconmādās samākhyātā nidāneṣu savistarāḥ |
saliṅgāssasamucthānāḥ śṛṇu teṣāṃ cikitsitam ||

6.8.2cittabuddhīnriyāṇāṃ hi teṣām api viceṣṭitam |
śirastālvantaragataṃ sarvendriyaparaṃ manaḥ ||

6.8.3 tatrasthaṃ taddhi viṣayānindriyāṇāṃ rasādikān |
samīpasthān vijānāti trīn bhāvāṃś ca niyacchati ||

6.8.4sumanaḥprabhavaṃ cāpi sarvendriyamayaṃ balam |
kāraṇaṃ sarvabuddhīnāṃ cittaṃ hṛdayasaṃśritam ||

6.8.5 kriyāṇāṃ cetarāsāṃ ca cittaṃ sarvatra kāraṇam |
sucittāssatpathaṃ yānti duścittās tu vimārgagāḥ ||

6.8.6viditaṃ manasā cittamālabhya prabhavet tataḥ |
tato buddhiḥ prabhavati kāryākāryavicārikā ||

6.8.7 śubhāśubhaṃ hi kurvāṇā bodhanaṃ buddhiriṣyate |
bodhanāc cāpi bodhyasya naro budha ihocyate ||

6.8.8 sā buddhiḥ paramātmā ca sa śarīre prakīrtitaḥ |
yathā kṛtī karmakaraḥ kriyāṃ yojayate nṛṣu ||

6.8.9 manasaścittabuddhīnāṃ sthānāny etāni karma ca |
sandūṣitānāṃ teṣāṃ tu śṛṇu hetumataḥ param ||

6.8.10 ūrdhvaṃ prakupitā doṣāḥ śirastālvantare sthitāḥ |
manaḥ sandūṣayanty āśu tataścittaṃ vipadyate ||

6.8.11 citte vyāpadamāpanne buddhirnāśaṃ niyacchati |
tatas tu buddhivyāpattau kāryākāryaṃ na budhyate ||

6.8.12 evaṃ pravartate vyādhirunmādo nāma dāruṇaḥ |
tasmād viśeṣaṃ vakṣyāmi hyunmādamadayor api ||

6.8.13 śokātkopāttathā harṣād dravyāṇāṃ ca vināśanāt |
calite cittamanasi madamāśu niyacchati ||

6.8.14 pradhyāyati prasvipiti roditīhānimittataḥ |
hasatyakasmānnidrāluralpavāṅ nityam utsukaḥ ||

6.8.15 trastaḥ śarīrī krodhano nirapatrapaḥ |
purastādavalokī ca na yathāvṛtta eva ca ||

6.8.16 paruṣatvaṃ tathālomnāmāvilaṃ cakṣuṣorapi |
etāni yasya rūpāṇi sa mado nāma kīrtitaḥ ||

6.8.17 vivardhamānas tu mada unmādatvaṃ niyacchati |
savātikāni rūpāṇi śleṣmapittodbhavāni ca ||

6.8.18unmādastūcyate dhīraiḥ sannipātātmakāni ca |
etallakṣaṇamuddiṣṭamunmādasya niruktitaḥ ||

6.8.19 nidāne pūrvamuddiṣṭaṃ śṛṇu teṣāṃ cikitsitam |
snehitaṃ sveditaṃ caiva yojayetpañcakrmaṇā ||

6.8.20 dādhikaṃ vā pibetsarpistailaṃ śairīṣam eva vā |
śatapākaṃ balātailaṃ mahāpaiśācikaṃ ghṛtam ||

6.8.21 dādhikaṃ camahākṣāramunmattaḥ śīlayet tathā |
yac cikitsitam ākhyātam apasmāravināśanam ||

6.8.22 tad eva sarvaṃnikhileṣūnmādeṣv avacārayet |
ghātayet taṃkaśābhiś cavadhnīyāt tāḍayet tathā ||

6.8.23 gajenāpyathavāśvena trāsayetpannagena vā |
punastṛṇāgninā vāpi sarvatassamavākiret ||

6.8.24 avakīryāthavāṅgāraiḥ pradīptaiḥ pāribhadrakaiḥ |
prayuktaṃ śītalenaiva jalenābhyukṣayetpunaḥ ||

6.8.25 prasārayed vā sariti saraṇe vā nirodhayet |
bubhukṣayā śoṣayed vākūpe prakṣipya mānavaḥ ||

6.8.26 apūrvābhīṣayeyustaṃ puruṣāḥ śastrapāṇayaḥ |
vitrāsayeyurvaidyāstaṃ trāsanais tu pṛthagvidhaiḥ ||

6.8.27 trāsāstīvrā hi kurvanti cittasya vikṛtiṃ bhayāt |
bhayam eva tu cittasyamānavānarthamucyate ||

6.8.28 prakṣiptacitto vicaret trāsyamāno ' pi śastrataḥ |
kumārabṛndānugatastamasādhyaṃ vinirdiśet ||

6.8.29tāpanāñjananasyaiś ca kṣāraiḥ kṣārāgadair api |
proktairapasmāraharair unmādaṃ samupācaret ||

6.8.30 purāṇaṃ pāyayeccainaṃ sarpirunmādanāśanam |
sthitaṃ varṣaśataṃ śreṣṭhaṃ kumbhasarpistaducyate ||

6.8.31 pānābhyañjananasyeṣuhitamunmādināṃsadā |
kāñjikaṃ laśunaṃ caiva bastamūtreṇa peṣavet ||

6.8.32 unmādināṃ prayogo ' yaṃ purāṇaghṛtasaṃyutaḥ |
etāḥ kriyāḥ prayuñjīta vaidyaḥ kāyacikitsakaḥ ||

6.8.33śāntikarmāṇi homāṃś ca kuryād bhūtacikitsakaḥ |
iṣṭayaḥ śāntikarmaṇi homāḥ svastyayanāni ca |
vedoktāḥ karmavidhayaḥ kāryāśconmādanāśanāḥ || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele cikitsite aṣṭamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || navamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto ' pasmāracikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

6.9.1 uktaṃ rūpaṃsamutthānamapasmārasya kṛtsnaśaḥ |
nidāneṣu, cikitsāṃ tu vistareṇa nibodha me ||

6.9.2gajāśvayānātpatanādabhighātāt bhramād api |
iṣṭadravyavināśāc ca cittaṃ vibhramamṛcchati ||

6.9.3 tasyacitte paribhrānte hṛdayaṃ pariśuṣyati |
ruṇaddhi vāyurūṣmāṇaṃnāḍīṃ prāpya jalāvahām ||

6.9.4 bhṛśaṃ tṛṣṇāparītaḥ sa mohaṃ gacchatyapasmaran |
apasmaratyapasmārī phenaṃ muñcati vepate ||

6.9.5 seveta tailaṃ śairīṣaṃ ghṛtaṃ kalyāṇakaṃ tathā |
mahāpaiśācikaṃ vāpi mahākṣāraṃ ca dādhikam ||

6.9.6 śaṇabījāni kaiḍaryaṃ |.. |.. cāpalūnakam |
rūpasthā ca vayasthā capūtanā keśamāriṇī ||

6.9.7 triphalā tryūṣaṇaṃ mustā laśunaṃ pāpacelikā |
etāni samabhāgāni vasātailaghṛtāni ca ||

6.9.8 ūrṇakaṃ catathaikadhyaṃ paced gomūtrasaṃyutam |
yadā prajvalitaṃ śāntamathainamavatārayet ||

6.9.9 biḍālapadamātraṃ tukṣārasyāsya sukhāmbunā |
pibed apasmāraharam unmādasya ca nāśanam |
arśāṃsi gulmānmehāṃś caplīhānamudarāmayam ||
|| daśamo ' dhyāyaḥ ||

6.10.0
bhayād vā yadi śokād vā yo ' tisāraḥ pravartate |

6.10.1 atisāras tu bhūyiṣṭhaṃsāma eva sa saṃbhavet |
tasmāt sarvamatīsāraṃ laṅghanaissamupācaret ||

6.10.2laṅghayed balavantaṃ ca, dīpanīyāni kārayet |
durbalasya tusaṃsargīṃ kārayet tu viriktavat ||

6.10.3 stimitaṃ yasya guru ca paryādhmātamivodaram |
dīpanīyopapapannaṃ tu bahudoṣaṃ tu dehinam ||

6.10.4 stokaṃ stokaṃ sraṃsamānaṃ nigṛhītaṃ savedanam |
dīpanīyasamāyuktaṃ pāyayetsraṃsanaṃ param ||

6.10.5viśuddhasrotasas tasya doṣeṣu sraṃsiteṣu ca |
sukhaṃ tadgrahaṇaṃ kartuṃ pācanaṃ stambha eva ca ||

6.10.6 harītakīṃ trikaṭukaṃ hiṅgu sauvarcalaṃ vacām |
śuklāmativiṣāṃ caiva pāyayed uṣṇavāriṇā ||

6.10.7niyataṃ janitādhmānamatisāraṃ savedanam |
sthāpayatyatisaṃvṛddhaṃveleva varuṇālayam ||

6.10.8 harītakī sātiviṣā hiṅgu sauvarcalaṃ vacā |
saindhavaṃ cetipiṣṭāni pāyayed uṣṇavāriṇā ||

6.10.9 āmātisāre yogo ' yaṃ vidhitas tu cikitsakaiḥ |
yukte kvāthe prayoktavyo baidyenāpi yaśo ' rthinā ||

6.10.10 āmātisāro yohyābhyāṃ yogābhyāṃ na nivartate |
na sasādhayituṃ śakyohyanyairmārgaśatair api ||

6.10.11 bhūyiṣṭhamāmaprabhavaḥ kukṣirogaḥkaphātmakaḥ |
pravartate nṛṇāṃ tasya śṛṇu samyak cikitsitam ||

6.10.12 citrakaḥ pippalīmūlaṃ vacā kaṭukarohiṇī |
pāṭhā vatsakabījāni harītakyo mahauṣadham ||

6.10.13 etadāmasamutthānamatisāraṃ savedanam |
kaphātmakaṃ sapittaṃ ca varco badhnāti ca dhruvam ||

6.10.14 pāṭhā vacā trikaṭukaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ kaṭukarohiṇī |
tatsādhupītāny etāniśleṣmātīsāranāśanam ||

6.10.15 bhallātakaṃ śakrayavāḥ pāṭhā kaṭukarohiṇī |
yavānyajājīkuṣṭhaṃ ca citrako ' tiviṣā ||

6.10.16śaṭī puṣkaramūlaṃ ca tathā hiṅgu harītakī |
sauvarcalaṃ śṛṅgaberaṃ gavāṃ mūtreṇa peṣayet ||

6.10.17 vaṭakānakṣamātrāṃstānchāyāśuṣkānnidhāpayet |
teṣāmekaṃ pibed dvau vā sukhoṣṇenaiva vāriṇā ||

6.10.18etaddhyāmasamutthānamatisāraṃ savedanam |
nudatyarśāṃsi ca tathā tamāṃsīva divākaraḥ ||

6.10.19 grahaṇīdīpanīyāś ca ye yogāḥ parikīrtitāḥ |
śleṣmātisāre te kāryāḥkṣāraḥ kṣāraguḍas tathā ||

6.10.20 etadāmātisārāṇāṃ śleṣmātīsāriṇām api |
cikitsitaṃ samākhyātaṃ pittātīsāriṇāṃ śṛṇu ||

6.10.21 atisāras tu yaḥ pittāduttho ' tisaratīha saḥ |
pācitaṃ stambhayed enaṃ yathāvattannibodha me ||

6.10.22 biḍaṃ bilvaśalāṭūni tintriṇīkaṃ sadāḍimam |
sauvarcalaṃ dhātakī ca samaṅgā ceti tatsamam ||

6.10.23 kalkapiṣṭaṃ bhavetpeyaṃ kālyamuṣṇena vāriṇā |
pittātīsāraśūlārtaṃ naraṃ sadyaścikitsate ||

6.10.24 rasāñjanaṃ sātiviṣaṃ kuṭajasya phalaṃ tvacam |
dhātakīṃ śṛṅgaberaṃ ca pāyayet taṇḍulāmbunā ||

6.10.25mākṣīkayukto nudati pittātīsāramulbaṇam |
mandaṃ dīpayate cāgniṃ śūlaṃ cāśu nivartayet ||

6.10.26pāṭhā dāruharidrāca pippalīmūlam eva ca |
phalatvace vatsakasya śṛṅgaberaṃ tathaiva ca ||

6.10.27 etāni kalkapeṣyāṇi pāyayet taṇḍulāmbunā |
ambaṣṭhakīśilodbhedaṃ dhātakī cāmlavetasam ||

6.10.28uśīraṃ bālahrīberaṃ dāḍimatvaṅ mahauṣadham |
jambūphalaṃ kapitthasya madhyaṃ bilvaśalāṭu ca ||

6.10.29 etāni caiva tulyāni pāyayet taṇḍulāmbunā |
mākṣīkayuktaṃ nudati pittātīsāralakṣaṇam ||

6.10.30 savātāṃ ca samūlāṃ ca nāśayetparikartikām |
samaṅgā niculaṃ lodhraṃ dhātakī madhukaṃ tathā ||

6.10.31 vaṭalodhrapravālāś cadāḍimasya phalaṃ tvacam |
māṣaparṇīśilodbhedaṃ sāmbaṣṭhākamathāpi ca ||

6.10.32pittātisāre dātavyaṃ taṇḍulodakasaṃyutam |
samaṅgā dhātakīpuṣpaṃ sāmbaṣṭhākamathāpi ca ||

6.10.33 pittātisāre padmaṃ ca taṇḍulādbhiḥ piben naraḥ |
śaśasyaiṇasya vā raktaṃ madhukaṃ kṛṣṇamṛttikā ||

6.10.34 pittātisāre dātavyaṃ taṇḍulodakasaṃyutam |
duṣṭaḥ pittātisārastu gambhīrasthānamāśritaḥ ||

6.10.35 atīva sāryate raktamatisārassa raktajaḥ |
nīlotpalaṃ bilvatilā madhukaṃ guḍaśarkarā ||

6.10.36 kesaraṃ puṇḍarīkasya kumudaṃ kṣaudram eva ca |
ājena payasāpītaṃ raktātīsāranāśanam || nirvāhi |.. |.. |.. |..

6.10.37 athāsyavarcojananīmanuyuktiṃ pradāpayet |
dīptāgnikṣīṇamāṃsasya saśūlasyātisāriṇaḥ ||

6.10.38 ajasya mahatomadhyādveśavāraṃsaśoṇitam |
dadhnātha yāvake siddhaṃ guḍatrikaṭukānvitam ||

6.10.39 tena saṃbhojayet kāle mṛdususvinnadehinam |
kalpenaitena vārāhaṃkrauñcaṃ māṃsañ ca kārayet ||

6.10.40 etenaiva ca kalpena kārayeccaraṇāyudhān |
tittirīn kacchapān lābhānmayūrānkrakarānapi ||

6.10.41 vātātisāriṇāmetatsamākhyātaṃ cikitsitam |
vātātisāre kartavyaṃ sarvamarśaścikitsitam ||

6.10.42 bhayādvā yadi vā śokādyo ' tisāraḥ pravartate |
yaḥ kupyati tato doṣas tasya kuryāc cikitsitam ||

6.10.43 nityam āśvāsayeyustaṃ suhṛdaś ca vipaścitaḥ |
manaḥ prahṛṣṭaṃ kuryāc ca, tadā sampadyate sukhī ||

6.10.44 sarvagātraparistabdho vivarṇaḥ stimitaś ca yaḥ |
na ca duḥkhaṃ vijānīte parivarjyastathāvidhaḥ ||

6.10.45 yasya keśāḥ pralupyante balaṃ varṇaś ca hīyate |
pariśuṣkamukho yaś ca na sa jīvati taddhidhaḥ ||

6.10.46viveṣṭamānoyaśśete sarvagātrāṇi vikṣipet |
stabdhagātro nasaṃcārī parivarjyastathāvidhaḥ ||

6.10.47 hanuṃdaśati yo ' bhīkṣṇaṃ na vedayati yo ' sukham |
jihvāṃ khādati cātyarthaṃ gatāyuriti nirdiśet ||

6.10.48 saṃrakṣanvai yaśaḥ prājño na cainaṃ samupācaret |
arthaghnaṃ ca yaśoghnaṃ ca na karma samupācaret ||

6.10.49 dṛṣṭvā sādhyamasādhyaṃ ca yaḥ karoti sa sidhyati |
pūjāṃ ca labhate ' tyarthaṃ vidvatsu ca virājate ||

6.10.50 viṣūcyās tu pravakṣyāmi cikitsāṃ lakṣaṇāni ca |
viruddhagurupiṣṭānnaśākarūkṣarasāśinām ||

6.10.51 ajīrṇabhojināṃ nityaṃ trayaḥ kupyanti dhātavaḥ |
taddoṣabalamudbhūtamārutenavivardhitam ||

6.10.52 adhaścordhvaṃ ca tiryak ca srotāṃsi niruṇaddhyati |
ruddhaiś ca mārute ruddhasrotāṃsi niruṇaddhi ca (?) ||

6.10.53 teṣudoṣaparīteṣu duṣṭenānnarasena ca |
ūrdhvaṃ cādhaś cavego ' sya kathaṃcitsaṃpravartate ||

6.10.54tāṃ vilambīṃ vigarhanti viṣakalpāṃ viṣūcikām |
yathāyathotpannaraso deheṣu viṣamāśritaḥ ||

6.10.55 nāḍīssavyākulīkṛtya vardhayet tu balāsakam |
tasya kāso jvaro mūrchā bhaktadveṣo vivarṇatā |

6.10.56 glāniścaivāvipākaś ca śleṣmasekaḥpravāhikā |
uroghātastathātyarthaṃhṛdrogaś cāntrakūjanam ||

6.10.57vibandho gātrahāniś ca so ' laso nāma dāruṇaḥ |
utkleśo vepathuśchardirvidāho veṣṭanaṃ jvaraḥ ||

6.10.58 śvāsādhmānaṃ śakṛdbhedo vidviṣṭāhāralakṣaṇam |
śleṣmapracurakāsaś ca jṛmbhaṇaṃ hṛdayagrahaḥ ||

6.10.59 tathā śvāsaś ca kāsaś ca pārśvaśīrṣarujānvitaḥ |
viṣūcyāḥpūrvarūpāṇi svedo gātrasyaśītatā ||

6.10.60 udgāro gurukoṣṭhatvaṃ mūtrānilaśakṛdgrahaḥ |
etatpañcavidhaṃ proktamannavibhramalakṣaṇam ||

6.10.61 cikitsāṃ tatra kurvīta sarvāmāmātisāriṇām |
upadravāś ca ye proktāḥ viṣūcyāmalasetathā ||

6.10.62tāṃścikitsed bhiṣak samyagyathāsvaiś ca cikitsitaiḥ |
etadviṣūcyāmākhyātaṃ samāsena cikitsitam ||

6.10.63 kūratvād asya rogasya bhūyo vakṣyāmi vistaram |
viṣūcyāḥ pūrvarūpāṇisaṃniśamya cikitsakaḥ ||

6.10.64 vamanaṃ kārayetkṣipramuṣṇena lavaṇāmbunā |
yāvatsa tiṣṭhettasyasyānnānyaduddhāraṇātsukham ||

6.10.65 kārakaṃ ca kaṣāyaṃ syādathavārjunasādhitam |
pītaṃ kaṣāyaṃ vamanaṃ sadyo hanti viṣūcikām ||

6.10.66 tathā mustādikaḥ kalkaḥ pippalīkalkasaṃyutaḥ |
pītaścoṣṇena toyena hanyāt kṣipraṃ viṣūcikām ||

6.10.67 viruddhā hi rasā bhuktā dūṣitāḥ pavanādibhiḥ |
viṣībhavanti deheṣupūrvavṛddhairmalāśaye ||

6.10.68 tasmād viṣasamā hyāśu kriyāssarvāḥ prayojayet |
dhūmānkaṣāyānvartīś ca pradehotsādanāni ca ||

6.10.69 avapīḍān pradhamanamagnikarmopanāhanam |
saṃsparśānyupacārāṃś ca viṣūcyāṃ kārayetkriyām ||

6.10.70 bhallātakaṃ trikaṭukaṃ pūtikaṃ kṣavakaṃ balām |
phaṇijjaṃ laśunaṃ kuṣṭhaṃkarañjasya phalāni ca ||

6.10.71 triphalāṃ ca yavānīṃ ca kuṭajasya phalāni ca |
vartimetāṃ śivāṃ nāma bastamūtreṇa peṣayet || viṣūcalākṣākṣāraś ca jāyate(?) | | | | | | | | | (Bhṣ6.10.2.1) |
hanubhyāṃ nigṛhītābhyāmavyaktaṃ vyāharaty api |
susaṃhatahanurvāpi na vyāharati kiṃcana || (Bhṣ6.10.2.2.) |
snehapānāni nasyaṃ ca svedāḥpathyāśanāni ca |
upanāhāś ca śasyante vastayaś cārdite hitāḥ || (Bhṣ6.10.2.3) |
dadhyāranālayor droṇe vasā lābhena cāḍhake |
ānūpaudakanity ānāṃ māṃsāny api ca lābhataḥ || (Bhṣ6.10.2.4) |
tilān kulutthānmāṣāṃś ca badarāṇi yavān balām |
dve pañcamūlyau rāsnāṃ caśatamūlāṃ śatāvarīm || (Bhṣ6.10.2.5) |
etat sarvaṃ samāhṛtya sādhayenmṛdunāgninā |
bāṣpeṇoccaratā tenanāḍīsvedena svedayet || (Bhṣ6.10.2.6) |
tailamebhiś ca vipacedabhyañjyāc ca pibec ca tat |
etam eva ca sambhāram upanāhaṃ ca kārayet |
|
(Bhṣ6.10.2.7) |
yac cikitsitam ākhyātaṃ vātavyādhivināśanam |
tad eva sarvaṃ nikhilam arditeṣv api kārayet || (Bhṣ6.10.2.8) |
mahāsnehaṃ balātailaṃ tailaṃ śairīṣam eva vā |
pānābhyaṅgeṣu nasyeṣu vastau vāpi prayojayet || (Bhṣ6.10.2.9) |
ānūpāni ca māṃsāni veśavāraṃ prakuṭṭayet |
nātisnigdhena tenāsya kārayed upanāhanam || (Bhṣ6.10.2.10) |
śleṣmaṇā samupastabdho yasyeha pavano bhavet |
manyayor nmūrdhni gaṇḍe ca śoṣastasyopajāyate || (Bhṣ6.10.2.11) |
mūko nidrāparītaś ca kaṇṭhaniśvasito bhṛśam |
bhṛśaṃ lālāparītaś cajihmajihvīkṛto naraḥ || (Bhṣ6.10.2.12) |
śleṣmopaṣṭabdhametādṛgarditaṃ parikīrtitam |
tasyānuvāsanaṃ kuryāt tathā śīrṣavirecanam || (Bhṣ6.10.2.13) |
tilvakena virektavyo bhavedbindughṛtena vā |
purāṇaṃ vā pibetsarpirdhūmaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ pibettathā || (Bhṣ6.10.2.14) |
śleṣmaṇyuparate tasya bṛṃhaṇaiḥ samupakramaḥ |
vātavyādhicikitsāṃ ca yathoktāṃ samupācaret || (Bhṣ6.10.2.15) |
sthānasthas tatra ca kaphaḥ vāyurāgantur ucyate |
tasmāt tayor gatiṃ dṛṣṭvā vātaghnīṃ kārayetkriyām || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele ṣaḍviṃśo?? ' dhyāyaḥ || || ekādaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto grahaṇīcikitsāṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

6.11.1 agnirvā++āyurmanuṣyāṇāṃ prāṇās tatra pratiṣṭhitāḥ |
balamārogyamāyuś ca sukhaduḥkhaṃ tadāśrayam ||

6.11.2 mriyate hy upaśānte ' gnau yukte coṣmaṇijīvati |
tasmāt prāṇāyuṣī vidyādagnimūle śarīriṇām ||

6.11.3 so ' gnissamucitaṃ bhuktaṃ rasāya vitanotyadhaḥ |
tenendriyabalaṃ puṣṭiṃ varṇañ ca labhate naraḥ ||

6.11.4 caturvidhaṃ pacatyagniḥ samaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ tathā mṛdu |
viṣamaṃ ceti teṣāṃ tu yaḥ samo ' gniḥ sa śasyate ||

6.11.5 bhajatāṃ guru rūkṣaṃ ca divāsvapnaṃ ca nity aśaḥ |
rātrauna vā saṃsvapatāṃ tathā vegavidhāriṇām ||

6.11.6 adhyaśnatāmajīrṇe ' nne hy atisnehevirekiṇām |
jvarānmadyaprasaṅgāc ca tathā ' sātmyaniṣevaṇāt ||

6.11.7 madhurakṣīranity ānāṃ tathā jalavihāriṇām |
piṣṭānnadadhiśākānāmahṛdyānāṃ niṣevaṇāt ||

6.11.8 īdṛśairgrahaṇī jantordūṣyate ' ti niṣevitaiḥ |
mandātīkṣṇātiviṣamā trividhaṃ sā prakupyati ||

6.11.9 tathā rogāḥ pravartante grahaṇīdoṣajā nṛṇām |
jvaraḥ kāsaḥ pāṇḍurogaḥ śvayathuḥparikartikā ||

6.11.10 aruciś cāvipākaś ca gulmārśāṃsi bhagandaram |
atisāraś ca kuṣṭhaṃ ca śūlānyalasako bhramaḥ ||

6.11.11 etāṃś cānyāṃś ca janayed rogānasyāmitāśinaḥ |
grahaṇī dūṣitā jantoḥ sāmā rogānnihanti vā ||

6.11.12 yasyākrānte hi kāyāgnau śleṣmaṇā madhurāśinaḥ |
na pacyate ' nnaṃ kālena sa mandāgniriti smṛtaḥ ||

6.11.13 agnau mande kaphenāsya śīghraṃ bhuktaṃ na pacyate |
sa bhūyo mṛdutāṃ yāti gurubhojanadūṣitaḥ ||

6.11.14 evaṃrūpaś ca vṛddhaś ca kaphe tasyapraśāmyati |
evaṃ sa viṣamo nāma grahaṇīdoṣa ucyate ||

6.11.15 agnissomakṣayādyasya bhṛśaṃ dehe prakupyati |
bhuktaṃ bhuktaṃ jarayate na ca varṇabalāya ca ||

6.11.16 bhukte bhukte kṣudhāpyasya jāyate na ca puṣyati |
atyagniriti taṃ vidyāt sa ca duḥkhatamaḥ smṛtaḥ ||

6.11.17 ity eṣa rogastrividhaḥ grahaṇīsaṃśrito mayā |
proktas tasya cikitsāṃ tu vistareṇa nibodha me ||

6.11.18 dhānvantaraṃ pibetsarpiḥ prājāpatyamathāpi vā |
tato ' smai vamanaṃ dadyāt tataś cordhvaṃ virecanam ||

6.11.19 pippalīvardhamānaṃ vāpibetkṣārāgadānapi |
takraṃ māsaṃ pibec cāpi gaṇḍīrāriṣṭam eva vā ||

6.11.20 dādhikaṃca pibetsarpistailaṃ śairīṣam eva vā |
mahadyatpañcagavyaṃ vā | | | | | | || | | | | | | | | | | | | || dvādaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | |

6.12.1tālapatrīkaṣāyaṃ tu mūtrāghāteṣu dāpayet |
bhojanaṃ krauñcamāṃsena mūtrāghāteṣu śasyate ||

6.12.2 piṣṭvā tu tasya caivāsthi kṣīreṇa saha pāyayet |
mūtrakṛcchrāṇi śamayed aśmarīṃ ca bhinatty api ||

6.12.3 ebhir yadi prayogais tu śarkarā nopaśāmyati |
tāmuddharecchalyahartā dṛṣṭakarmā bahuśrutaḥ ||

6.12.4 pratīghātādindriyasya yasya kṛcchraṃ pravartate |
anusannaṃ ca śūlaṃ ca śṛṇu tasya cikitsitam ||

6.12.5 balātailena svabhyaktamuṣṇāmbupariṣecitam |
āsthāpayetpācanena mustādyena tu vastinā ||

6.12.6pratyāgate nirūhe taṃ bhojayet siddhamodanam |
tanunā mudgayūṣeṇa jāṅgalena rasena vā ||

6.12.7 tatas tu śuddhāmbarayā nāryā snātānuliptayā |
iṣṭayā saṃviśetsārdhaṃ kalyāṇaguṇayuktayā ||

6.12.8 viśuddhe retaso mārge mārutaḥ praguṇī bhavet |
svaṃ sthānaṃ mārute prāpte kṛcchraṃ tasya nivartate ||

6.12.9 aṣṭānāṃ mūtrakṛcchrāṇāmetaduktaṃ cikitsitam |
rūpāṇi caiva sarveṣāṃ śiṣyāṇāmarthasiddhaye || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bheledvādaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || || trayodaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāta udaracikitsāṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

6.13.1 bhārābhihatadehasya kaṭutiktopasevinaḥ |
vāyussarvaśarīrastho duṣṭo vātahatāḥ sirāḥ ||

6.13.2 gatvā hi pūrayetkoṣṭhaṃ tathādhmānaṃ karoti ca |
dṛtivac ca samunnaddhamudaraṃ syāt samantataḥ ||

6.13.3kṛṣṇarājivanaddhaṃ ca kṛṣṇaromācitaṃ tathā |
etadvātodaraṃ vidyādetairliṅgaissamanvitam ||

6.13.4 uṣṇābhitapto yo janturvidāhīnyupasevate |
vyāyāmoparataś caivaklānto yaścodakaṃ pibet ||

6.13.5 tasya dehe kapho duṣṭaḥ sirāḥ kaphavahā gataḥ |
utsanno dūṣitaś cāpi koṣṭhamabhyantarāśritaḥ ||

6.13.6 sarvamādhmāpayetkoṣṭhaṃ vedanāṃ ca karoti saḥ |
śuklarājivanaddhaṃ ca śuklaromācitaṃ tathā ||

6.13.7 tasya sīdanti gātrāṇi mukhasrāvaśca jāyate |
durgandhitāsyamālasyaṃ sakaphodarilakṣaṇam ||

6.13.8 samaśnataḥ sarvarasān mithyāhāravihāriṇaḥ |
tasyānyārdhamivātyarthamudaraṃ saṃprakāśate ||

6.13.9 nānārājivanaddhaṃ ca nānāromācitaṃ tathā |
tathā nānāvedanāḍyamudaraṃ sānnipātikam ||

6.13.10 āmanantyudaraṃ nāryogaramātmodbhavaṃ yadā |
karṇarodhakṛtaṃ cāpi śuklaṃ jihvāmalaṃ nakham ||

6.13.11 manuṣyamedoromāṇi strīṇāmārtavaśoṇitam |
purīṣaṃ ca prayacchantibhakta duṣṭodaraṃ bhavet ||

6.13.12 sarvavarṇasirānaddhaṃ nīlapītaprabhaṃ tathā |
nṛṇāṃ dūṣyodaraṃ nāma jāyate sānnipātikam ||

6.13.13 tasyāṅgamardaḥ kāsaś ca śvāso hikkā ca jāyate |
nidrā tandrā tathālasyaṃ dāhaś cāṅgagato bhavet ||

6.13.14 sadanaṃ sarvagātrāṇāṃ śoṣaṇaṃ pāṇḍuvarṇatā |
viṣapīte ca yalliṅgaṃ tac ca tasyopajāyate ||

6.13.15 evaṃ dūṣyodaraṃ tvetairliṅgairmaraṇamṛcchati |
abhuktvā yaḥ pibennityam udakaṃ prātarutthitaḥ ||

6.13.16 varṣāhemantakāleṣu pibedyaścodakaṃ bahu |
tasyodare ' dhikā pīḍā cānyataḥ samprapadyate ||

6.13.17 sadanaṃ romaharṣaś ca śītāgnitvaṃ śirograhaḥ |
tathā snigdhāvabhāsañ ca snigdharomācitaṃ ca yat ||

6.13.18 etairliṅgaissamastais tu nṛṇāṃ tadudakodaram |
śaṅkunā snāyubhedena matsyānāṃ vātha kaṇṭakaiḥ ||

6.13.19 śakṛttṛṇāgrair vābhuktairantraṃ yasya vibhidyate |
tenānnapānaṃ chidreṇa sravettasyāntarodare ||

6.13.20 unnataṃ jāyate tasmād udaraṃ syāt samantataḥ |
sirā++āyatā jāyate catvardhe jaṭharasannidhau ||

6.13.21 saṃsrāviṇi ca jaṭhare lakṣaṇaṃ parikīrtitam |
yaḥ plavellaṅghayed vāpiyaś ca vyāyacchate naraḥ ||

6.13.22tenāsyāntrāṇi tudyantebadhyante cāpy athaikataḥ |
tathā muñjaiś ca bālaiś ca bhuktairantraṃ niveṣṭyate ||

6.13.23 tena baddhaṃ gudaṃ nṝṇāṃ jāyate ' ntranipīḍanāt |
utkṣiptakukṣir bhavati tathā saṃkṣiptamehanaḥ ||

6.13.24 śūnākṣaḥ śūnavṛṣaṇaḥ śūnahastas tathaiva ca |
śūnapādagudaś caiva suptāṅgaś cāpi jāyate ||

6.13.25natonnataḥ samaś cāpi naro baddhodarī bhavet |
āmadhānyayavān yas tu naro bhuṅkte niṣevate ||

6.13.26 sakesaraṃ phalaṃ vāpi bhakṣayitvodakaṃ pibet |
hastyaśvarathayānaṃ ca bhuktamātre niṣevate ||

6.13.27mahauṣadhaṃ samaricaṃ dvau kṣārau triphalā vacā |
yavānī kuñcikā hiṅgu tintriṇīkāmlavetasau ||

6.13.28 dhānyājagandhe trāyantī dāḍimaṃ sayavāsakam |
kaṭukā kauṭajaṃ bījaṃ saindhavaṃ ca samān bhiṣak ||

6.13.29 trivṛtā saptalā dantī kampillaṃ nīlikā ' bhayā |
suvarṇakṣīrī dviguṇaṃ sarvāṇy etāni cūrṇayet ||

6.13.30 āje gavye ' thavā mūtre saptāhaṃ paribhāvya tam |
dviguṇaṃ śarkarāṃ cātra dāpayet tryaṅgulaṃ pibet ||

6.13.31 gomūtratriphalākṣārarasairmadyaiḥ sukhāmbunā |
suvarṇasamakaṃ cūrṇaṃ sarvarogārtibheṣajam ||

6.13.32 sarvodaraplīhaśoṣagulmahṛdroganāśnam |
vātāṣṭhīlāmathānāhaṃ śvayathuṃ sarvagātrajam ||

6.13.33 halīmakāmilāpāṇḍupramehān sajvarān jayet |
jīvite saṃśayaṃ kṛtvāgaralaṃ jaṭharī pibet ||

6.13.34 trapusorvārukaṃvāpi mūlakaṃvāpi daṃśayet |
kruddhena kṛṣṇasarpeṇa jaṭharī tāni bhakṣayet ||

6.13.35kukṣiṃ vipāṭya mānena chidramantrasya vīkṣya ca |
tataḥ pipīlikādaṃśaṃchidre tvantrsaya dāpayet ||

6.13.36 antracchidre saṃgṛhītesīvyetkukṣiṃ tato bhiṣak |
evaṃ chidrodaraṃ vaidyaḥ śalyakarturupācaret ||

6.13.37 tathā baddhagudaṃ caiva pāṭayecchalyaśāstravit |
muñjānvālāṃstathoddhṛtya baddhaṃ sīvyettato bhiṣak ||

6.13.38dakavanti hi sarvāṇi jaṭharāṇyakriyāvatām |
vyathanaṃ teṣu kurvīta śalyakartuḥ prayogavit ||

6.13.39 vāme pārśvetvadhaḥ kukṣermuktvā ca caturaṅgulam |
nābhyāṃ vā praṇayecchastraṃ mātrāyuktaṃ cikitsakaḥ ||

6.13.40 visrāvayecca jaṭharaṃ bhiṣagāmayapīḍitam |
mardayed udaraṃ cāsya veṣṭanena tu veṣṭayet ||

6.13.41 veṣṭitaṃ jaṭharaṃ cāsya nādhmāpayati mārutaḥ |
pibedyavāgūṃ ca tato lavaṇasnehavarjitām ||

6.13.42 tataḥ paraṃ tu kṣīreṇa māsārdhaṃ samupācaret |
tataḥ kṣīrayavāgūṃ ca, trīnmāsāṃs tu yavānbhiṣak ||

6.13.43 bhuñjītālavaṇaṃ tasmāt trīnmāsān laghu bhojanam |
tataḥ salavaṇaṃ bhojyamucyate tūdare ' pi ca ||

6.13.44 ketūdarāṇāmicchanti lavaṇaṃ yogavāhataḥ |
kecit tu jaṭhare prāhuragnikarma cikitsakāḥ ||

6.13.45 ajātatoye jaṭharepavanaśleṣmasambhave |
plīhodaraṃ hinastyagniḥ jayet tasmād viśeṣataḥ ||

6.13.46 nivṛttirvarṇitā, tatra salilodarakhedinaḥ |
|.. |.. yāvatpeyā prakodaram(?) ||

6.13.47 maṇḍalaṃ nirmitaṃ yac caśvayathuḥ sparśane mṛduḥ |
ākoṭitamaśabdaṃ ca na carājisamākulam ||

6.13.48 ākramyamāṇaṃ nābhyāntu mṛdureva hisarpati |
tataś ca salilodbhūtiṃ picchanaiś ca vinirdiśet |
kriyāyatīś ca sarvāṇi sakriyāpiś ca dehinām(?) ||

6.13.49 bhallātakānāṃ pavanāhatānāṃ vṛntacyutānām iha cāṭhakaṃ syāt |
tadiṣṭakācūrṇakaṇairvighṛṣya prakṣālayitvā visṛjetpravāte ||

6.13.50 śuṣkaṃ punastadvidalīkṛtaṃ ca vinikṣipedapsu caturguṇāsu |
pādāvaśiṣṭaṃ paripūtaśītaṃ kṣīreṇa tulyena punaḥ paceta ||

6.13.51 tadardhayā śarkarayāvagāḍhaṃ lohābhayāvyoṣakacūrṇayuktam |
etatsamaṃ śarkarapādayuktaṃtataḥ khajenonmathitaṃ nidhāya ||

6.13.52 prasthadvayenāmalakīmadhūnāṃśīte ' tha dhānyena punaḥ paceta |
tatsaptarātrādupajātavīryaṃ sudhārasādapyadhikatvameti ||

6.13.53prātarviśuddhīkṛtadehabhājāṃ mātrāṃ dadītātmaśarīrayogyām |
na cānnapāne parihāryamasti na coṣṇavātādhvani maithune ca ||

6.13.54 janturnitāntaṃ narasiṃhavatsyād bhaven naraḥ kāñcanarāśisāraḥ |
dantāś ca śīrṇāḥ punarudbhavanti keśāś ca śuklāḥ punareva kṛṣṇāḥ ||

6.13.55 viśīrṇakarṇāṅgulināsiko ' pikṛtāntadantāntagato ' pi kuṣṭhī |
so ' pi krameṇāṅguligātraśākhastaruryathā rohati vārisiktaḥ || Bhṣ6.13.? |
mahāmayūrāñjayati svareṇa balena nāgāṃsturagāñjavena |
smṛmatibalamasatya(?) |.. |.. |.. |.. |... || || caturdaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |..

6.14.1 vaṃśako naktamālaś ca mūrvā kaṭukarohiṇī |
tarkārī pragrahaś caiva pīlūni niculāni ca ||

6.14.2 asanaḥ sptaparṇaś ca triphalā maricāni ca |
etāni samabhāgāni kaṣāyam upapādayet ||

6.14.3 etānyeva ca cūrṇāni mākṣikeṇa piben naraḥ |
anenaiva kaṣāyeṇa bhojayet siddhamodanam ||

6.14.4 picumandasya mūlāni citrako hastipippalī |
tvakpatraphalamūlāni karañjātsarṣapās tathā ||

6.14.5 tulyāny etāni sarvāṇi valmīkasya ca mṛttikā |
gavāṃ mūtreṇa piṣṭāni ślakṣṇānyudvartanaṃ varam ||

6.14.6 rāsnā vacā hy arkamūlaṃ hiṃsrā dantī tathaiva ca |
śatapuṣpā ca kuṣṭhaṃ ca dve haridre punarnavā ||

6.14.7 aśvamūtre tvapāmārgaḥ śārivā naktamālikā |
valmīkamṛttikā yuktametair udvartanaṃ varam ||

6.14.8 karajassuraso bilvaṃ devadāru vacārjunaḥ |
tarkārī meṣaśṛṅgī ca śobhāñjanaka āraṇī ||

6.14.9 ubhe bṛhatyau śyonākaḥ śbadaṃṣṭrā khadirāsanau |
jale siddhairimaisttulyaiḥ kaṣāyapariṣecanam ||

6.14.10 etair eva uṣadhaistulyaiḥ kṣīrapiṣṭaṃ pralepayet |
anena vidhinā śīghramūrustambhaḥ praśāmyati ||

6.14.11 dve pañcamūlyau triphalā citrako devadāru ca |
ekāṣṭhīlā tvapāmārgaḥ śreyasī vāyasī sudhā ||

6.14.12 kālā bhārṅgī pṛthakparṇī suvahā madayantikā |
kāśmarī ca viśalyā ca hiṃsrāhemavidārikā ||

6.14.13 cirabilvo hy aśokaś ca balā cāṃśumatī tathā |
vayasthā pīlaparṇī ca pāṭhācaiva śatāvarī ||

6.14.14 eṣāṃ paṃcapalānbhāgān jaladroṇeṣu saptasu |
aṣṭabhāgāvaśeṣaṃ ca pacettailāḍhakaṃ śanaiḥ ||

6.14.15 kuṣṭhaṃ ca śatapuṣpā ca citrakastryūṣaṇaṃ tathā |
devadārvagaru śreṣṭhaṃ viḍaṅgaṃ mustam eva ca ||

6.14.16 aśvagandhā ca pāṭhā ca mūrvā śyonāka eva ca |
pippalyaḥ śṛṅgaberaṃ ca dantī hiṅgvamlavetasau ||

6.14.17 garbheṇānena vaidyas tu kaṣāyeṇa susādhayet |
siddhaṃpūtaṃ ca śītaṃ ca kṣaudrājyenānusaṃsṛjet ||

6.14.18 tadasya dadyāt pānārthaṃtathaivābhyajjanādiṣu |
ūrustambhaścirotpannastailenaitena śāmyati ||

6.14.19 ślīpadānyāṭhyavātaṃ cakhuḍavātāṃś ca nāśayet |
pippalīvardhamānaṃ vā mākṣikeṇa jalena vā ||

6.14.20 ūrustambhepraśaṃsanti gaṇḍīrāriṣṭam eva vā |
kṣārāḥkṣārāgadāś caiva nirūhāś ca pṛthagvidhāḥ ||

6.14.21 harītakyāḥ prayogo vā hyūrustambhe praśasyate |
vilekhyamāno hi yataḥ kṣīṇamāṃsabalo bhavet ||

6.14.22 śarīrarakṣaṇārthāya bhojayed bṛṃhayed api |
bhuñjīta ṣaṣṭikān jīrṇān purāṇāṃś caiva śālikān ||

6.14.23 jāṅgalāni ca māṃsāni seveta mṛgapakṣiṇām |
ūrustambhaparīto yo yadā vātādhiko bhavet ||

6.14.24 samyak proktam idaṃ sarvamūrustambhacikitsitam || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhelecaturdaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || || pañcadaśo ' dhyāyaḥ |
|
athāto visarpavātaśoṇitaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

6.15.1 vātātpittātkaphāccaiva sannipātād dvayād api |
visarpāḥ pañca nirdiṣṭās teṣāṃ vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam ||

6.15.2 kaṣāyakaṭurūkṣāṃś ca yo nityam upasevate |
tasya vāyuḥ prakupitaḥ tvagraktaṃ māṃsam eva ca ||

6.15.3 sirāś ca samadhiṣṭhāya visarpaṃ janayed balī |
pipīlikāṃ visarpantīṃ manyate tu, ghṛte ' pi ca (?) ||

6.15.4 jṛmbhikā tāluśoṣaś capārśvaśūlagrahajvarāḥ |
ghoraś cāruṇavarṇābhaḥ śvayathuḥ kṛṣṇa eva ca ||

6.15.5 ity eṣa vātavīsarpaḥ tasya karmavidhiṃ śṛṇu |
tasya nirvāpaṇaṃ kuryāt kṣīreṇa pariṣecanam ||

6.15.6 pītvā ca tailvakaṃ sarpirharītakyā virecanam |
avidāhīni cānnāni bhojanārhtaṃ pradāpayet ||

6.15.7 kṣīraṃ ca yavacūrṇaṃ ca ghṛtaṃ caivātra sādhayet |
yaṣṭīmadhukasaṃyuktametadālepanaṃ varam ||

6.15.8 gavāṃ mūtraṃ ca kṣīraṃ ca gośakṛdrasa eva vā |
pañcamūlī ca tatsiddhaṃjalaṃ seke praśasyate ||

6.15.9 rāsnāṃ ca madhukaṃ caiva peṣayed dadhimastunā |
pradeho vātavīsarpe ghṛtāktasya praśasyate ||

6.15.10 śṛṅgāṇi kṣīrivṛkṣāṇāṃ madhukaṃ nīlamutpalam |
kṣīrasiddham idaṃ koṣṇaṃ vātavīsarpanāśanam ||

6.15.11 etair eva uṣadhaissarvaiḥ kṣīrapiṣṭaiḥ pralepayet |
sukhoṣṇair vātavīsarpe tathā sampadyate sukhī ||

6.15.12 atha vā dadhimaṇḍena tailakṣīraghṛtena vā |
secayanti sukhoṣṇena visarpe vātasambhave ||

6.15.13 kaṭvamlalavaṇakṣāratīkṣṇaṃhyuṣṇāni cāśnataḥ |
tasya pittaṃ prakupitaṃ śirāmāṃsatvagāśritam ||

6.15.14 raktena saha saṃsṛṣṭaṃ śarīredehaveṣṭitam |
jvalayitvā jvaraṃ pūrvaṃjvalitāgniśikhopamam ||

6.15.15 visarpaṃ janayet tīvraṃ dāruṇaṃ pittasambhavam |
sphoṭāstasyopajāyante vahninevasamīritāḥ ||

6.15.16 yatra yatra ca jāyante sphoṭās tatra vilīyate |
hāridraṃ haritaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ koṣaṃ muñcatyabhīkṣṇaśaḥ ||

6.15.17 eṣo ' gnikalpo vīsarpaḥ paittiko dehanāśanaḥ |
cikitsāṃ tatra kurvīta pratyākhyāya cikitsakaḥ ||

6.15.18 virecanaṃ snehayuktaṃ pāyayet taṃ cikitsakaḥ |
pariṣekāṃś ca kurvīta kṣīrairikṣurasena vā ||

6.15.19 abhīkṣṇaṃ secayeccaiva himakalpena vāriṇā |
kṣīrivṛkṣakaṣāyair vā kaṣāyairmadhukasya vā ||

6.15.20 pradehaṃ tvasya kurvīta śatadhaitena sarpiṣā |
madhukotpalakalkais tu kṣīrapiṣṭaiḥ pralepayet ||

6.15.21 mañjiṣṭhā padmakaṃ padmaṃ candanaṃ nīlamutpalam |
madhūkaṃ madhukaṃ drākṣā lāmajjakakaserukau ||

6.15.22 mṛṇālāni vidārī ca samudrāntā śatāvarī |
sahasravīryā naladaṃ balādantī madhūlikā ||

6.15.23 etāni samabhāgāni jaladroṇe vibhāvayet |
etair eva kaṣāyaiś capiṣṭaiś caiva vipācayet ||

6.15.24 ghṛtaṃ tasyahito ' bhyaṅgaḥ visarpe pittasambhave |
nyagrodhodumbarāśvatthaplakṣavetasajās tathā ||

6.15.25 kalkāḥ pañca praśasyante kṣīrapiṣṭāḥ pralepane |
śleṣmalānyannapānāni śleṣmalo yo niṣevate ||

6.15.26 tasya śleṣmā prakupito rakte tiṣṭhati dehinaḥ |
tato ' sya śleṣmavīsarpo jāyate mandavedanaḥ ||

6.15.27sphoṭāś ca tasya jāyante śvayathuḥ pāṇḍureva ca |
tasya tandrā ca nidrā ca jvaraḥ kāsaḥ śirograhaḥ ||

6.15.28 cirāc ca pākaṃ vrajati visarpaḥ śleṣmasambhavaḥ |
vamanaṃ recanaṃ caiva kuryāt tasya yathābalam ||

6.15.29 tailvakaṃ vā pibetsarpiḥ purāṇaṃ ghṛtam eva vā |
sarjāśvakarṇau sustā ca sallakī somavalkalaḥ ||

6.15.30 dvau karañjau kapitthatvak śirīṣośīrasāribāḥ |
kṣīrivṛkṣapravālāni kuṭajatvagdhanajjayaḥ ||

6.15.31 dhavaḥ palāśaḥ syonākaḥ khadiro vetasāsanau |
kaṣāyaṃ sādhayed etaṃ sukhoṣṇena ca secayet ||

6.15.32 ajākṣīreṇa piṣṭais tu kalkairetaiḥ pralepayet |
tailaprasthaṃ pacedebhiḥ kaṣāyairatha peṣitaiḥ ||

6.15.33 abhyañjanena vīsarpaḥ ślaiṣmikastena śāmyati |
gomāṃsakhaṇḍair uṣṇaiś ca visarpam upanāhayet ||

6.15.34 majjabhir jāṅgalānāṃ catadabhyaṅgaṃ prakalpayet |
māṃsopanāhaṃ kurvīta ślaiṣmike vātike ' pi vā ||

6.15.35 jāṅgalairgavyamāyūraiḥ kukkuṭaiśchāgalair api |
yadā prakupitā doṣās trayas tvaṅmāṃsamāśritāḥ ||

6.15.36 raktena saha saṃsṛṣṭāḥ śarīroddeśaceṣṭitāḥ |
saṃśyāmaṃ maṇḍalaṃ tatra jāyate kṛṣṇam eva ca ||

6.15.37 atha lohitaparyantaṃ visarpati savedanam |
jvarastṛṣṇā ca dāhaś ca chardirmūrchā bhramas tathā ||

6.15.38 yadyac caspṛśyate tena tatroṣmā na nivartate |
dagdhe ca śoṇite gātraṃ śuṣkālābunibhaṃ bhavet ||

6.15.39 |.. |.. |.. |.. |||yāṃ tatra kārayet |
sukumāraṃ balātailaṃ tailaṃ śairīṣam eva vā |
dhānvantaraṃ cāpi ghṛtaṃ pāyayed vātaśoṇite ||

6.15.40 pippalīvardhamānaṃ vā takrāsavamathāpi vā |
khādiraṃ vā niṣeveta vātaśoṇitapīḍitaḥ ||

6.15.41 nityam āsthāpayeccainaṃ mustādyena tu vastinā |
pāyaye---ravastibhyām(?) athavāmādhutailikaiḥ ||

6.15.42 yac cikitsitam ākhyātaṃ visarpe vātasambhave |
tadvātaśoṇite sarvaṃ kartavyaṃ śoṇitottare ||

6.15.43 yadi śoṇitamākrāntaṃ gambhīre vātaśoṇite |
vātavattaccikitseta snehapānānuvāsanaiḥ ||

6.15.44 mayūrakauñcalāvānāṃ vasā majjā ca lāmataḥ |
pāne ' bhyaṅge ca vastau ca balātailaṃ praśasyate ||

6.15.45 akriyābhiḥ kriyābhir vāpakvaṃ yadvātaśoṇitam |
pāṭanaṃ tatra kurvītasuvikalpya prayogavit || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhelepañcadaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || || ṣoḍaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto ' rśasāṃ cikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

6.16.1 vātātpittātkaphāccaiva sannipātāttathaiva ca |
sahajāni ca raktāc ca ṣoḍārśāṃsyatha dehinām ||

6.16.2 teṣāṃ nidānaṃ vakṣyāmi cikitsāṃ cānupūrvaśaḥ |
adṛśyānāṃ ca yatproktaṃ dṛśyānāṃ ca yathākramam ||

6.16.3 vidāhigururūkṣāṇāmānūpaudakasevanāt |
dadhidugdhaguḍādīnāṃ piśitānāṃ ca bhojinām ||

6.16.4 yavānāmudakānāṃ ca duṣṭānāmavacāraṇāt |
nity ājīrṇabhujāṃ cāpi vegānāṃ ca vidhāraṇāt ||

6.16.5 pravāhaṇāccatimātraṃ maithunasyātisevanāt |
duṣṭapānaprasaṅgāc ca kaṭhināt pṛṣṭhapīḍanāt ||

6.16.6 nirūhasyātiyogāc ca vastīnāṃ vibhramād api |
snehapānāc ca vibhrāntānmadyadoṣācchramātkṣayāt ||

6.16.7 ebhiḥ prakupitā doṣā vātapittakaphāstrayaḥ |
ekaśassarvaśo vātha dvandvaśaḥ śoṇitena vā ||

6.16.8 gudābhiṣyandamevāśu karvanti gudamāśritāḥ |
kīlās tatra prahohanti sūkṣmasarṣapasannibhāḥ ||

6.16.9 yavamudgādiniṣpāvakarkandhubadaropamāḥ |
śarīrāṅguṣṭhamātrā vā tāmrā gostanasannibhāḥ ||

6.16.10 nirūḍhāste gude kīlāḥ stambhayanti gudaṃ bhṛśam |
srotasāṃ gudamānahya mūlaṃ badhnanti vāpy atha ||

6.16.11 nirodhātsrotasāṃ teṣāmūrdhvaṃ doṣāssamutthitāḥ |
ekaikaṃ dūṣayitvā tu rogān kurvanticāśayān || 6.1

6.12. purīṣabhedo vaivarṇyaṃ śūlaṃ nirvāhikā tathā |
avadārastṛṣā dāho gudapṛṣṭhe medo jvaraḥ ||

6.16.13 aruciś cāvipākaś cagātrakṣayabalakṣayau |
paṇḍutvaṃ parvabhedaś ca śvayathuś cākṣikūṭayoḥ ||

6.16.14 glānirmaithunahāniś ca gudabhraṃśo gudagrahaḥ |
arśasāṃ rūpasādṛśyaṃ pṛthaktvaṃ teṣu vakṣyate ||

6.16.15 kṛṣṇaṃ purīṣaṃ bhavati rūkṣaṃ kiṃcitsaphenilam |
nityaṃ gāḍhapurīṣaś ca bhinnavarcāḥ punaḥ punaḥ ||

6.16.16 ūrupṛṣṭakaṭigrāhonity ānaddhasudurbalaḥ |
jāyate parvabhedaś ca karṇaśūlastṛṣā bhramaḥ ||

6.16.17 arśo yakṛddhi pavano jaṭharaṃvāpi vardhayet |
śūlāś cāsyopajāyanta ādhmānaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ ||

6.16.18 grahaṇī dūṣitā cāsya vaivarṇyaṃ copajāyate |
hṛtpārśvakoṣṭhaśūlāś cadurnāmnyanilasambhave ||

6.16.19 sajvaraṃ piṭakaṃ tṛṣṇā tīkṣṇavegaṃ saśoṇitam |
uṣṇaṃ dravaṃ sadāhaṃ ca pittārśassūpaveśyate ||

6.16.20 pāṇḍuvarṇaś ca bhavati pītābhāsaś ca lakṣyate |
dahyate ca gudo ' tyarthaḥ gudapākaś ca jāyate ||

6.16.21 śleṣmajeṣv api cārśassu picchilaṃ śuklasaṃplavam |
purīṣaṃ sakaphaṃ yāti stokaṃ stokaṃ savedanam ||

6.16.22 upaviṣṭaściraṃ cāste niḥsvanaṃ copaveśyate |
śūyate meḍhravṛṣaṇaṃ vastiś ca guda eva ca ||

6.16.23 aruciś cāvipākaś ca na ca pakvaṃ viricyate |
śvayathuś ca viśatyenaṃ viśeṣeṇākṣikūṭayoḥ ||

6.16.24 etacchaleṣmasamutthānāmarśasāṃ rūpamucyate |
sannipātasamutthānaṃ jānīyāt sarvalakṣaṇaiḥ ||

6.16.25 saṅghātaraktaṃ visraṃ vā bhinnaṃ vāpittamiśritam |
cireṇa ca pravāho ' sya prasaktaṃ vā kadācana ||

6.16.26 abhiṣyaṇṇāni muñcanti raktārśāṃsyatha śoṇitam |
vahanti dhārayā raktaṃ yathā viddhā sirā sthitā ||

6.16.27 rajasvaleva yuvatī raktaṃ muñcantyabhīkṣṇaśaḥ |
atīvamuḥ draṃ surāṃ(?) dantīṃ kakubhaṃ samayūrakam ||

6.16.28 gavāṃ ca mahiṣīṇāṃ ca mūtrāṇyatha samācaret |
bhasmīkṛtya tu taṃ kṣāraṃ yuktyāmadyena pāyayet ||

6.16.29 śleṣmārśāṃsi praśamayec chavayathuṃ pāṇḍutām api |
arśasāṃ vātikānāṃ tu yaduktaṃ vai cikitsitam ||

6.16.30 tad eva ślaiṣmikāṇāṃ tu snehavarjaṃ samācaret |
raktajeṣv api cārśassu kṣīramājaṃ praśasyate ||

6.16.31 ṛtuṃ vāpy ayanaṃ vāpi pibenmāsamathāpi vā |
balābilvaśalāṭūni triphalā hastipippalī ||

6.16.32karañjamadhupālāśamadhukotpalatindukaiḥ |
kalkairakṣasamairetairghṛtaprasthaṃ vipācayet ||

6.16.33 ajākṣīre daśaguṇe tatsiddhaṃ mātrayā pibet |
etadraktasamutthāni pittajāni hi yāni ca ||

6.16.34 arśāsi nāśayatyāśu chinnābhrāṇīva mārutaḥ |
lodhraṃ dāruharidrā ca majjā baibhītakī tathā ||

6.16.35 taṇḍulodakapītānimadhunārśovināśanam |
lākṣā haridrā mañjiṣṭhā madhukaṃ nīlamutpalam ||

6.16.36 ajākṣīreṇa pītāni raktajānāṃ vināśanam |
śirīṣapuṣpaṃ puṣpaṃ ca kauṭajaṃ kakubhasya ca ||

6.16.37 dārvī haridrā lodhraṃ ca dhātakī kaṭphalaṃ vṛṣaḥ |
eteṣāṃ pāyayetkalkānyuktitastaṇḍulāmbunā ||

6.16.38 madhuyuktaḥ praśamayed arśo vai raktapittajam |
madhukaṃ badaraṃ drākṣā mūlaṃ ca kuśakāśayoḥ ||

6.16.39 taṇḍulodakapītāni madhunārśovināśanam |
nyagrodhodumbarāśvatthabadarīplakṣavetasāt ||

6.16.40 pṛthak pravālānyārdrāṇi dvipalīnāni saṃharet |
avākpuṣpyāḥ palānyaṣṭavaṣṭau dārvyās tathaiva ca ||

6.16.41 śāliparṇīpṛśniparṇyoḥ pale dve dve samāvapet |
dve rālaśākasya pale sarvametatsamāvapet ||

6.16.42 dvidroṇe salile sādhyamaṣṭabhāgāvaśeṣitam |
ghṛtasya cāḍhakaḥ sādhyaḥ sakaṣāyaḥ sukhāmbunā ||

6.16.43cāṅgeryāmlikayā jātaḥ svarasaḥ snehasammitaḥ |
devadārvabhayā mustā citrako bilvapeśikā ||

6.16.44 kaṭphalaṃ śṛṅgaberaṃ ca pippalī candanaṃ tathā |
sauvīramañjanaṃ mūlaṃpippalyāstiktarohiṇī ||

6.16.45guḍapriyaṅgupuṣpaṃ ca śālmalīpicchasāhvayā |
vatsakasya ca bījāni tathaivātiviṣā vacā ||

6.16.46 etānakṣasamān bhāgān pṛthagdatvā vipācayet |
etatsiddhaṃ ghṛtaṃ yuktyā raktārśo vai vināśayet ||

6.16.47 pittagulmamatīsāraṃ śūlaṃjvaramarocakam |
strīṇāmasṛgdaraṃ ghoraṃ raktapittaṃ pravāhikām ||

6.16.48 pāṇḍurogaṃviṣaṃ kāsaṃ kṛmīṃścaivāpakarṣati |
nāśanaṃ śleṣmajātānāṃ kāyāgnerdīpanaṃ param ||

6.16.49 garbhādhānaṃ ca vandhyānāṃ śoṣiṇāṃ cāmṛtopamam |
cāṅgerīghṛtam ity etat khyātam arśovināśanam ||

6.16.50 balavarṇakaraṃ caiva raktagulmaharaṃ tathā |
pittajeṣv api cārśassu hitaṃ tadraktajeṣv api ||

6.16.51 sannipātasamuttheṣu sarveṣveva ca pūjitam |
arśasāṃ sahajānāntu yathāprakṛticācaret ||

6.16.52 cikitsitaṃ svayaṃ buddhyā sampradhārya yathābalam |
tripalaṃ śṛṅgaberasya caturthaṃ maricasya ca ||

6.16.53 pippalī kuḍavārdhaṃ ca cavyasya palam eva ca |
tālīsapatrasya palaṃ palārdhaṃ kesarasya ca ||

6.16.54 dve pale pippalīmūlaṃ citrakasya palaṃ tathā |
tathātvakpatrayoḥ karṣau sūkṣmailākarṣam eva ca ||

6.16.55 triṃśadguḍapale śuddhe cūrṇāny etāni sādhayet |
tato ' kṣamātrāvaṭikāḥ prāṇadā itiviśrutāḥ ||

6.16.56 tālīsapatravaṭakās ta eva parikīrtitāḥ |
pūrvaṃ bhaktasya paścādvā bhakṣayet tu yathābalam ||

6.16.57 madyair māṃsarasair yūṣaiḥ kṣīraiś cāpy upabhojayet |
etena hanti kaphajānyarśāṃsi sahajāni ca ||

6.16.58 vātapittasamutthāni raktajānītarāṇi ca |
madātyaye mūtrakṛcchre pramehe hṛdayagrahe ||

6.16.59viṣajvare pārśvaśūle kṣatekṣīṇe virecite |
mandāgniviṣamāgnīnāṃ tathaiva kṛmikoṣṭhinām ||

6.16.60 śūlagulmaparītānāṃ chardyatīsāriṇām api |
hṛdrogiṇāṃkāmalināṃ śoṣiṇām ūrdhvavātinām ||

6.16.61 kāsaśvāsaparītānāṃ sevyāś ca vaṭakāḥ śubhāḥ |
bhūyiṣṭhaṃ sahajānīha kṣapayanti śarīriṇam ||

6.16.62tasmāc choṣopacāreṇa kuryāt tasya cikitsitam |
rogānīkasya sarvasya paramarśaḥ sukīrtitam ||

6.16.63 tasmād arśo vistareṇa cikitset tu cikitsakaḥ |
śastreṇa chedanaṃ teṣāṃ kṣāreṇa dahanaṃ tathā ||

6.16.64 śalyakartā prayuñjīta dṛṣṭakarmā cikitsitam |
āyurvedavidā yat tu prayoktavyaṃ cikitsitam ||

6.16.65 ālepanābhyaṅgavidhiṃ svedakarma ca tacchṛṇu |
abhyajya nābhiṃ kukṣiṃ ca vastimuṣkau gudaṃ tathā ||

6.16.66 amlaiḥ kṣīraiś ca mūtraiś ca sukhoṣṇaiḥ pariṣecayet |
taruṇairmūlakaiḥsvinnais tathā gṛjjanakair api ||

6.16.67 sukhoṣṇaiḥ svedayed yuktyā piṇyākairgomayena vā |
rāṭhameraṇḍamūlaṃ ca madhūkaṃ devadāru ca ||

6.16.68 yavacūrṇanayuktāni kṣīreṇāloḍya pāyayet |
tenopanāhaṃ kurvīta svedayec ca punaḥ punaḥ ||

6.16.69arśāṃsi śamamāyānti vedanā ca nivartate |
vṛṣārkanaktamālānāṃ kāśmaryādaṇḍayos tathā ||

6.16.70patrakvāthaiḥ svedayet tu tatra caivopaveśayet |
mahānimbaṃ śṛṅgaberaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ kāsīsam eva ca ||

6.16.71 saindhavaṃ citrakaṃ dantīṃ karavīraṃ śilākaṇām |
pūtikaṃvaruṇādvalkaṃ vidārīṃ lāṅgalāhvayām ||

6.16.72viḍaṅgaṃ hemadugdhāṃ ca haritālaṃ ca peṣayet |
garbheṇānena vipacet tailaṃ mūtracaturguṇe ||

6.16.73 snuhyarkakṣīrayoś cātra kuḍavaḥ kuḍavo bhavet |
etadālepanaṃ yuktamarśasāṃ śamanaṃ param ||

6.16.74kṣārakarmakaraṃ hyetanna ca dūṣayate gudam |
kulīraśṛṅgī hastyasthi balā lāṅgalikītathā ||

6.16.75hiṅgu kuṣṭhaṃ ca tutthaṃ ca bilvaṃ bhallātakāni ca |
arśasāṃ lepanaṃ tena saptarātraṃ punaḥ punaḥ ||

6.16.76 śirīṣabījaṃ dvau kṣārau laṅgalī saindhavaṃ tathā |
snuhīkṣīreṇa piṣṭāni gavāṃ pittena bhāvayet ||

6.16.77 arṇāṃsi lepayet tena saptarātraṃ punaḥ punaḥ |
etena liptānyarśāṃsi vinaśyanti na saṃśayaḥ ||

6.16.78 śigru |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |
sarvamekatra saṃhṛtya snuhīkṣīreṇa peṣayet ||

6.16.79 karavīro ' navadyaś ca mālatī svarṇayūthikā |
prakṣālanakaṣāyo ' yamarśasāṃ hita ucyate ||

6.16.80 sakṣaudraṃ navanītaṃ tu pralepo vraṇaropaṇaḥ |
dahyate saptarātreṇa puṃstvaṃ ca navinaśyati ||

6.16.81 saurmikābidadaṃ |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |
|.. |.. rśātrikaṭukaṃ snuhīkṣīreṇa peṣayet ||

6.16.82 etadālepanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ durnāmānaṃ vināśayet |
svarṇakṣīrī tu |.. |.. |.. tsakam ||

6.16.83 kukkuṭsya purīṣaṃ ca snuhīkṣīreṇa peṣayet |
etadālepanaṃ śreṣṭhamarśasāṃ kṣārasammitam ||

6.16.84dahyante ' rśāṃsi saptāhāt puṃstvaṃ ca na vinaśyati |
yavāssiddhārthakāś caiva bhallātakamathovasā ||

6.16.85 dhūpanaṃ candanaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ śiṃsapāsāra eva ca |
gavāṃ śakṛc ca vārāhaṃ patre vāriṣṭaśigruje ||

6.16.86 ghṛtamiśraṃ praśaṃsanti śreṣṭhaṃ dhūpanamarśasām |
raktapittasamuttheṣu praśastāḥ kṣīravastayaḥ ||

6.16.87tīkṣṇāḥ kaphasamuttheṣu vātikeṣv anuvāsanam |
sannipātādasādhyāni cirotthānīha yāni tu |
raktajāssahajā yāpyāḥ sādhyā anye trayo ' pi te || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bheleṣoḍaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || || saptadaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || athātaḥ śvayathucikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

6.17.1 yaḥ kṣīṇamāṃso mandāgniḥ vyādhiyuktas sudurbalaḥ |
gurūṇi sevate ' tyartham amlapittakarāṇi ca ||

6.17.2 sadyo vānto virikto vā gurūṇyannāni sevate |
upoṣitaś ca yo ' tyarthaṃ śākamūlaphalāśanaḥ ||

6.17.3 matsyān dadhi payo bhuṅkte divāsvapnaratiś ca yaḥ |
apathyājīrṇabhojī ca naro vyāyāmasevitaḥ ||

6.17.4 yaś ca tiktakaṣāyāṇi kṣārāmlakaṭukāni ca |
laghūni sevate ' tyarthaṃ rūkṣāṇi tu viśeṣataḥ ||

6.17.5 tasya vātaḥ prakupitaḥ śirā bāhyāḥ prapadyate |
sa pittaṃ kopayatyāśu raktaṃ śleṣmāṇam eva ca ||

6.17.6 sirās tā doṣasampūrṇāḥsaṃvisarpanti dāruṇāḥ |
samupetyaikadeśe vā sarvagātreṣu vā punaḥ ||

6.17.7 evaṃ tacchvayathurnāma vyādhir bhavati dāruṇaḥ |
doṣaiḥ pakvāśayasthais taiḥ so+adhastāc chvayathur bhavet ||

6.17.8pādapravṛttaḥ śvayathur narāṇāṃ nāśayaty asūn |
yoṣitāṃ mukhasambhūta ubhayor api guhyajaḥ ||

6.17.9 bhūyiṣṭhamiha śophas tudoṣasaṅghātasaṃbhavaḥ |
yas teṣāṃtvadhiko hi syāt sa svarūpaṃ hi darśayet ||

6.17.10 śvayathurvātiko rūkṣaḥ kṛṣṇavarṇassavedanaḥ |
karoti pīḍito nimnamanimittaṃ ca naśyati ||

6.17.11paittikaśvayathurnīlo lohitaḥ pīta eva vā |
rujādāhaparītaś ca kṣiprapāko jvarānvitaḥ |

6.17.12 śuklāvabhāso bahalaḥ śvetapītaḥ sthiras tathā |
ālambaś cāpy anāśaś cabhṛśaṃ śophaḥ kaphātmakaḥ ||

6.17.13 vātapittakaphānāntu rūpaṃ syāt sānnipātike |
asādhyaścopasargaś ca śvayathuḥ prasṛtaś ca yaḥ ||

6.17.14 nīlapītāruṇaṃ jyotirdṛśyate śvayathau yadi |
kiñcitkṣaratyaslilaṃ tamasādhyaṃ vinirdiśet ||

6.17.15 śastradaṇḍaprahārābhyāṃ prāpātādasthibhaṅgataḥ |
śvayathuḥ pañcamo dṛṣṭo bhūyiṣṭhaṃ satu raktajaḥ ||

6.17.16 abhighātāc ca jātānāṃ māṃsamasthi ca pīḍitam |
sirāḥ sandūṣayatyāśu tato raktaṃ praduṣyati ||

6.17.17 sa dāharāgāhulo vardhate tīvravedanaḥ |
kṣatavaisarpikīṃ tasya kriyāṃ kuryāc cikitsakaḥ ||

6.17.18 etallakṣaṇamuddiṣṭaṃ śvayathūnāṃ yathāvidhi |
cikitsitaṃ pravakṣyāmi yathāvadanupūrvaśaḥ ||

6.17.19 kalyāṇakaṃ pibetsarpirmahātiktamathāpi vā |
mahadyatpañcagavyaṃ vā tatassaṃśodhayennaram ||

6.17.20 harītakīṃ samadhukāṃ sakṣaudraṃ vāpi lehayet |
mākṣikeṇa ca kṛṣṇāṃ ca lihyāt kṣīreṇa vā pibet ||

6.17.21 harītakī śṛṅgaberaṃ devadāru ca tatsamam |
etatsukhāmbunā pītaṃ śvayathūnāṃ nivāraṇam ||

6.17.22 ayor ajastrikaṭukaṃ trivṛtā tiktarohiṇī |
triphalārasapītaṃ tacchvayathūnāṃ nivāraṇam ||

6.17.23 mahauṣadhaṃ devadāru sudhāvarṣābhureva ca |
etaiḥkṣīraṃ samaiḥ siddhaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ śvayathunāśanam ||

6.17.24 gomūtrasya prayogo vā śreṣṭhaḥ śvayathunāśanaḥ |
sakṣīraṃ vā pibenmūtraṃ māhiṣaṃ mūtram eva vā ||

6.17.25 auṣṭraṃ mūtraṃ pibeccaiva taduṣṭrīkṣīram eva vā |
yathābalaṃ yathādoṣaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ śvayathunāśanam ||

6.17.26 mūlakāni ca siddhāni sānile bhakṣayen naraḥ |
rasena mūlakānāṃ tu kurvīta pariṣecanam ||

6.17.27 naktamālārkamūlānāṃ vṛṣasyāragvadhasya ca |
kaṣāyaṃ pariṣiktaṃ tu śvayathūnāṃ nivāraṇam ||

6.17.28 suvarcalā vyāghranakhaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ kaṭukarohiṇī |
kākamāci ṛṣabhako rāsnā mūrvā punarnavā ||

6.17.29 vārtākī niculaṃ mūlaṃ triphalā citrako vacā |
kuṭherako haridre dve śyāmā mūṣakaparṇikā ||

6.17.30 viḍaṅgaṃ śigruvalkaṃ ca naktamālaṃ mahauṣadham |
gomūtrapiṣṭaṃ śvayathau mukhyamudvartanaṃ bhavet ||

6.17.31 dantī viḍaṅgaṃ triphalā trayūṣaṇaṃ kaṭurohiṇī |
citrakaṃ devakāṣṭhaṃ ca trivṛtā hastipippalī ||

6.17.32 cūrṇany etāni tulyāni dviguṇaṃ syādayor ajaḥ |
kṣīreṇāloḍya pītāni śreṣṭhaṃ śvayathunāśanam ||

6.17.33 triphalāyās tu kuḍavaṃ pippalīkuḍavaṃ tathā |
viḍaṅgamaricānāntu dvedvepale smṛte ||

6.17.34 palaṃ palaṃ ca kurvīta dantīcitrakayor api |
palaṃ ca pippalīmūlaṃtuṣṭebhyaś ca palaṃ tathā ||

6.17.35 śṛṅgaberapale dve ca gavyāt pañca palāni ca |
śeṣāṇyardhapalīnāni yāni tāni nibodha me ||

6.17.36 rāsnā balā gokṣurakaṃ madhukaṃ devadāru ca |
vacā sātiviṣā pāṭhā mustā kaṭukarohiṇī ||

6.17.37 kaṭphalaṃ sāribe dve ca śyāmā bhallātakāni ca |
punarnavāsatejohvā tvak ca patraṃ śatāvarī ||

6.17.38 nidigdhikā vyāghranakhaṃ mañjiṣṭhā kuśaśambhalī |
triphalā trivṛtā bhārṅgī kuṭajasya phalatvacaḥ ||

6.17.39 etadāhṛtya sambhāraṃdvistāvatsyādayor ajaḥ |
tadaikathyaṃ kṛtaṃ yuktyā lehayenmadhusarpiṣā ||

6.17.40 kṣīraṃ cānupibedyuktyā nirannakṣīrasevitā |
ayor ajīyam ity etat khyātaṃ siddharasāyanam ||

6.17.41 saṃvatsaraprayogeṇa śatavarṣāṇi jīvati |
varṣadvayena manujo dve jīveccharadāṃśate ||

6.17.42 nihanyācchvayathuṃ ghoraṃ vṛkṣamindrāśaniryathā |
pāṇḍurogamathārśāṃsi mandamagniṃ kṛmīnapi ||

6.17.43 bhagandaraṃ kāmilāṃ ca kuṣṭhāni jaṭharāṇi ca |
saplīhānamapasmāraṃ śūlāni parikartikām ||

6.17.44 atisāraṃ pramehāṃś cakṣatakāsaṃ kṣayaṃ tathā |
yasminyasminvikāre tu yogo ' yaṃ samprayujyate ||

6.17.45 taṃ taṃ nihanti vai rogaṃ devārīn keśavo yathā |
anuprayogo lājānāṃ saktavo madhunā saha ||

6.17.46 kṣīrānupānaṃ lehyo ' yaṃ divasān spta pañca vā |
arśassvāmātisāreṣu vidhiḥ syāt parikartane ||

6.17.47tathā kṣīṇeṣu kāseṣu jvareṣu viṣameṣu ca |
varṣothito ' pi śvayathustasmānmāsena śāmyati ||

6.17.48 rasāyanaprayogāc ca pūrvoddiṣṭādyathāvidhi |
śālīn saṣaṣṭikāṃś caivanavānnavikṛtīs tathā ||

6.17.49 kṣārāmlalavaṇāṃś cāpi sadādhūmaṃ vivarjayet |
āgantuśvayathurvāpi yo vā syāddoṣasambhavaḥ ||

6.17.50 laṅganaiś ca vilepaiś caraktasekaiḥ praśāmyati |
avipāko jvaraśchardirdaurbalyaṃ parikartikā |
śvāso ' tisāro hikkā caśophasyopadravāḥ smṛtāḥ || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhelesaptadaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || || aṣṭādaśo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāta udāvartacikitsitaṃ vyākhayāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

6.18.1 prakṛtyāvātalo yas tu rūkṣāṇyannāni sevate |
kaṣāyaṃ kaṭukānnityaṃ rasāṃstiktāṃś ca sevate ||

6.18.2 karkandhūnikapitthāni karīralikucāni ca |
pārāvatāni bhavyāni yaccānyatphalamīdṛśam ||

6.18.3 śuktakāni ca vallūraṃ piṇyākaṃkodravaudanam |
abhiṣyandīni kaṭukaṃ vetraśākaṃ ca sevate ||

6.18.4 vātamūtrpurīṣāṇāṃvidhṛtyā maithunasya ca |
etairanyaiś ca gurubhir hetubhiḥ kupito ' nilaḥ ||

6.18.5 nigṛhṇāti gudadvāraṃ śarīraṃvyāpya sarvaśaḥ |
sa śoṣayati tatrasthaḥ śarīraṃ śoṣayan bhṛśam ||

6.18.6 adhovahāni srotāṃsi pittaśleṣmavahāny api |
mūtrānnamalavāhīni badhnāti pavano bhṛśam ||

6.18.7vātasandūṣitāste tudhāvanto hyūrdhvamāsthitāḥ |
āmapakvāśayasthāna unmādyanti sudāruṇam ||

6.18.8 ūrdhvaṃhyapānassamprāpyacodānena samāgataḥ |
udārvata iti proktaḥ śastrasarpaviṣopaḥ ||

6.18.9 atha śūlāni tīvrāṇi dāho mūrcchā vivarṇatā |
śūyate vastimūlaṃ camūtravarvograhas tathā ||

6.18.10vatāvatha ca kukṣau ca hṛdi pārśvodare tathā |
devanābhiparītaś ca nissaṃjño vetate ' sakṛt ||

6.18.11niśvasity atha tāmyaṃś ca tṛṣyaty api ca hikkate |
upadravā udāvarte śṛṇu teṣāṃ cikitsitam ||

6.18.12 susnigdhamenamabhyajya tailena lavaṇena ca |
saṃkareprastare svededroṇyāṃ vā svedayet tataḥ ||

6.18.13 tato ' sya gudamabhyajya nirūhaṃ sampradāpayet |
ekaṃ dvau vā bhiṣak kṛtvā yāvadvāsādhu manyate ||

6.18.14 surirūḍhaṃ ca taṃ jñātvā sukhāmbupariṣecitam |
uṣṇodakānupānaṃ ca bhojyenmṛdumodanam ||

6.18.15 snuhāyāḥ patraśākena trivṛcchākena vā punaḥ |
tābhyāṃ yūṣeṇa bhuñjīta yaccānyadbhedanaṃ param ||

6.18.16 nityaṃ bhinnapurīṣais taṃ bhojanīyair upācaret |
evaṃ tasya purīṣaṃ hivāyurbhūyo na śoṣayet || |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |
|ekonaviṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ || |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |..

6.19.1sarvāṇy etāni liṅgāni dṛśyantemarmarogiṇaḥ |
sannipātasamuttho ' sau naiva sidhyati karmaṇā ||

6.19.2 nirbhidyate devanārtaṃ dahyate marma dūyate |
bhaktadveṣo jvaro mūrcchāśvāsaś caparitapyate ||

6.19.3 bhinnavarṇo ' tha dīnaś ca hṛdi kaṇḍūś ca jāyate |
hṛdrogaḥ krimijaḥ proktaḥ pañcamassa tu durjayaḥ ||

6.19.4 sādhyāstrayas tu hṛdrogā vātapittakaphātmakāḥ |
dvau cāsādhyau smṛtau tatra sādhyānāṃ śṛṇu bheṣajam ||

6.19.5 hṛdrogiṇaṃ snehayitvāśamayecchodhayet tathā |
laṅghayed acirottyaṃtaṃ hṛdrogaṃ vātikādvinā ||

6.19.6 harītakī vacā rāsnā pippalyau viśvabheṣajam |
śaṭhī puṣkaramūlaṃ ca cūrṇaṃ hṛdroganāśanam ||

6.19.7 pāṭhāvacāyavakṣārāabhayā cāmlavetasam |
durālabhā citrakaṃ ca tryūṣaṇaṃ lavaṇatrayam ||

6.19.8 śaṭhī puṣkaramūlaṃ ca tintriṇīkaṃ sadāḍimam |
mātuluṅgyāś ca bījāni sūkṣmacūrṇāni kārayet ||

6.19.9 sukhodakena madyair vā cūrṇāny etāni pāyayet |
arśaḥ śūlaṃ sahṛdrogaṃ gulmaṃ cāpi vyapohati ||

6.19.10 sauvarcalaṃ śṛṅgaberaṃ dāḍimaṃ sāmlavetasam |
śvāsahṛdrogaśamanam idaṃ syāddhiṅgupañcamam ||

6.19.11pañcāśadabhayākalkaṃ pale sauvarcalasya ca |
caturguṇajale mukhyaṃ ghṛtaprasthaṃ vipācayet ||

6.19.12 etadvallabhakaṃ nāma prāṇināṃ sarpiruttamam |
amṛtapratimaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ śvāsahṛdroganāśanam ||

6.19.13 pibetkalyāṇakaṃ sarpirdhānvantaramathāpi vā |
mātuluṅgasya carasaṃpibetkṣārāgadānapi ||

6.19.14 śatapākaṃ balātailaṃ śairīṣaṃ sukumārakam |
tailāny etāni seveta sadā hṛdgadapīḍitaḥ ||

6.19.15 pibedrasāyanaṃ sarpiḥ kṣīrāṇi ca guḍānapi |
pittahṛdrogaśamanā ye coktā ghṛtamodakāḥ ||

6.19.16 jīvakarṣabhakau drākṣā śarkarā śreyasī balā |
dve mede dve ca kākolyaukharjūryasitamutpalam ||

6.19.17 ghṛtaprasthaṃ pacedebhiḥ tulyāṃśairmāhiṣaṃ bhiṣak |
caturguṇena payasā pātavyaṃ yuktitaś ca tat ||

6.19.18 vātapittasamutthāne hṛdroge nāśanaṃ param |
vasā lābhena majjā ca tulyaṃ tailaghṛtaṃ tathā ||

6.19.19 amūni lābhato dadyādatha cāpi caturguṇam |
vacā trikaṭukaṃ rāsnā jīvantī jīvako balā ||

6.19.20 nidigdhikā cāṃśumatī nīlī bhārṅgīṃ punarnavā |
siddhamebhir mahāsnehaṃ balamālokya pāyayet ||

6.19.21 hṛdrogaṃ vātikaṃ snehaḥ sadya eva cikitsati |
vicārayetsvayaṃ buddhyā vaidyo hṛdrogabheṣajam ||

6.19.22 madhuraṃ pittahṛdroge snigdhamuṣṇaṃ ca vātike |
trayas tu pariśeṣā ye tīkṣṇoṣṇaistānupācaret ||

6.19.23 kṣāraiḥ kṣārāgadaiś caiva vamanaissavirecanaiḥ |
cikitsitaṃ vistareṇa yaduktaṃ kṛmikoṣṭhinām ||

6.19.24 tadeva krimihṛdroge kartavyamanasūyayā |
audakānūpamāṃsāni dadhi dugdhaṃ guḍorasaḥ ||

6.19.25 abhiṣyandakaraṃ sarvaṃ vātahṛdroganāśanam |
etānyeva tu śeṣeṣu hṛdrogeṣu vivarjayet |
laghūni cānnapānāni śasyante teṣu sarvadā || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bheleekonaviṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ || || viṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ || athātaḥ kāsacikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

6.20.1 pañca kāsāḥsamuddiṣṭā vātapittakaphātmakāḥ |
kṣatajaḥ kṣayajaśceti teṣāṃ vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam ||

6.20.2 udāvartādabhīghātād vyāyāmāc cāpi karśanāt |
saṃbhojanāddivāsvapnād drutapānātpralambanāt ||

6.20.3 karśitānāṃ ca rogebhyo doṣāsātmyakṛtātkṣayāt |
tīkṣoṣṇagurusevābhir nṛṇāṃ kāsā bhavanti te ||

6.20.4 teṣāṃ rūpāṇi vakṣyāmi cikitsāṃ ca pṛthagvidhām |
mārutātkāsate śuṣkaṃ śūkapūrṇagalo yathā ||

6.20.5 niṣṭhīvati ca śuṣkaṃ catatra mukte na kāsate |
pratāmyetkāsamānasya hṛdayaṃcāvakṛṣyate ||

6.20.6 pārśve ca rujato ' tyarthaṃ śvāsena ca vikūjati |
śaṅkhayor jāyate śūlaṃ tāluśoṣas tathaiva ca ||

6.20.7 śyāve netre ca vīkṣyetesvaro varṇaś cabhidyate |
viśeṣādriktakoṣṭhaś ca kāsate vātapīḍitaḥ ||

6.20.8amlarūkṣānnapānādivyāyāmoṣṇaniṣevaṇāt |
kaṭukakṣārarūkṣānnatīkṣṇamadyaniṣevaṇāt ||

6.20.9 sadāhaḥ sajvaraś caiva pittakāsaḥ pravartate |
hāridraṃ kaṭukoṣṇaṃ ca pītaṃ ṣṭhīvaticāti saḥ ||

6.20.10 mukhasya kaṭukatvaṃ ca tṛṣṇā cāsyopajāyate |
hāridre cakṣuṣī cāsya lakṣyete pittakāsinaḥ ||

6.20.11 abhiṣyandigurusnigdhaśītamedyānnasevinaḥ |
divāsvapnaprasaktasya vegāṃś cāpi nirundhataḥ ||

6.20.12 kaphaprasekobahalaḥ kāsastasyopajāyate |
gurutvaṃ śiraso ' tyarthaṃ mādhuryaṃ vadanasya ca ||

6.20.13kaphāt styānaṃ ca hṛdayaṃ bhaktasyānabhinandanam |
stambhaścaivāvipākaś ca kaphakāsasya lakṣaṇam ||

6.20.14 vyāyāmādbhāraharaṇānnigrahādaśvadantinām |
nihanyate yasya vakṣaḥ kṣatakāsaḥ sa ucyate ||

6.20.15 saraktaṃ pūtipūyābhaṃ grathitaṃ doṣasañcayam |
niṣṭhīvati sa kāsārto jvaryate cātisaryate ||

6.20.16 uro nirbhidyamānaṃ ca manyatepraśvasity api |
sa tāmyetkāsamānaś ca tṛṣṇā śoṣo mukhasya ca ||

6.20.17muhurāśūyate kaṇṭhaḥ svarabhedaś ca jāyate |
saghoṣaṃ kāsate cāpi vikṛtaṃ bhinnavisvaram ||

6.20.18 durgandhaṃ ca tathodgāraṃ kṣatakāse vimuñcati |
sarveṣāṃ sannipātāc ca kṣayakāsaḥ pravartate ||

6.20.19 tasya jvaraḥ pārśvarujā hastapādaṃ ca dahyate |
kāsamānaś ca niṣṭhīvet kaphapūrvaṃ sa śoṇitam ||

6.20.20 kṣīyete balavarṇau ca gātraṃ ca parihīyate |
na cāsya svadate bhojyaṃna bhuktaṃ ca vipacyate ||

6.20.21 atisāro jvaraśchardirmūrcchā cāsyopajāyate |
kṣayakāsassamākhyātaḥ sa cāsādhyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ ||

6.20.22 kṣatakāsas tu yāpyaḥ syāt sādhyānāṃ sādhanaṃ śṛṇu |
balavantaṃsnehitaṃ ca śodhanaissamupācaret ||

6.20.23 śodhitaṃ bhojayeccainaṃ purāṇān śāliṣaṣṭikān |
jāṅgalānāṃ ca māṃsāni niṣevenmṛgapakṣiṇām ||

6.20.24 audakānūpamāṃsāni gurūṇi ca vivarjayet |
daśakalkopasiddhaṃ vā kalyaṇakamathāpi vā ||

6.20.25 rasayanaṃ ca seveta sarpiḥ sarpirguḍāni ca |
sarpirmodakayogaṃ vā rasāyanavidhiṃ tathā ||

6.20.26 yaduktaṃ śoṇite pūrvaṃ tatkāseṣv api yojayet |
pippalyāmalakaṃ drākṣā tugākṣīryatha śarkarā ||

6.20.27 lājā ghṛtaṃ mākṣikaṃ ca lehaḥ kāsavināśanaḥ |
pippalyāmalakaṃ rāsnā leho mākṣikasaṃyutaḥ ||

6.20.28 harītakyāssapippalyāścūrṇaṃ mākṣikasaṃyutam |
pralehaḥ syānmadhughṛtaṃ sakṣaudraṃ śarkarānvitam ||

6.20.29 tryūṣaṇaṃ triphalāṃ caiva padmakaṃ devadāru ca |
rāsnāṃ balāṃ viḍaṅgāni sūkṣmacūrṇāni kārayet ||

6.20.30 cūrṇaṃ śarkarayā yuktaṃ lehayenmadhusarpiṣā |
eṣa lehaḥ praṇudati pañca kāsān samutthitān ||

6.20.31 yavakṣāraṃ viḍaṅgāni hiṅgu bhārṅgī mahauṣadham |
saindhavaṃ pippalī rāsnā tulyāny etāni cūrṇayet ||

6.20.32 ghṛtamātrāyutaṃ cūrṇaṃ pibetkāsavināśanam |
mandāgnitāṃ tamaśvāsaṃ hikkāṃ caivāpakarṣati ||

6.20.33 samūlaphalaśākhāṃ tu kuṭṭayetkaṇṭakārikām |
tāṃ pacetsaliladroṇe caturbhāgāvaśeṣitam ||

6.20.34 kaṣāyaṃ taṃ parisrāvya punaragnāvadhiśrayet |
ghṛtaṃ ca yuktyā dātavyaṃkalkāṃścemānpradāpayet ||

6.20.35 durālabhā chinnaruhā tryūṣaṇaṃ citrakaṃ tathā |
rāsnā karkaṭakākhyā ca pippalīmūlam eva ca ||

6.20.36 etānyardhapalīnāni tathā phāṇitaśarkarā |
palāni viṃśatiṃ datvā taṃ lehaṃ sāndramuddharet ||

6.20.37 śīte dadyāt pippalīnāṃ cūrṇasya kuḍavaṃ mitam |
tugākṣīryāś ca kuḍavaṃ madhunaḥ kuḍavaṃ tathā ||

6.20.38 taṃ lihyānmātrayā lehaṃ pañcakāsavināśanam |
hṛdrogānatha hikkāṃ ca śvāsaṃ caivāpakarṣati ||

6.20.39 siddhaṃmantraṃ yathā sarpo nātikrāmedudīritam |
tathā lehamimaṃ kāso nātikrāmati dehinām ||

6.20.40 daśamūlīmapānārgaṃ śaṅkhapuṣpīṃśaṭhīṃ vacām |
citrakaṃ cātmaguptāṃ ca pippalīmūlam eva ca ||

6.20.41 balāṃ puṣkaramūlaṃ ca tathaiva gajapippalīm |
dvipalīnān pṛthag dadyāt pratyagraṃ cābhayāśatam ||

6.20.42yavāḍhakaṃ sahaibhiś ca jalaṃ pañcāḍhakaṃ pacet |
avatārya yavaissiddhair uddharet tu harītakīḥ ||

6.20.43 bhedanaṃ tāsu kartavyaṃ tato vaṃśaśalākayā || |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. || ekaviṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ || |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. etadālepanaṃ kāryaṃ śaṅkhakasya vināśanam |
etānyeva tu sarvāṇi kaṣāyam upadhārayet ||
6.21.1 tena śītena kartavyaṃ bahuśaḥ pariṣecanam ||

6.21.2 nityaṃ vegapratīghātādajīrṇādhyaśanādapi |
raktaṃ vāyuś ca kupitau mastake pratitiṣṭhataḥ ||

6.21.3 sa mastakagato vāyuḥ raktaṃ caikatra mūrchitam |
udaye ' rkasya saṃpātādādity akaradūṣitam ||

6.21.4 vedanāṃ janayet tīvrāṃ śaṅkhayor mūrdhni gaṇḍayoḥ |
nighnanniva śiro ' tyarthaṃ muhurgṛhṇāti pāṇinā ||

6.21.5 niṣyandate himastiṣkamādity oṣmasamuddhatam |
vardhate vardhamāne tu sūrye śīrṣarujāhyataḥ ||

6.21.6 sa mastiṣkaśca nirvāti divasasya parikṣayāt |
sūryāvarta iti prāhurmunayo ' nena hetunā ||

6.21.7 kalyāṇakaṃ pibetsarpiḥ sūryāvartanipīḍitaḥ |
virecanaṃ ca kāryaṃ syāt tatrarahā śīrṣavirecanam ||

6.21.8 nasyakarma tathā kuryāt snehaś cottarabhaktikaḥ |
ghṛtatailavasābhis tu dhāryāḥ syuḥ śīrṣavastayaḥ ||

6.21.9 mayūrān kukkuṭān lāvān kṣīreṇa saha sādhayet |
tatkṣīramanthanodbhūtaṃ navanītamathoddharet ||

6.21.10tatkṣīre ṣaḍguṇe sādhyaṃ jīvanīyaissahauṣadhaiḥ |
tato ' sya nasyaṃ dātavyaṃ sūryāvartavināśanam ||

6.21.11 bilvamaṃśumatī rāsnā sahadevā punarnavā |
kālā guḍūcī suṣavī padmakaṃ madhukaṃ balā ||

6.21.12 etānyājena dugdhena siddhāni pariṣecanam |
etair eva uṣadhaissiddhaṃ sarpirājaṃ vināśayet ||

6.21.13 jāṅgalāni ca māṃsāni kārayed upanāhanam |
tenāsya śāmyati vyādhissūryāvartassudāruṇaḥ ||

6.21.14 palalaṃ dadhi matsyāṃś ca piṣṭānnavikṛtīḥ payaḥ |
divāsvapnaṃ ca bhajatastrayaḥ kupyanti dhātavaḥ ||

6.21.15manyāpāś cātyaghāṭāsu tīvrāṃ kurvanti vedanām |
tataścaivotthitā tīkṣṇā bhruvoś cākṣṇoś ca tiṣṭhati ||

6.21.16 spandayed gaṇḍapārśve ca hanūvāsthāya tiṣṭhati |
netrayor āmayān kuryāc chaṅkhau cāsya pratodayet ||

6.21.17 anantavāta ity eṣa śīrṣavyādhiḥ sudāruṇaḥ |
sannipātasamutthānas tasya vakṣyāmi bheṣajam ||

6.21.18lalāṭasthasirāṃ vidhyet snehapānaṃ ca kārayet |
kāyaṃ virecayed asya śiraś cāpi virecayet ||

6.21.19 cikitsitaṃ yathākhyātaṃ sūryāvartaśirograhe |
anantavāte tatkāryaṃ tadā sampadyate sukham ||

6.21.20 sambhojanāddivāsvapnācchardikṣavathunigrahāt |
abhighātātpratāpāc ca vegasandhāraṇād api ||

6.21.21 śirovahāṃ bhṛśaṃgṛhya tasyobhau kaphamārutau |
śīrṣārdhaṃ śaṅkhamūlaṃ ca dārayantau ca tiṣṭhataḥ ||

6.21.22 śvayathurjāyate gaṇḍe cakṣuścaivaṃ virajyate |
ardhāvabhedako nāma śīrṣavyādhiḥ sudustaraḥ ||

6.21.23 virecanaṃ ca śiraso nasyakarma ca kārayet |
lābhataśca vasā sarvā ghṛtaṃ tailaṃ ca yuktitaḥ ||

6.21.24 tasyaiva mahatīṃ mātrāṃ pāyayet tena sidhyati |
kārpāsabījaṃ māṣāṃś ca godhūmān sarṣapān yavān ||

6.21.25 pañcamūlyau tathā dve ca kṣīreṇa saha sādhayet |
auṣṇyamudvahatā tena nāḍīsvedena svedayet ||

6.21.26 uṣṇaiś ca taiḥ kṣīrasiddhaiḥ kuryāt tasyopanāhanam |
karañjaṃ śigrubījāni tvak patraṃ śarkarā tathā ||

6.21.27 sarveṣāṃ śīrṣarogāṇāmetacchīrṣavirecanam |
śiraso ' nte lalāṭānte śaṅkhaparyanta eva ca ||

6.21.28 manyayoś cāpi pippalyā dahetkāṇḍena vā punaḥ |
tathaivārdhāvabhedasya tenaiva vidhinābhavet ||

6.21.29 vātike śīrṣaroge ca dahanaṃ ślaiṣmike ' pi ca |
tasmād atipravṛddheṣu śīrṣarogeṣu buddhimān ||

6.21.30 āraṇyapippalībhir vā dahetkāṇḍena vā punaḥ |
rūkṣānnasevināṃ nityaṃ tathodāvartinām api ||

6.21.31 ūrdhvamutkramya pavanaḥ śiraḥkampamudīrayet |
taṃ pāyayenmṛdu snehaṃ balātailamathāpi vā ||

6.21.32 nasyakarma snehapānaṃ nityaṃ caivānuvāsanam |
samaśnataḥ sarvarasānajīrṇādhyaśanādapi ||

6.21.33 kurvanti mūrdhni śvayathuṃ trayo doṣāssamutthitāḥ |
tasya pūrvaṃ śirāṃ vidhyet pibejjīrṇaghṛtaṃ tathā ||

6.21.34 viśodhanaṃ dhūmapānaṃ śirasaś ca virecanam |
ity eṣa śīrṣarogāṇāṃ pradeśaḥ parikīrtitaḥ ||

6.21.35 antaḥkaṇṭhagatān rogān vakṣyāmi sacikitsitān |
uccaiḥ pralāpātsaṃrambhādatīvādhyaśanādibhiḥ ||

6.21.36 rūkṣānnapānasevābhir bhinatti pavanaḥ param |
dhūmāyate galas tasya tathā dhumadhumāyate ||

6.21.37 dūyate hṛdayaṃ cāsya svarabhedaśca mārutāt |
nasyakarmāṇi pāne ca balātailaṃ praśasyate ||

6.21.38kaphavātottare dhāryās tathaiva kabalagrahāḥ |
pippalī pippalīmūlaṃ maricāni harītakī ||

6.21.39 śṛṅgaberaṃ yavakṣāro lodhraṃ tejovatī tathā |
etāni samabhāgāni cūrṇāni madhunā saha ||

6.21.40 arocake śleṣmabhave pradhānaṃ mukhadhāvanam |
pippalyo madhukaṃ mūrvā candanaṃ kamalotpalam ||

6.21.41 uśīraṃ padmakaṃ lodhramelā lāmajjakaṃ tathā |
etāni smabhāgāni kṣaudreṇa saha sādhayet ||

6.21.42 dviguṇaṃ śarkarāṃ dattvāpittajāyāmathārucau |
ajājyo maricaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ bilvaṃ sauvarcalaṃ tathā ||

6.21.43 madhukaṃ śarkarā tailaṃ vātike mukhadhāvanam |
jambvāmrapallavaṃ lodhraṃ triphalā cavyaciktrakau ||

6.21.44 paṭolaṃ naktamālaṃ ca śirīṣaḥ khadirāsanau |
dārvī haridrā mustā ca tejohvā madhukaṃ balā ||

6.21.45 etāni samabhāgāni kaṣāyam upasādhayet |
ity eṣa kabalagrāhaḥ kartavyo madhusaṃyutaḥ ||

6.21.46sārdrakaś ca kapittho vā savyoṣmadhuśarkaraḥ |
arocakeṣu sarveṣu praśasto dhāraṇo mukhe ||

6.21.47 ajājyo maricaṃ drākṣā tintriṇīkaṃ sadāḍimam |
sauvarcalaṃ kāravīṃ ca guḍamākṣikasaṃyutam ||

6.21.48 drākṣāghautakaya |.. |.. (?)mukhabiśodhanaḥ |
arocakānāṃ sarveṣāṃ praśastaḥ kabalottamaḥ ||

6.21.49 sambhavanti trayo doṣāḥ galenāsaudaneriṇīm |
galaśuṇḍīṃ vardhayanti ghorāṃ galavisāriṇīm ||

6.21.50 sirāvyadhaḥ snehapānaṃ tīkṣṇaṃśīrṣavirecanam |
śastrāvacāro dhūmaś ca nāśayed galaśuṇḍikām ||

6.21.51 vātikaḥ karṇaśūlaś ca karṇavātaś ca vātikaḥ |
bādhiryaṃ ca samākhyātam vātaśleṣmasamudbhavam ||

6.21.52 snehapānāni nasyaṃ ca nāḍīsvedopanāhanam |
ānūpāś ca vasāmajjāḥ praśastāḥ karṇapūraṇe ||

6.21.53 pippalyau bilvamūlaṃ ca kuṣṭhaṃ madhukam eva ca |
lodhravyāghranakhaṃ māṃsī sūkṣmailā devadāru ca ||

6.21.54 garbheṇānena tailasya prasthaṃ mṛdvagninā pacet |
mūlakasyārdrakasyāpi rasau snehasamau tathā ||

6.21.55 tena karṇe picuṃ dadyānnasyakarma ca kārayet |
tenopaśāmyati kṣipraṃ karṇaśūlassudāruṇaḥ ||

6.21.56 śairīṣaṃ śatapākaṃ ca balātailaṃ ca miśrakam |
āśu karṇagataṃ śūlaṃ bādhiryaṃ cāpakarṣati ||

6.21.57chāgasarpamayūrāṇāṃ nakraśalyakayor api |
tulāṃ māṃsasya vipacetkṣīradroṇeṣu saptasu ||

6.21.58 pādabhāgāvaśiṣṭantu śītaṃ pūtaṃvimanthayet |
tatra yannavanītaṃ syāt tadebhir vipacetsamaiḥ ||

6.21.59 kṣavaḥ |.. phaṇijjako |||saindhavaṃ balā |
vacā vyāghranakho māṃsī devadārvagarū tathā ||

6.21.60 jīvakarṣabhakaumedā śṛṅgī karkaṭakasya ca |
ātmaguptāphalaṃ drākṣā tvakpatramatha vālukam ||

6.21.61 tat sarvaṃ srāvayitvā tu svanuguptaṃ nidhāpayet |
picumabhyañjanaṃ pānaṃ vastikarma ca kārayet ||

6.21.62 etena śīrṣarogāś ca karṇaśūlāni yāni ca |
karṇasrāvāś ca śāmyanti rogā jatrugatāś ca ye ||

6.21.63 etadvātottare proktaṃ karṇaśūle cikitsitam |
ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi raktajaṃ krimijaṃ ca yat ||

6.21.64 yadā duṣṭaṃ pittaraktaṃ karṇameva pradhāvati |
śvayathuś ca hi rāgaś ca karṇaśūlaś ca jāyate ||

6.21.65 vidhyetsirāṃ lalāṭasya dadyāccāsya virecanam |
|.. mle śirapānaṃ (?) ca tathā śīrṣavirecanam ||

6.21.66 akriyābhiḥ kriyābhiś cakarṇe pākaṃ niyacchati |
tasyopanāhaṃ kurvīta vraṇatailaṃ ca ropaṇam ||

6.21.67 tathākarṇaśalākābhiḥ karṇasrāvaṃ viśodhayet |
trayūṣaṇaṃ saindhavaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ mañjiṣṭhā madhukaṃ tathā ||

6.21.68 rāsnā haridrā tejohvā varāṅgaṃ tilvakatvacaḥ |
lākṣā mūrvārubūrkākakesarāsanavīraṇāḥ ||

6.21.69 sūkṣmailā tagaraṃ patraṃ tvagvyāghranakham eva ca |
āramālatilā māṣā bhūrjagranthirnidigdhikā ||

6.21.70 etaistulyakṛtairbhāgais tailaprasthaṃ vipācayet |
bhoginaś ca vasāṃ dadyānmāṃsaṃ babhroḥ kharasya ca ||

6.21.71 etena pūrayetkarṇaṃ muhūrtāccāvanāmayet |
karṇasrāvaṃ karṇaśūlaṃ bādhiryaṃ karṇavedanām ||

6.21.72 sarvāṃś caiva śirorogān tailametanniyacchati |
karṇasrotassuruddheṣu tāluke mastake tathā ||

6.21.73vedanā jāyate tīvrā vidāhastodavibhramau |
etani karṇaśūlasya kṛmijasya manīṣiṇaḥ ||

6.21.74 rūpāṇyāhuḥ samastānisa cāsādhya ihocyate |
pataṅgaḥśatapadyaś ca tathā kīṭapipīlikāḥ ||

6.21.75 praviśya karṇasroto vai bhṛśaṃ kurvanti vedanām |
karṇau nistudyatas tasya tathā ghuraghurāyaṇam ||

6.21.76 kīṭe carati ruk tīvrāniṣpandena bhaved aruk |
madhuśuktena payasā surayā vā++āsavena vā ||

6.21.77 uṣṇena pūrayetkarṇaṃ muhūrtāccāvanāmayet |
srute kīṭe tu yadyasya karṇasrāvaḥ pravartate || yathoktaṃ tasya kurvīta karṇasrāvacikitsitam |

6.22.1 ajīrṇe yaddivā bhuktaṃ na duṣyati yathā nṛṇām |
vyuṣitaṃ dūṣyate vāpi tatra hetuṃ nibodha me ||

6.22.2. vyāyacchato vicarataḥ vyākṣiptamanasas tathā |
mande rasapraseke ca divābhuktaṃ na duṣyati ||

6.22.3 kamalapratimaṃ prāhurhṛdayaṃ divasakṣayāt |
saṃvṛtaṃ vivṛtaṃ caiva bhavatyādity araśmibhiḥ ||

6.22.4 vibuddhe hṛdaye cāsya srotassu vivṛteṣu ca |
hṛdayaprabhavāś cāsya srotobhir vivṛtairdivā ||

6.22.5 na kledam upagacchanti divā tenāsya dhātavaḥ |
ajīrṇe prātarāśe tu tṛptasyāpi divā tatha ||

6.22.6 anena vidhinābhūyaḥ sāyamāśo na duṣyati |
vyuṣitaṃdūṣyate cāpi rogān sañjanayaty api ||

6.22.7saṃvṛteṣv ayaneṣvevaṃ vāyuś cāgniś ca dehinām |
vyāyāminaṃ vinaiveha tauhyannaṃ pacato niśi ||

6.22.8mlāne tu hṛdayerātrāvutkleśaikapadeṣu ca |
saṃvṛteṣv api srotassuvyāyāmaṃ ca na sevate ||

6.22.9 yadannaśeṣaṃ hṛdaye tiṣṭhatyāmāśaye ' pi ca |
tenāsyāmapralambenadehe paktimagacchatā ||

6.22.10 hṛdaye vyādhite ruddhe viṇmūtre ' sya niśātyaye |
upasthite cānnarase pittaśleṣmasamudbhave ||

6.22.11 annasaṃpuṭaruddhe ca mārute cordhvamāsthite |
hṛdayagrahamutkleśaṃ hṛllāsaṃ gurugātratām ||

6.22.12 tadannaśeṣaṃ janayenmūrchā parikinī(?) tṛṣām |
jvaraṃ chardimatīsāraṃ hikkāṃ bhaktasya vārucim ||

6.22.13 ajīrṇevyuṣitaṃ kuryād rogānetān viṣopamān |
tasmād ajīrṇevyuṣitaṃ bhojanaṃ pratiṣidhyate || |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. || trayoviṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ || |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |..

6.23.1 nidrāṃ caivātinidrāṃ ca mūrchāṃ caiva nibodha me |
tamasā hi samākrāntesattve divasasaṃkṣayāt ||

6.23.2 indriyāṇyasya karmabhyaḥ kramātpraviramantyatha |
bhukte ' nne pacyamāne ca śleṣmaṇā hṛdgatena tu ||

6.23.3 vivṛddhena niruddheṣu cakṣuḥśrotravaheṣu ca |
karmakriyāsūryapādaiścheditā prāṇino divā ||

6.23.4 śārīramānasaiś caiva tais tair uktair upāhṛtā |
evaṃkriyānnasaṃjñāni tandrā viśati tāmasī ||

6.23.5 evaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu nidrā nāmopajāyate |
cintāśokaśramaharī brahmaṇā vihitā purā ||

6.23.6svapatas tasya dehe ' smin prāṇāpānausahoṣmakau |
jāgṛtaḥjīvasaṃyuktastenāsau na vinaśyati ||

6.23.7 indriyāṇām uparame manassūparataṃ yadā |
sevate gocaraṃ teṣāṃ viddhi taṃ svapnanāmakam ||

6.23.8 pitṛdevamanuṣyeṣusaṃbhāṣaṇam upaiti ca |
paraṃ ca labhate svapnabhedassa hi na vātmanaḥ ||

6.23.9 atinidrā tu jantūnāṃ śleṣmaṇyucchrāyamāgate |
vātottarāṇāṃniyataṃ nidrā nāśaṃ vrajaty api ||

6.23.10 vastayaḥ snehapānāni grāmyānūpaudakā rasāḥ |
guḍadugdhasya pānaṃ ca nidrāsaṃjananaṃ param ||

6.23.11abhyaṅgodvartanaṃ snānaṃ madyaṃ ghṛtaṃ tathā |
manaḥprasādo nirvāṇaṃ naṣṭanidrasya bheṣajam ||

6.23.12 dhūmapānaṃ virekaś cakāyasya śirasas tathā |
pracchardanaṃ laṅghanaṃ ca nidrāsaṅgaṃ nivartayet ||

6.23.13ayānayānaṃ vyāyāmogūḍhārthaparicintanam |
yavānnanity asevātha nidrāsaṅgaṃ nivartayet ||

6.23.14 indriyāṇāṃ prasannatvaṃ manastālvantarāśritam |
hṛdi santiṣṭhate cittaṃbuddhisarvendriyāśrayam ||

6.23.15 sannipatya ca raktaṃ ca trayo doṣāś ca dūṣitāḥ |
sampīḍayantīha nṛṇāṃ hṛdayaṃ śoṣayanty api ||

6.23.16 āśuṣyamāṇaṃ hṛdayaṃpramādāddhi vimuhyati |
saṃpīḍitaṃ ca hṛdayaṃ manaścittaṃ ca mohayet |
sadanāccittamanasoḥ samprāpnoti visaṃjñatām |
