6.24.1hanugrahaṃ pādaharṣaṃ pārśvaśūlaṃ jvaraṃ kṣayam |
vardhmakuṇḍalikṛcchrāṇi hṛdgrahaṃgātrajaṃ klamam ||

6.24.2 aśītiṃ vātikān rogān tailametadvyapohati |
sannipātasamutthāṃś ca saṃsṛṣṭāṃś caikajāṃstathā ||

6.24.3 yonivyāpattivandhyātvaṃ pravṛddhaṃyadasṛgdaram |
balavarṇakaraṃ caiva kāsakṣayanirbahaṇam ||

6.24.4 balāmūlātpalaśataṃdaśamūlācchataṃ tathā |
śatāvaryā guḍūcyāś ca rāsnāmadhukadāruṇaḥ ||

6.24.5 kuryād daśapalānbhāgān kulutthān badarān yavān |
māṣāṃś ca kuḍavāṃśena jaladroṇeṣu pañcasu ||

6.24.6 kvāthaṃ droṇāvaśiṣṭantu tailāḍhakasamāyutam |
ghṛtaprasthena vipacet kṣīradroṇena cāpy atha ||

6.24.7peṣyān pradadyādvaidyo vai tagarośīravālakam |
kuṣṭhadhānyakamustailāvacāñcāgurucandanam ||

6.24.8 paripelavakālīyaṃ māṃsīṃ śrīveṣṭakaṃ rasam |
kunduruṣkaṃ ca takkolaṃ saralaṃ nalikāṃ nakham ||

6.24.9 spṛkkākuṃkumakarpūraṃ jātitindukayoḥ phalam |
patraṃ corakanāgāhvaṃ śatāhvāṃ sahareṇukām ||

6.24.10saturuṣkaṃ jīvanīyaṃ priyaṃguṃhapuṣāṃ tathā |
sthauṇeyakamuśīrāṇi śaileyaṃ ca samaṃ ghṛtam ||

6.24.11 kalkapiṣṭaiḥ pacettailametadvātāmayāpaham |
pāne cābhyañjanenasye vastau cāpi prayojayet ||

6.24.12 sarvadehāśrayā vātāḥ saṃsṛṣṭāś caikajāś ca ye |
teṣāṃ nigrahaṇe yuktam ity uvāca punarvasuḥ ||

6.24.13 tailenānena satataṃ vidhivattarpitaṃ naram |
sarvāmayā varjayanti sihmāvāsaṃ yathā mṛgāḥ ||

6.24.14 balāyā jātasārāyāstulāṃ kuryāt sukuṭṭitām |
pacettoye caturdroṇe caturbhāgāvaśeṣitam ||

6.24.15 palāni daśa piṣṭāni balāyās tatra dāpayet |
luñcitānāṃ tilānāntu dadyāt tailāḍhakadvayam ||

6.24.16 caturguṇena payasā pacettanmṛdunāgninā |
vātavyādhiṣu sarveṣu raktapitte kṣatakṣaye ||

6.24.17 vyāpannāsu ca yonīṣu śastaṃ naṣṭe ca retasi |
tāluśoṣaṃ tṛṣāṃ dāhaṃ pārśvaśūlamasṛgdaram ||

6.24.18 hanti śoṣamapasmāraṃ visarpaṃ saśirograham |
āyurvarṇakaraṃ proktaṃ balātailaṃ prajākaram ||

6.24.19 rāsnāmūlasya kurvīta dve śate ca balāśatam |
śatāvarīguḍcībhyāṃvaraṇāc ca śataṃ śatam ||

6.24.20 āḍhakīśigrukairaṇḍaśirīṣāragvadhād api |
śvadaṃṣṭrābhūtikābhyāṃ ca pṛthakpañcapalaṃ kṣipet ||

6.24.21 toyadroṇeṣudaśasu sādhayetsūkṣmakuṭṭitam |
droṇāvaśeṣe tasmiṃs tu tailasyārdharmaṇaṃ pacet ||

6.24.22 droṇān daśa ca dugdhasya ghṛtasyārdhaḍhakaṃ tathā |
tadaikadhyaṃ vipaktavyaṃ garbhe cātra vipācayet ||

6.24.23 madhukaṃ mālatīpuṣpaṃ mañjiṣṭhāṃ madayantikām |
kāśmaryāmajamodāṃ ca śṛṅgīṃ kapilamustakam ||

6.24.24 ātmaguptāḍhakīmūrvāvārtākāni madhūlikām |
sahadevāmathairaṇḍāṃ rohiṣaṃ navamālikām ||

6.24.25 phaṇijjakaṃ madhūkānivīrānīrakadambakam |
phalaṃ ca pīlupālāśaṃ kumāryaśvatthataindukam ||

6.24.26 hrīberaṃ pippalīkuṣṭhaṃ drākṣāṃ kaṭukarohiṇīm |
kāyasthāṃ ca vayasthāṃ ca madhuparṇīṃ sacitrakām ||

6.24.27 mahāpuruṣadantāṃ ca modakīṃ sallakīm api |
devadārvaguruśreṣṭhaṃ candanaṃ paripelavam ||

6.24.28 nīlotpalamuśīrāṇi mṛdvīkāṃ sāmlavetasām |
etaiḥ palasamaiḥ piṣṭaissamaṃ tailaṃ vipācayet ||

6.24.29 bhojane ' bhyañjane pāne vastau nasye ca śasyate |
vātavyādhiṣu sarveṣu kṣatakṣīṇe śirograhe ||

6.24.30 svarakṣaye raktapitte hikkāśvāseṣv asṛgdare |
mārute pittasaṃsṛṣṭe saṃsṛṣṭe śoṇitena ca ||

6.24.31viṣamajvarahṛdroge gātrakampe tathaiva ca |
apasmāre raktagulme puṃsāṃ naṣṭe ca retasi ||

6.24.32 rāsnātailam idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ balamāṃsavivardhanam |
samūlapatraśākhasya śataṃ sahacarasya ca ||

6.24.33 caturṣu toyadroṇeṣu sādhayetsūkṣmakuṭṭitam |
droṇāvaśeṣapūte capacettailāḍhakaṃ śanaiḥ ||

6.24.34ambujānūpamāṃsaiś ca śirastasyopanāhayet |
nasyakarma ca kurvītapicuṃ mūrdhni ca dāpayet ||

6.24.35 mukhaṃvighaṭayet tasya sandaṃśena yathāsukham |
bhṛṅgāreṇa prayacchec ca snehamāṃsarasaṃ tathā ||

6.24.36 avyādadānasya tathā dantānuddhāṭya saṃhatān |
āmāśayagate vātesnehairnopacared bhiṣak ||

6.24.37 laṅghanaṃ tasya kurvīta tathā saṃśodhanāni ca |
āmapralepasambhūtaḥ śleṣmasthānagato ' nilaḥ ||

6.24.38 snehairmāṃsarasaiś caiva snehyamāno vivardhate |
tasmāt tasya virūkṣāṇi bhojanāni kaṭūni ca ||

6.24.39 āhāre cauṣadhārthe ca vidadhyācśāstrakovidaḥ |
āmāśayasthe vamanaṃ kṣārāḥ kṣāraguḍās tathā ||

6.24.40 ariṣṭāśśīdhavaś caiva hitaṃ māṃsaṃ ca jāṅgalam |
śyāmākāḥ koradūṣāś ca mudgā lohitaśālayaḥ ||

6.24.41 svedo yavānnaṃ ca hitamāmāśayagate ' nile |
yadā pakvāśayagato rūpāṇi kurute ' nilaḥ ||

6.24.42 sirāsu sarvagātreṣu majjasvasthigato ' pi vā |
nirūpya rūpamuktasya tasya kuryāc cikitsitam ||

6.24.43 kṛtsnaṃ yadupadiṣṭaṃ tu vātavyādhicikitsitam |
raktasthānagate vāyau pūrvamuktaṃ cikitsitam ||

6.24.44 vātaśoṇitake tat tu kuryād raktagate ' nile |
samutthitāyāṃ gṛdhrasyāṃ balātailaṃ praśasyate ||

6.24.45 śreṣṭhaṃ mūlakatailaṃ vā tailaṃ sahacarasya vā |
vastayaḥ snehapānāni snehaśconmardanani ca ||

6.24.46 gṛdhrasyāṃ tu praśasyante śoṇitasya ca mokṣaṇam |
aśītirvātajā rogāḥ ye ye pūrvaṃ prakīrtitāḥ ||

6.24.47 teṣāmeṣā cikitsā tu vāyoḥ sthāneṣu saptasu |
sādhyā ye cāpy asādhyās tu rogā mārutasambhavāḥ ||

6.24.48 utpatantyatha tiṣṭhanti vāyoḥ sthāneṣu saptasu |
asthimajjāgato bhaṅgaṃ kampanaṃ gātraśoṣaṇam ||

6.24.49 pakṣagrahamapasmāramunmādam api cārditam |
hanugrahaṃ kuṇiṃkubjaṃ pāṅgulyaṃ sandhivicyutim ||

6.24.50karoti māruto ' nye ca vātarogā bhavanty api |
sādhyān sthānavaśādeva tāṃścikitsedyathākramam ||

6.24.51 itīyaṃ vistareṇoktā cikitsā vātarogiṇām |
vāto hi jīvite hetuḥ prāṇināṃ catathātyaye ||

6.24.52 santatyā gamayennityaṃ sūryaṃ candramasaṃ tathā |
varṣaṇaṃ vāyunāloke tathaiva ca nivāraṇam ||

6.24.53 vahate ca vimānāni sarvaśaḥ svargavāsinām |
sāgare kurute velāṃ vāyurmeghān sṛjaty api ||

6.24.54 vigatirvāyunā meghovidyudbhavati vāyunā |
trailokyadhārī pavanassarvaṃ vātātpravartate ||

6.24.55nirvartayetpuṣpaphalaṃ vāyurdhārayate jalam |
ulkāpātān mahīkampāndharaṇīdhāraṇāni ca ||

6.24.56 ākāśe dhārayed gaṅgāṃ vāyus tv atibalānvitaḥ |
etāś cānyāś ca bahavo vāyor guṇavibhāvanāḥ ||

6.24.57 tasmāt prayatnatas tasya cikitsāṃ bhiṣajāṃ varaḥ |
kuryāc chāstrānusāreṇa tathā siddhim avāpnuyāt || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele caturviṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ || || pañcaviṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ || athātaḥ plīhahalīmakacikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

6.25.1 abhiṣyandīni bhojyānibhuñjītātīva yo naraḥ |
laṅghito vāvirikto vā vyāyāmam upasevate ||

6.25.2 bhuktvā pītodako yas tu sahasā saṃpradhāvati |
pṛṣṭhayānād drutāc cāpi plavanātsnehavibhramāt ||

6.25.3 rogairanyaiś ca klinnānāṃ kurbalānāṃ ca dehinām |
plīhā sthānātpravardheta tasya rūpāṇi me śṛṇu ||

6.25.4 karotyagnermārdavaṃ ca śūlaṃ kaṭhinaeva ca |
mahāparigrahaścaiṣa plīhā vātasamudbhavaḥ ||

6.25.5 sajvaraḥ sapipāsaś ca svedanastīvravedanaḥ |
pītakaḥ stabdhagātraś ca plīhā pittātmako bhavet ||

6.25.6 nity ānāhitakoṣṭhaś canity odāvartapīḍitaḥ |
vedanābhiparītaś ca plīhā śleṣmātmako mataḥ ||

6.25.7 trayāṇāṃ yatra rūpāṇi doṣāṇāṃ lakṣayed bhiṣak |
asādhyam iti taṃ vidyāt plīhānaṃ sānnipātikam ||

6.25.8 muṣṭimātrassusādhyas tuparamastamupācaret |
atipramāṇavṛddhas tu na sidhyati kathañcana ||

6.25.9 sarveṣu teṣudaurbalyamānāho gātrasādanam |
aruciś cāvipākaś ca varcomūtragraho jvaraḥ ||

6.25.10 mārdvīkaṃ ca pibedyuktyā gaṇḍīrāriṣṭam eva vā |
candraprabhaṃ śārkaraṃ vā pāyayet tu halīmake ||

6.25.11 ayor ajīyaṃ kṣīreṇa pāyayet tu rasāyanam |
agastyābhayalehaṃ vā seveta prayataḥ śuciḥ || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ || iti bhele pañcaviṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ || || ṣaḍviṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto ' patantrakacikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

6.26.1 rūkṣānnapānasevābhir vegasandhāraṇena ca |
karśitasyātimātrantu ceṣṭitasya tathaiva ca ||

6.26.2 viriktayuktanasyasya vastinā karśitasya ca |
apatantritabhaktasya bhaktasyāpyatisevinaḥ ||

6.26.3 śuddhaḥ pakvāśayagato vāyurvṛddhaḥ prapadyate |
sapīḍayitvā hṛdayaṃ dhamanīrdaśa saṃsthitaḥ ||

6.26.4 ūrdhvamāpūrya srotāṃsi śiraśśaṅkhau ca dhāvati |
ākṣepāttasya gātrāṇi nāmyante ca dhanuryathā ||

6.26.5 nimīlitākṣaḥ stabdho vā nirucchavāso viceṣṭate |
kṛcchrācchavasitisarpīva kūjaty api kapotavat ||

6.26.6 mukte ca hṛdi vātena punaḥ svāsthyaṃ niyacchati |
bhūyas tu śete srastākṣo muhyatyaprayato yathā ||

6.26.7 ghorassa vātiko rogo dhamanīhṛdayāśritaḥ |
sannirodhāc ca nāḍīnāṃ yantritānāṃ ca vegataḥ ||

6.26.8 srotasāṃ vyākulībhāvānnityaṃ syādapatantrakaḥ |
na cainaṃ vāmayed dhīro na cāpy enaṃ virecayet ||

6.26.9 na cāsyāsthāpanaṃ dadyānna cainamapatarpayet |
pippalyo ' tha viḍaṅgāni śigrūṇi maricani ca ||

6.26.10 etāni sūkṣmapiṣṭānikuryāc chīrṣavirecanam |
śvasato yasya saṃvṛddhiḥ śleṣmaṇo mārutasya ca ||

6.26.11 tasya śleṣmaṇyupahatesaṃjñā samupajāyate |
sauvarcalaṃ dāḍimaṃ ca tathā hiṃgvamlavetasam || 6.2

6.26.12 mahauṣadhaṃ ca pītāni nāśayantyapatantrakam |
hiṅgu puṣkaramūlaṃ ca tumburūṇi harītakī ||

6.26.13yavakvāthodakenaitaddātavyaṃ lavaṇaistribhiḥ |
hṛdrogaṃ pārśvaśūlaṃ ca pravṛddhaṃ cāpatantrakam ||

6.26.14 yogo ' yaṃ śamayatyāśu śūlaṃ gulmaṃ ca vātikam |
vibhītakaṃ cātiviṣāṃ bhadramustāṃ sapippalīm ||

6.26.15 bhārṅgīṃ saśṛṅgaberāṃ ca sūkṣmacūrṇāni kārayet |
tāni cūrṇānimadyena pītānyuṣṇodakena vā ||

6.26.16 nāśayanti nṛṇāṃ kṣipraṃ śvāsakāsapatānakam |
harītakī vacā rāsnā saindhavaṃ sāmlavetasam ||

6.26.17 ghṛtamātrāsamāyuktaṃ nāśayatyapatānakam |
śukanāsā mahāvallī dve bṛhatyau mahauṣadham ||

6.26.18 niculaś caiva bhārṅgī ca |.. |.. kālikā |
punarnavā ceti samairakṣamātraiḥ pacedbhiṣak ||

6.26.19 toyāḍhake ghṛtaprasthaṃ tatsiddhaṃ cāpi pāyayet |
śvāsakāsā mahāhikkāhṛdrogaś cāpatantrakaḥ ||

6.26.20 nātikrāmed idaṃ sarpiḥ velāmiva mahodadhiḥ |
kākādanī balālambā dve bṛhatyau mahauṣadham ||

6.26.21 kadambapuṣpī kālā cacandravallī tathā vṛṣā |
ādārī ca vidārī ca suvahā keśavaty api ||

6.26.22 eteṣāṃ dvipalān bhāgān jaladroṇe vipācayet |
etairevākṣamātraiś ca ghṛtaprasthaṃ vipācayet ||

6.26.23 dviguṇena kaṣāyeṇa tatsiddhaṃ yuktiyaḥ pibet |
asādhyāṃ mahatīṃ hikkāṃ śvāsaṃ caivāpakarṣati ||

6.26.24 harītakyāś ca pañcād dve ca sauvarcalātpale |
vipācayed ghṛtaprasthaṃ dviguṇakṣīrasaṃyutam ||

6.26.25 apatānaṃ sahṛdrogametasarpirvyapohati |
hikkāśvāsau ca saṃvṛddhau sadya eva cikitsati ||

6.26.26 atapānakanāśārthametaduktaṃ cikitsitam |
athārditānāṃ vakṣyāmi cikitsāṃ lakṣaṇāni ca ||

6.26.27 śastrakāṣṭhaprahārācca grāmyadharmātisevanāt |
chardanānmadyapānāc ca dhanuṣaś ca vikarṣaṇāt ||

6.26.28 nityaṃ vyāyāmaśīlānāṃ patanāllaṅghanād api |
avatantritabhaktasya vyādhinākarśitasya ca ||

6.26.29 narasya kupito vāyurūrdhvam eva prapadyate |
hanumūlaṃ śiraś cāpi grīvāṃ caivārdayaty api ||

6.26.30 sajihmaṃ kutute tasya vadanaṃ cakṣureva ca |
kampate ' sya śirogrīvaṃ nāsā vakrībhavaty api ||

6.26.31tasyākṣiṇī nimīlyete niṣpandeviṣame tathā |
ūrdhvaṃ viprekṣate ' tyarthaṃ tiryagākekarekṣaṇaḥ ||

6.26.32 oṣṭhau śvayathumantau ca cibukaṃ ca vināmyate |
ṣṭhīvatyathātimātraṃ hi kalā sajjati cāsya vāk || |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. || saptaviṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ || |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |||nāṃ vraṇanāśanāḥ |

6.27.1 vraṇasya kāle sampaśyan tataḥ kuryād upakramam |
bhedanaṃ pācanaṃ caiva stambhanaṃ śoṣaṇaṃ tathā ||

6.27.2 srāvaṇaṃ ropaṇaṃ caiva vraṇe kuryād upakramam |
uditā karṇamoṭaśca rāsnā mūlakaparṇikā ||

6.27.3 śukanāsā sugandhā ca samaṅgā caiva kuṣṭhakam |
kāleyakaṃ balā dantī pāṭhā śatapadī sthirā ||

6.27.4pīḍanīyaḥ praleyo ' yaṃ vraṇaśvayathunāśanaḥ |
udumbaraḥ śirīṣaś ca madhukaṃ candanaṃ tilāḥ ||

6.27.5indukāntaṃ samudrāntā tathaiva ca śatāvarī |
nīlotpalaṃ padmakaṃ catvacā dve cāpi sāribe ||

6.27.6 eṣa pralepo gāraṃ ca vraṇānāṃtu vināśayet |
tilakalkassamadhukaḥ picumandasya kalkavān ||

6.27.7pūrvābhyāṃ sarpiṣā yukto vraṇeṣu vraṇaropaṇaḥ |
triphalā dhātakī lodhraṃ samaṅgā madhukaṃ balā ||

6.27.8 dve bṛhatyau samudrāntā tathaiva ca śatāvarī |
nīlotpalaṃ kaṭphalaṃ ca mālatī svarṇayūthikā ||

6.27.9 eṣāṃ kalkaissamaissiddhaṃ tailaṃ syād vraṇaropaṇam |
nimbvāmrāmalakīnāṃ ca pallavaṃ madhukaṃ balā ||

6.27.10 etaiśśakṛdrasesiddhaṃ tailaṃ vraṇanibarhaṇam |
nyagrodhodumbarāśvatthaplakṣapāṭhāvarārjunāḥ ||

6.27.11 śamībadaryā eteṣāṃ kaṣāyā vraṇadhāvanāḥ |
yavānnaṃ śālikā raktā mudgā nīvāraṣaṣṭikāḥ ||

6.27.12 jāṅgalāni ca māṃsāni vraṇitaśśīlayetsadā |
amlaṃ dadhi ca śākaṃ ca māṃsaṃ cānūpavārijam ||

6.27.13 kṣīraṃ gurūṇi cānnāni vraṇitaḥ parivarjayet |
etanupakramān kuryād vraṇe kāyacikitsakaḥ ||

6.27.14 śalyakṛc cāpi kurvīta vraṇe śeṣānupakramān |
chedyaṃ bhedyaṃ ca lekhyaṃ casīvyaṃ pracchanam eva ca ||

6.27.15 pācanaṃ yac ca tastulyaṃ bhaved anyac ca kiṃcana |
dvādaśa vraṇadoṣāśca parīkṣā caiva ṣaḍvidhā ||

6.27.16upakramāś ca ṣaṭtriṃśanniyatāḥ śalyahetuke |
uddeśataḥ kriyāś caitāḥ kuryāt kāyacikitsakaḥ ||

6.27.17 triphalā madhukaṃ lodhraṃ mañjiṣṭhā bilvaśuṇṭhikā |
samaṅgā dhātakī lākṣā viryāsaḥ śālmalerapi ||

6.27.18 pālāśasya ca niryāso niryāsaḥ kakubhasya ca |
sūkṣmāny etāni cūrṇāni vraṇānāṃ ropaṇaṃ param ||

6.27.19 gugguloḥ sallakīnāṃ ca sarjasya tiniśasya ca |
niryāsā ropaṇāḥ poktāḥ samastāḥ pṛthageva vā ||

6.27.20 vraṇe dhūmakramā ye ca pratyutpattau ca yā kriyā |
etaccheṣaṃ śalyakṛtā kartavyaṃ dṛṣṭakarmaṇā || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhelesaptaviṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ || || aṣṭāviṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ ||athātaḥ pānātyayacikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

6.28.1sarve lavaṇavarjyās tu rasā madye pratiṣṭhitāḥ |
tīkṣṇaṃ coṣṇaṃ tathāsūkṣmamāśukāri vyavāyi ca ||

6.28.2dīpanīyaṃ ca hṛdyaṃ ca sarvabhūtahitaṃ laghu |
cintāśorkaklamaharaṃ ratiprītivivardhanam ||

6.28.3 harṣasthāne harṣakaraṃ bhayasthāne bhayāpaham |
rativihārajananaṃ dyutiśauryakaraṃparam ||

6.28.4 śarīrāvayavān sarvānanugacchatyaṇūnapi |
taikṣṇyān mohayate cittam auṣṇyāt pittakaraṃ ca tat ||

6.28.5 hṛdyaṃvaiśadyabhāvāc ca raukṣyānmārutakopanam |
śleṣmaghnaṃ tīkṣṇabhāvac ca harṣaṇād vṛṣyamucyate ||

6.28.6 madyāvacāraṇāttasya kupitau pittamārutau |
śoṣayetāṃ rasavahāḥ sirāḥkloma ca tālu ca ||

6.28.7tṛṣāparītasso ' tyarthaṃ pānamevābhinandati |
pītaṃ pītaṃ śoṣayato dehe tasyāgnimārutau ||

6.28.8 gacchatyāśu jarāṃ dehe sikatāyāmivodakam |
tasmād ahorātram api pibataḥ pānasevinaḥ ||

6.28.9 tṛṣṇā nopaśamaṃ yāti pānaṃ jīryati cāśu ca |
bhrāmitasya tu madyena pittaṃ vāyuś ca dehinaḥ ||

6.28.10 vihīne cittamanasi buddhiṃ pīḍayatastataḥ |
sa roditi praharati visṛjatyati dhāvati ||

6.28.11 patatyutpatate hantibahvabaddhaṃ ca bhāṣate |
gacchatyagamyāmanyāṃ ca kāryākārye na budhyate ||

6.28.12tathā śvabhre ca patatiśete ca mṛtaśāyikām |
nagnoviśedvicaitanyaṃ vicareddhi vicetanaḥ ||

6.28.13īdṛśo ' pi bhavenmattaḥ pānenonmathitendriyaḥ |
pramāṇena pibenmadyaṃ nātiseveta paṇḍitaḥ ||

6.28.14 yuktyā tu sevyamānaṃ tatpānaṃ cāmṛtamucyate |
pānaṃ tadbhojane ' tyarthaṃ rucimantaṃ karoti ca ||

6.28.15 harṣaṃ janayate strīṣutajjarogaṃ cikitsakaḥ |
pānenaiva praśamayennānyattasya cikitsitam ||

6.28.16 tasmānmadyaṃ niṣeveta śubhrāṇi vacanāni ca |
bhajellaghūni cānnāni jāṅgalānna mṛgadvijān ||

6.28.17 snānaṃ sugandhaiḥ snānīyaiḥ kṛtvātvaganulepanam |
śabdān manojñān śṛṇvaṃś ca manojñaissaha bandhubhiḥ ||

6.28.18 gṛhe ' tyantasukhe hyetat kuryāt prasthottarottaram |
kāntāssumadhyavayasaḥ tanumadhyāśśucismitāḥ ||

6.28.19candrapādānmanohṛṣṭāścitramālyāmbarasrajaḥ |
caturāḥ kṣaumavasanāmuktāmaṇivibhūṣitāḥ ||

6.28.20 raktacandanadigdhāṅgā manojñā maṇimekhalāḥ |
tāḥ samāliṅgya śayaneśayītāpratimāḥ striyaḥ ||

6.28.21 yoṣito vai pradhānā vai śītasparśāḥ svabhāvataḥ |
nṛṇāṃ svabhāvataś caiva nāryo harṣavivardhanāḥ ||

6.28.22 somo hi śiśirodhāturhṛdi harṣāt pravardhate |
tasmād ālāpasaṃlāpaissaṃvāhanavinodanaiḥ ||

6.28.23 nārīṃ praharṣajananīṃ sevetāśu madātyaye |
gītatūryasvanās tatrasuhṛdaś ca madotkaṭāḥ ||

6.28.24 priyānuvarti gāyanto harṣaṃ kuryurmadātyaye |
nirdoṣāṇi ca madyāni yuktāni śiśirairjalaiḥ ||

6.28.25 tāni tāni śubhairmāsaiḥ sopadaṃśāni pāyayet |
pānakāni ca mukhyāni ṣāḍavāṃstarpaṇāni ca ||

6.28.26tavakṣīrīṃ sacukrīṃ ca sevetāsau madātyaye |
takraṃdrākṣārasassīdhustaittirīko rasomadhu ||

6.28.27 āranālaṃ ca śukraṃ ca koladāḍimayo rasau |
lājāḥ santarpaṇāś caiva sūkṣmāś ca yavatarpaṇāḥ ||

6.28.28 sauvarcalamajājyaś ca saindhavaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā |
śiśireṇa jalenaitattarpaṇaṃ pānavatpibet ||

6.28.29 mātuluṅgopadaṃśaṃ ca hanyāt pānātyayaṃ nṛṇām |
lākṣārasastaittirīko dāḍimasyaraso madhu ||

6.28.30 pūrvakalpena pātavyaṃ sampanne pānavibhrame |
karkandhubadarāṇāṃ ca prasthaṃ kuryāt sukuṭṭitam ||

6.28.31dviprasthe gālayaṃstoye saptakṛtvaḥ punaḥ punaḥ |
mṛṇmaye tatra vai bhāṇḍe svanuguptaṃ nidhāpayet ||

6.28.32 dve ca dadyād guḍapale śarkarāyāḥ palaṃ tathā |
sūkṣmaṃ ca maricātkarṣaṃ caturthaṃ kesarasya ca ||

6.28.33 tvakpatradharaṇe dve ca sūkṣmailākarṣam eva ca |
amṛṇālārdhakarṣaṃ ca sūkṣmacūrṇāni kārayet ||

6.28.34 jātīvāsanayopetaṃ pānakaṃ pānavibhrame |
nāśayatyāśu pānena chinnābhrāṇīva mārutaḥ ||

6.28.35 etacchardiṃ tṛṣāṃ dāhamatisāraṃ pravāhikām |
aruciṃ mūtrakṛcchraṃ ca hanyāt pānātyayaṃ nṛṇām ||

6.28.36 kāśmaryaṃ dāḍimaṃ drākṣāṃ madhukaṃ saparūṣakam |
kuṭajāni ca saṃkṣudya prakṣipettajjalāḍhake ||

6.28.37 sūkṣmailāmadhukaṃ lodhraṃ mañjiṣṭhā pippalī tathā |
etāni sūkṣmacūrṇāni dadyānmānaṃ ca yuktitaḥ ||

6.28.38 kesaraṃ cātra dātavyaṃ puṣpaṃ nīlotpalasya ca |
etatpānātyaye deyaṃ tṛṣācchardinivāraṇam ||

6.28.39 dve guḍūcī pale dve ca balā dvipalam eva ca |
lāmajjakamṛṇālābhyāṃ dve pale madhukotpalam ||

6.28.40 etānyāpothyadeyāni nave bhāṇḍe jalāḍhake |
guḍasya ca palānyaṣṭau dadyānnīlotpalaṃ tathā ||

6.28.41 etatpānātyaye deyaṃ pānakaṃ kesarairyutam |
jvaradāhatṛṣāśvāsacchardihikkāśca nāśayet ||

6.28.42 yadi saṃśamanairetairna śāmyetpānavibhramaḥ |
pāyayet taṃ trivṛccūrṇaṃ yuktyā madyena saṃyutam ||

6.28.43 pibedvirecanaṃ cūrṇaṃ mahātarpaṇam eva vā |
pūrvoktānmodakāṃś cāpi bhakṣayitvā pibetsurām ||

6.28.44 vamanīyaṃ yadā vidyāt tadainaṃ vāmayed bhiṣak |
vamanairmadyasaṃyuktaiścūrṇaiḥ pācanakair api ||

6.28.45 yavakṣāraiś ca saṃsargīṃ tasya kuryāc cikitsakaḥ |
na hi peyāḥ praśasyante manuṣyāṇāṃ madātyaye ||

6.28.46 madātyaye na śasyanteyavāgvo doṣanāśanāḥ |
jāṣyāt pānasya pītasya vegaṃ janayate punaḥ ||

6.28.47tanmadyaśeṣaṃ saṃvṛddhaṃ kurvād ghorānupadravān |
tasmāt pānātyaye ' pathyāḥ snehāḥ peyā yavāgvapi ||

6.28.48 sūkṣmāṇi dehasrotāṃsi madyaṃ samanudhāvati |
tiṣṭhatyavayavaiś cānyasrotassu viṣameṣv api ||

6.28.49viṣvagdhṛtāṃs tu koṣṭhasthān kopayatyānilādikān |
dhātavaste kharībhūtā vivṛddhāḥ pānadūṣitāḥ ||

6.28.50 pānena saha saṃsṛṣṭā janayanty āmayān bahūn |
vyavāyi madyamuddiṣṭaṃ viśeṣeṇa manīṣibhiḥ ||

6.28.51 ye tu sūkṣmādiviṣayāmadyādīnanuyānti vai |
na hi tānviṣayānanyo rasaśśakto vidhāritum ||

6.28.52 tasmāt pānātyayārtānāṃ madyamevauṣadhaṃ param |
svā hiyoniś ca tatpānaṃ pralīnaṃ koṣṭhamāśritam ||

6.28.53 vaśībhūtaṃprayatnena mahāsrotaḥ prapadyate |
ārtasya madyasaṃyuktāny auṣadhāny api sarvaśaḥ ||

6.28.54 madyātyaye prakurvīta kriyāḥ śītāś ca sarvaśaḥ |
ataś ca madyasaṃyuktāstarpaṇāḥ khalu dehinaḥ ||

6.28.55 deyāś cātiviriktāya srotasāṃ śodhanāya ca |
auṣṇyāt taikṣṇyādvikāsitvād vyavāyitvāc ca raukṣyataḥ ||

6.28.56 tulyaṃ hi rasavīryābhyāṃ viṣaṃ madyaṃ ca kīrtitam |
tasmāt tattatkriyāssarvā viṣavatsamupācaret ||

6.28.57 kledanaṃ tīkṣṇamuṣṇaṃ ca vidāhyañjananāvanam |
tasmād uṣṇodakaṃ svedaṃ dhūmaṃ pānaṃ ca sarpiṣaḥ ||

6.28.58 jvālānalaṃ tu sarveṣāṃ yavāgūśca vivarjayet |
dadhi dugdhaṃ ca śākaṃ ca grāmyānūpaudakāni ca ||

6.28.59tilapiṣṭakṛtaṃ caiva pānarogī vivarjayet |
śālīn saṣaṣṭikān mudgān jāṅgalānmṛgapakṣiṇaḥ ||

6.28.60 pānātyaye praśaṃsanti bhojaneṣu cikitsakāḥ |
sameṣu dhātukopeṣuvivikteṣu ca me śṛṇu ||

6.28.61 atimātraṃ yadā pānaṃ pītaṃ kopayate ' nilam |
saṃdṛśya vātikaṃ rūpaṃ tasyakuryāc cikitsitam ||

6.28.62 sauvarcalavyoṣayutaṃ madyaṃ mākṣikasaṃyutam |
cukraṃdāḍimasaṃyuktaṃ vātapānātyaye hitam ||

6.28.63toyaṃ madyaṃ ca śuktaṃ ca dadhi tvamlaṃ ca kāñjikam |
samākṣikastarpaṇo ' yaṃ vātapānātyaye hitaḥ ||

6.28.64 abhyaṅgo mardanaṃ snānaṃ pānānyardhodakāni ca |
vyaktāmlavyoṣasaṃyuktānrasān vrīhīṃś caśīlayet ||

6.28.65 chāgalaṃ taittiraṃ krauñcaṃ kaukkuṭaṃbārhiṇaṃ tathā |
vātapānātyayārtānāṃ bhojanārthaṃ hitaṃ nṛṇām ||

6.28.66 āmramāmrātakaṃ bhavyaṃ kapitthaṃ karamardakam |
pūrvakalpena pātavyaṃ pānakaṃ vātarogiṇām ||

6.28.67cavyaṃ sauvarcalaṃ hiṅgu mātuluṅgamahauṣadham |
tathājamodacūrṇaṃca madyena saha pāyayet ||

6.28.68 pānātyaye pittakṛte pānakaṃ śarkarāyutam |
pibenmākṣikasaṃyuktamardhatoyapariplutam ||

6.28.69 kecitpānaṃ tu garhanti pittapānātyaye nṛṇām |
tanmadyānna hi cecchakyaṃ vinācānyaiścikitsitum ||

6.28.70 saṃyuktaṃ taddhi pittaghnairmadyamevāpi sevyate |
vidāryāmalakānāṃca rasairikṣurasena vā ||

6.28.71 madhūkamadhukāśmaryakharjūraṃ nīlamutpalam |
pānakaṃ madyasaṃyuktaṃ pūrvakalpena sādhayet ||

6.28.72 ārdrakṣaumaparicchannā muktāmaṇivibhūṣitāḥ |
śyāmāścandanadigdhāṅgāḥ svapyādāśliṣya yoṣitaḥ ||

6.28.73 madyaṃ kharjūrakalkena pibed ikṣurasena vā |
pakvaṃ pīlurasaṃ vāpi vārtākīrasam eva vā ||

6.28.74 raso drākṣāvidārībhyāṃ madyamikṣuraso madhu |
pittapānātyayārtānāmetatpānaṃ hitaṃ nṛṇām ||

6.28.75 dṛtiṃ himāmbusampūrṇāṃ gandhamālyasamucchritām |
svapyāt pariṣvajya gṛhe pittapānātyayārditaḥ ||

6.28.76 sarāṃsi vanarājiś ca nalinī phullapaṅkajā |
bhavetpaṅkajapatraiś ca śayanaṃ candanokṣitam ||

6.28.77 upagūhya mṛṇālāni kalhārakusumāni ca |
śayītajalasaṃsṛṣṭavyajanair upavījitaḥ ||

6.28.78 pānātyaye pittakṛteśastrāśaniviṣopame |
jāṅgalairghṛtasaṃyuktairbhojayed raktaśālikān ||

6.28.79 mudgayūṣeṇa vā śītaṃ bhojanmṛdulaudanam |
triphalāyāḥ kaṣāyaṃ vā pibenmadyena saṃyutam ||

6.28.80 kṣaudreṇa rasamikṣorvā trivṛtkalkena vā punaḥ |
triphalātvaṅmadhūkāni padmakaṃ padmakesaram ||

6.28.81 nīlotpalaṃ mṛṇālāni naladaṃ candanaṃ balām |
siddhaṃ kaṣāyaṃ śītaṃ taiḥ śarkarāmadhusaṃyutam ||

6.28.82 kiṃcinmadyena saṃyuktaṃ pittapānātyaye hitam |
drākṣā pīlūni pakvāni kharjūrāṇi parūṣakam ||

6.28.83 bhavyaṃ panasamajjā ca majjātālaphalasya ca |
āpothya tāni sarvāṇi palāṃśāni jalāḍhake ||

6.28.84 caturbhāgāvaśeṣaṃ tu nave kumbhe samāvapet |
datvāsitāpalānyaṣṭau palaṃnīlotpalasya tu ||

6.28.85 tatpibetpānakaṃ yuktyā pittapānātyayārditaḥ |
ślaiṣmike pānaroge ca madyena vamanaṃ hitam ||

6.28.86 paṭolaṃ picumandaṃ ca madanasya ca pallavam |
guḍūcī cāṭarūṣaś ca triphalā pāribhadrakaḥ ||

6.28.87 kaṣāyaṃ pāyayed etaṃ śītaṃ mākṣikasaṃyutam |
nityaṃ seveta tiktāni kaṣāyakaṭukāni ca ||

6.28.88 jāṅgalāni ca māṃāni seveta mṛgapakṣiṇām |
pibetkuṭannaṭācūrṇaṃ triphalārasasaṃyutam ||

6.28.89 dīpanīyāṃś ca seveta yogān pānena nity aśaḥ |
vikāre śleṣmaṇi hitaṃ madyaṃ bhūyiṣṭham eva hi ||

6.28.90 tasmāt pānātyaye madyaṃślaiṣmike paricakṣmahe |
eṣā vimānataḥ proktā śleṣmapānātyaye kriyā ||

6.28.91 sarvataḥ sannipāte tu sadā kuryāc cikitsitam |
ahāni sapta cāṣṭau vā nṛṇāṃ pānātyaye smṛtam ||

6.28.92 pānaṃ hi bhajate jīrṇamata ūrdhvaṃ vimārgataḥ |
anena kālayogena yo rogo na nivartate ||

6.28.93 kṛtvānupūrvyā pānasya kuryāt tasya cikitsitam |
hikkāśvāsādayo rogā ye ca sarve samutthitāḥ ||

6.28.94 teṣāṃ cikitsitaṃ kuryād yathā sve sve cikitsite |
iti pānātyayārtānāṃ vistareṇa cikitsitam ||

6.28.95 prajāhitam idaṃ proktaṃ śiṣyāṇāmarthasiddhaye || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bheleaṣṭāviṃśo ' dhyāyaḥ || iti bhelasaṃhitāyāṃ cikitsāsthānaṃ samāptam || || kalpasthānam || || prathamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athātomadanakalpaṃ vyākhyāsyāma it ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

7.1.1 piṇḍītakāni tu trīṇi saṃgrahoktāni me śṛṇu |
kṛṣṇaṃ śvetamubhe tac ca tritayaṃ madanaṃ smṛtam ||

7.1.2 phalānāntvevasarveṣāṃ madanaṃ sarvaśodhanam |
vamanāsthāpane yojyaṃ tathaivāpy anuvāsane ||

7.1.3 yadā na paripūrṇān paripakvāni tāni ca |
bhavanti rasapūrṇāni tatastānyuddhared bhiṣak ||

7.1.4 yavapalle tathaitāni tuṣapalle tathā punaḥ |
saptarātraṃ vāsayitvā saṃkuñcitaphalatvacā ||

7.1.5 subhāvitāni vijñāya mṛdubhūtāni śāstravit |
dvidhā tridhā śodhayitvā samyak saṃśodhya cāvapet ||

7.1.6dhānyeṣu māsaṃ saṃsthāpya mṛdā caivāvalepayet |
nidhūme ca nivāte ca kapāṭapihite gṛhe ||

7.1.7 vaihāyase sthāpayec cayathā svedo na saṃbhavet |
eteṣāṃ phalamajjānāṃsanakhaṃ muṣṭimāharet ||

7.1.8 jarjarīkṛtya dṛṣadi pātre cāpy adhivāsayet |
madhukasya kaṣāyeṇa rātrimekāṃ nidhāpayet ||

7.1.9 atha cotthāya pūrvāhṇe hastau prakṣālya mardayet |
parisrutaṃ salavaṇaṃ madhuyuktaṃ pratāpya ca ||

7.1.10 pāyayed āturaṃ snigdhaṃ chardayet tena sādhu nā |
etenaiva ca kalpena jīmūtakaphalair api ||

7.1.11 ikṣvākukuṭajābhyāṃ ca lavaṇaiś cāpi kārayet |
kṛtavedhairhastiparṇaiḥ dhāmārgavaphalair api ||

7.1.12 kaṣāyaṃ kārayed ebhiḥ phalabījāni bhāvayet |
anena kalpena bhiṣak pāyayet tu yathābalam ||

7.1.13 madanasya phalānyeva punaruddhārayed bhiṣak |
yathāsyurnātipāṇḍūni tathaiva haritāny api ||

7.1.14 paripūrṇāni pakvāni tathā jātarasāni ca |
sūcyā vā kaṇṭakair vāthavyadhayitvā samantataḥ ||

7.1.15 madanānāṃ kaṣāyeṇa trirātraṃ bhāvayed bhiṣak |
etenaiva ca kalpena jīmūtakaphalair api ||

7.1.16 ikṣvākukuṭajānāṃ tu dhāmārgavaphalair api |
kṛtavedhairhāstiparṇaiśchardayet tena sādhunā ||

7.1.17 sakhalvetena kalpena kuśānāṃ varuṇasya ca |
kākodumbarikāyāś ca kuṣṭhākhyāyās tathaiva ca || ekaikasya kaṣāyeṇa susnigdhaṃ pāyayed bhiṣak |
balābalamavekṣya |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. || || tṛtīyo ' dhyāyaḥ || |.. |.. |.. ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

7.3.1 ikṣvākūṇyuddhareddhīmānvasante ' tha śarady api |
yadā prayuṣpitānisyurmadhugandhīni vānti ca ||

7.3.2 teṣāṃ kriyāṃ pravakṣyāma ikṣvākūṇāṃ yathā vidhiḥ |
ikṣvākubhiḥ payassiddhaṃ tenaivaṃ vāmayed bhiṣak ||

7.3.3 payasā dadhi kṛtvā vā pāyayet tu yathābalam |
nirmathya vāmayeccainaṃ navanītena vānaram ||

7.3.4 vihitā cekṣvākuṣveṣā samākhyātā kriyā mayā |
vṛntānyārdrāṇi cādāyasthāpayetphāṇitodare ||

7.3.5 ekarātrasthitānyatra hastau prakṣālya mardayet |
parisrutaṃ salavaṇaṃ madhuyuktaṃ pratāpya ca ||

7.3.6 pāyayed āturaṃ snigdhaṃ charayet tena sādhu saḥ |
etenaiva cakalpena ikṣudarbhekṣuvārikaiḥ ||

7.3.7 tathā poṭagalekṣośca kārayet tu rasāplutam |
athavā kovidārasyapatraissammiśritāni tu ||

7.3.8 ikṣvākūṇāṃ pallavāni svedayed gomayāgninā |
tāni svinnāni coddhṛtya kṣodayitvāhyulūkhale ||

7.3.9 tataḥ phalakaṣāyeṇa svabhyāsicya samasya ca |
ekarātraṃ kaṣāye ' smin svanuguptaṃ nidhāpayet ||

7.3.10 pūrvakalpavidhānena vāmayet taṃ yathābalam |
ikṣvākūṇāṃ prasṛtaṃ ca sūkṣmaṃ cūrṇāni kārayet ||

7.3.11 kovidārakaṣāyeṇa gulikāḥ kārayed bhiṣak |
etenaiva kaṣāyeṇa vinīya gulikāntu tām ||

7.3.12 yathābalaṃ pāyayet tu chardayet tena sādhu saḥ |
etena khalu kalpena kuśānāṃ tagarasya ca ||

7.3.13 etaikasya kaṣāyeṇa susnigdhaṃ vāmayed bhiṣak |
yathābalaṃ yathoddiṣṭaṃ chardayet tena sādhu saḥ ||

7.3.14 ikṣvākubhiḥpayassiddhaṃ pāyayet tu yathābalam |
ikṣvākūṇāmayaṃ kalpo vamanārthāya kīrtitaḥ ||

7.3.15 mṛdurabhyāsatassiddhaḥ prayojyo deśakālataḥ || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele kalpasthāne tṛtīyo ' dhyāyaḥ || || caturtho ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto dhāmārgavakalpaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

7.4.1 dhāmārgavānyuddhareta vasante vā śarady api |
yadā prapuṣpitāni syuḥmadhugandhīni bhānti ca ||

7.4.2 same bhūmipradeśe ' smin kuśarohiṣasaṃskṛte |
kṛṣṇamṛtsnāprabhe vāpihyathavā svarṇamṛttike ||

7.4.3 vyātape na nadītīre śvabhravalmīkayos tathā |
paripūrṇāni pakvāni tathā jātarasāni ca ||

7.4.4 bhiṣaguddhṛtya matimān yavapalle nidhāpayet |
vusapalle ' tha vā dhīraḥ saptarātraṃ nidhāpayet ||

7.4.5 subhāvitāni vijñāya mṛdubhūtāni śāstravit |
jarjarīkṛtya dṛṣadi pātreṣvāsicya nirharet ||

7.4.6 kovidārakaṣāyeṇa rātrimekāṃ nidhāpayet |
atha cotthāya pūrvāhṇe hastau prakṣālya mardayet ||

7.4.7 parisrutaṃ salavaṇaṃ madhuyuktaṃ pratāpya ca |
pāyayed āturaṃ snigdhaṃ chardayet tena sādhu saḥ ||

7.4.8 dhāmārgavāṇāmeteṣāṃ muṣṭiṃ saṃgṛhyasannakham |
jarjarīkṛtya dṛṣadi pātreṣv abhyavahārayet ||

7.4.9 kovidārakaṣāyeṇa rātrimekāṃ nidhāpayet |
pūrvoktenaiva kalpena vāmayet tu yathābalam ||

7.4.10 naladasya kaṣāyeṇa tālīsaśatapuṣpayoḥ |
kuṣṭhasya mūrvāpāṭhāyāḥ pūrvakalpena chardayet ||

7.4.11 dhāmārgavāñjaliṃ pūrṇaṃ sūkṣmacūrṇāni kārayet |
śyāmākaṣāye prakṣipyacaikarātraṃ yathāvidhi ||

7.4.12 tathā phalakaṣāye ' sminnikṣvākukṛtavedhane |
jīmūtake hastiparṇe kaṣāye paribhāvayet ||

7.4.13 tata uddhṛtya saṃśoṣya sūkṣmacūrṇāni kārayet |
kṛsarāṃ tena saṃyuktāṃ nātyuṣṇāṃ pāyayennaram ||

7.4.14 utpalaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ ca naladaṃ kumudaṃ tathā |
tena cūrṇena saṃspṛśya ghrātumasmai pradāpayet ||

7.4.15 sirāhṛdayamāpnotiyāvattatkila miśrakam |
tvaritaṃ tāni puṣpāṇi ghrātumasmai pradāpayet ||

7.4.16 ghrātuṃ punaḥ punarmadhyaṃ cūrṇayitvā muhurmuhuḥ |
anenaiva ca kalpena sukhaṃ vamati mānavaḥ ||

7.4.17 dhāmārgavāñjaliṃ pūrṇaṃ sūkṣmacūrṇāni kārayet |
tridhā vibhajya matimān svanuguptaṃ nidhāpayet ||

7.4.18 atha bilvakaṣāyeṇadvau bhāgau ścyotayed bhiṣak |
cyute kaṣāye vimale svanuguptaṃ nidhāpayet ||

7.4.19 bhāgaṃ tu gulikāḥ kāryāḥ kolakarkandhusammitāḥ |
kovidārakaṣāyeṇa pūrvakalpena chardayet ||

7.4.20 karkandhūbadarāṇāṃ ca kolānāṃ vāpi sīdhunā |
gulikāṃvinīya vidhivacchardayet tena sādhu saḥ ||

7.4.21 rohitasya ca matsyasya tathā karkaṭakasya ca |
pakṣiṇāmaudakānāṃ ca rasena tu vametsukham ||

7.4.22etena khalu kalpena cāmlaiś camadhusīdhubhiḥ |
gulikāṃvinīya vidhivat pāyayet tāṃ yathābalam || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele caturtho ' dhyāyaḥ || || pañcamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athātaḥ kuṭajakalpaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

7.5.1 vasante vā śaradi vā kuṭajāny uddhared bhiṣak |
śuciśśuddhaśśiraḥsnātaḥ puṣyeṇāśvayujena vā ||

7.5.2 pratūṭhāni śucau deśe kuśarohiṣasaṃskṛte |
kṛṣṇamṛtsnāprabhe vāpi tathā vā svarṇamṛttike ||

7.5.3 vyātape na nadītīre śvabhravalmīkayos tathā |
paripūrṇāni pakvāni tathā jātarasāni ca ||

7.5.4 kuṭajānāmathaiteṣāṃ muṣṭiṃ saṅgṛhya sannakham |
kovidārakaṣāyeṇa rātrimekāṃ nidhāpayet ||

7.5.5 atha cotthāya pūrvāhṇe hastau prakṣālya mardayet |
parisrutaṃ salavaṇaṃ madhuyuktaṃ pratāpya ca ||

7.5.6 pāyayed āturaṃ snigdhaṃ chardayet tena sādhu saḥ |
anenaiva ca kalpena kaṣāyaṃ kārayed bhiṣak ||

7.5.7 kovidārasya bījaiś ca nīpasyavidulasya ca |
gulūcyāśca suṣvyāś capaṭolapicumandayoḥ ||

7.5.8 kṛtvāmadhūlikāyāś ca kaṣāyaṃ tena chardayet |
eṣām eva phalānāntu muṣṭiṃ saṃgṛhya sannakham ||
7.5.9 madhukasya kaṣāyeṇa taccūrṇaṃ parimardayet ||

7.5.10 gulikāḥ kārayet tena karkandhubadaropamāḥ |
kovidārakaṣāyeṇa pūrvakaloena chardayet ||

7.5.11 yathābalaṃ yathoddiṣṭaṃ chardayet tena sādhu saḥ |
kṛtavedhanakalpo ' yamukto vamanavistare ||

7.5.12 ya evaṃ samprajānāti sa rājñāṃ kartumarhati || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele kalpasthāne pañcamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || ṣaṣṭho ' dhyāyaḥ || athātaścaturaṅgulīyaṃ kalpaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

7.6.1 manojñadeśajātas tu yo bhavec caturaṅgulaḥ |
phalamuṣṭiṃ samāhṛtya tataścūrṇāni kārayet ||

7.6.2 taccūrṇitaṃ tridhākṛtya bhāgamekaṃ nidhāpayet |
dvau bhāgau caśucissamyak kṛtvā manthanam eva tu ||

7.6.3 ścyotayitvā parisrutya suprasannamanāvilam |
paribhāgaṃ samāvāpya sādhayed gomayāgninā ||

7.6.4tasmiṃs tathā sicyamāne sūkṣmāṇīmāni dāpayet |
harītakīmāmalakaṃ vibhītakaphalāni ca ||

7.6.5 madhūkabhāgamāvāpya tadvilepanamāharet |
tataḥ pāṇitalaṃ cūrṇaṃ lehyaṃ tena viricyate ||

7.6.6 etenaiva ca kalpena kaṇṭakāryāḥ phalair api |
ścyotayitvā lehajātaṃ paritaḥsāsavaṃ pibet ||

7.6.7 caturaṅgulasiddhā vā peyā yojyā susaṃskṛtā |
viricyate tenasādhu nāyogo nātiyogitā ||

7.6.8 dhātrīphalarasadroṇe śarkarārdhatulāṃ pacet |
ghṛtaṃ catuṣpalaṃ pakvaṃ pṛthagardhapalaṃ kṣipet ||

7.6.9 nataṃ vellaṃ caturjātaṃ yaṣṭisaindhavajīrakam |
palāśaṃ viśvamaricaṃ mṛdvīkāyāścatuṣpalam ||

7.6.10 prasthaṃ kaṇātrivṛtayor madhunaś ca nihanti tat |
tatkhaṇḍāmalakaṃ nāma pāṇḍuśvayathukāmilām ||
7.6.11 śirobhramaṇamunmādamamlapittavikārajit ||

7.6.12. bhallātakānāṃ pavanāhatānāṃ vṛntacyutānāmiha cāṭhakaṃ syāt |
tadiṣṭakācūrṇakaṇairvighṛṣya prakṣālayitvā visṛjetpravāte ||

7.6.13 śuṣkaṃ punastadvidalīkṛtaṃ ca vinikṣipedapsu caturguṇāsu |
pādāvaśiṣṭaṃ paripūtaśītaṃ kṣīreṇa tulyena punaḥ paceta ||

7.6.14 tatpādaśiṣṭaṃ punareva śītaṃ ghṛtena tulyena punaḥ paceta |
tadardhayā śarkarayāvagāṭhaṃ lohābhayāvyoṣakacūrṇayuktam ||

7.6.15 etatsamaṃśārkarapādayuktaṃ tataḥ khajenonmathitaṃ nidhāya |
prasthadvayenāmalakīmadhūnāṃ śīte ' tha dhānyena punaḥ paceta ||

7.6.16 tatsaptarātrādupajātavīryaṃ sudhārasādapyadhikatvameti |
prātarviśuddhīkṛtadehabhājāṃ mātrāṃdadītātmaśarīrayogyām ||

7.6.17 na cānnapāne parihāryamāste na coṣṇavātādhvani maithune ca |
janturnitāntaṃ narasihmavatsyādbhaven naraḥ kāñcanarāśigauraḥ ||

7.6.18 dantāś caśīrṇāḥ punarudbhavanti keśāś ca śuklāḥ punareva kṛṣṇāḥ |
viśīrṇakarṇāṅgulināsiko ' pi kṛmyardito bhinnagalo ' pi kuṣṭhī ||

7.6.19 so ' pi krameṇāṅguligātraśākhastaruryathā rohati vārisiktaḥ |
mahāmayūrāñjayati svareṇa balena nāgāṃsturagān javena ||

7.6.20 |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. sudhākṣīreṇa bhāvayet |
tatpibet tu yathotsāhaṃ tena sādhu viricyate ||

7.6.21dantyakṣatā tu tejohvātarkārī sudurālabhā |
kaṣāyakvāthaity etatsudhākṣīreṇa miśrayet ||

7.6.22 tatpibet tu yathotsāhaṃ tena sādhu viricyate |
sudhākṣīreṇa gokṣīramekasthamabhisaṃsṛjet ||

7.6.23 tatpibet tu yathotsāhaṃ tena sādhu viricyate |
kṛtamūtrapurīṣasyavāte cāpy anulomite ||

7.6.24 prathamaṃ snigdhakoṣṭhasya svinnasya ca yathāvidhi |
sandhyāvelāmatikramya vimale ca divākare |
maitre muhūrte vyakte tu yogānetān prayojayet || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ || iti bhele kalpasthāne ṣaṣṭho ' dhyāyaḥ || || saptamo ' dhyāyaḥ ||athāto dantīphalakalpaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

7.7.1 tridhā vibhajya matimān svanuguptaṃ nidhāpayet |
rasenāmalakasyāpi dvau bhāgauścyotayed bhiṣak ||

7.7.2 cyutaṃ kaṣāyaṃ vimalaṃ pariyogamadhiśrayet |
tasmiṃs tathā pacyamāne taccūrṇamabhisaṃsṛjet ||

7.7.3 tanmātraṃ triphalācūrṇamāvapenmadhusaṃyutam |
lehabhūtaṃ viditvainamathainamavatārayet ||

7.7.4 tasya pāṇitalaṃ cūrṇaṃlehyaṃ tena viricyate |
eteṣāṃ caiva mūlānāṃ kṛtvā cūrṇāni sūkṣmaśaḥ ||

7.7.5 śyāmākaṣāyeṇāloḍyaghṛtaṃ siddhaṃ vipācayet |
jānīyāt tad yadā siddham athainam avatārayet ||

7.7.6tad dṛḍhe madhulipte tu nave kumbhe samāvapet |
mṛtsnābhiḥ svanulipte tu svanuguptaṃ nidhāpayet ||

7.7.7 prasṛtaṃ pāyayet tatra tena sādhu viricyate |
eteṣāṃ caiva mūlānāṃ kṛtvā cūrṇāni sarvaśaḥ ||

7.7.8 bṛhatīrasasammiśraiḥ gulikāṃ kārayet tu taiḥ |
gulikāṃ kārayitvā tu karkandhubadaropamām ||

7.7.9 śyāmākaṣāyeṇāloḍya dve vā tisro ' pi vā tataḥ |
pāyayet tu yathotsāhaṃ taṃ snigdhasveditaṃ naram ||

7.7.10 viricyatetena sādhu nāyogo nātiyogitā |
snehādi snehamūlaṃ tu pracchardanavirecanam |
nāparisnigdhakoṣṭhasyaprasidhyati viśodhanam || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele kalpasthāne saptamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || aṣṭhamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athātaḥ śaṅkhinīkalpaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

7.8.1 phalāni paripakvāni śaṅkhinyāstūddharedbhiṣak |
antarā caitravaiśākhamavyagro yavasaṃgrahe ||

7.8.2 anūṣare niruddhāre kṣetre sūryapratāpite |
kṛṣṇamṛtsnāprabhe vāpi tathā ca svarṇamṛttike ||

7.8.3 na vyagre na ca valmīke na cāpi tṛṇachādite |
susame bhūpradeśe tu yā jātā śaṅkhinī bhavet ||

7.8.4tasyā droṇaṃ samāvāpya tadbhāṇḍaṃ siddhabandhanam |
yavaparṇoṣitaṃ cāpisamuddhṛtya nidhāpayet ||

7.8.5 saptarātraṃvārdhamāsaṃ samācchādya samantataḥ |
ātape pariśuṣkāṇi sūkṣmacūrṇāni kārayet ||

7.8.6 phalānāmathacaiteṣāṃ dvau bhāgau kārayed bhiṣak |
tilaṃ tṛtīyakaṃ kṛtvā kṣodayitvā hyulūkhale ||

7.8.7 samyagdṛṣadi niṣpiṣya tailamuddhārayet tataḥ |
śaṅkhinyā hy akṣamātraṃ tu trivṛtkalkamathāpi vā ||

7.8.8 tasmiṃstaile payaś caiva bhiṣagdadyāccaturguṇam |
etat sarvaṃ samāloḍya pācayenmṛdunāgninā ||

7.8.9 pakvamāhṛtya visrāvya svanuguptaṃ nidhāpayet |
tasyāñjaliṃprakuñcaṃ vā prasṛtaṃ vāpi pāyayet ||

7.8.10 viricyate tena sādhunāyogo nātiyogitā |
susūkṣmasyātha śaṅkhinyāścūrṇasya prasṛtaṃ śṛtam ||

7.8.11 kṣīrapātreṇa saṃyojyapariyogamadhiśrayet |
tathā vipācya visrāvya śītīkṛtyābhimanthayet ||

7.8.12 tatrayannavanītaṃ syāt tad uddhṛtya vipācayet |
śaṅkhinīphalakalkena kṣīreṇa salilena ca ||

7.8.13 sa pibettad yathotsāhaṃ tena sādhu viricyate |
śaṅkhinīphalakalkantu samyak dṛṣadi peṣayet ||

7.8.14 gokṣīreṇa samāloḍya pibettena viricyate |
etenaiva ca kalpenahyuṣṭrīkṣīreṇapāyayet ||

7.8.15 ajākṣīre ' vikākṣīre māhiṣe vātha vā punaḥ |
gomūtreṇoṣṭramūtreṇacāvimūtreṇa vā punaḥ ||

7.8.16 athavā hastimūtreṇapibettena viricyate |
āmṛdgannatha mṛdvīkāṃdāpayetphāṇitodake ||

7.8.17 bhṛṣṭvā tu śaṅkhinītaile pariyogamadhiśrayet |
ardhaṃ cūrṇāni pippalyā harītakyāś ca dāpayet ||

7.8.18 ataḥpāṇitalaṃ prāśya tena sādhu viricyate |
śaṅkhinīphalamadhyāni dātavyaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā ||

7.8.19 śaṅkhinītailabhṛṣṭāniphāṇitenātha saṃsṛjet |
godhūmājyena saṃsṛjya modakān kārayed bhiṣak ||

7.8.20 tāṃstrīn dvau vātha saṃbhakṣya tatassādhu viricyate |
surāṃ sauvīrakaṃ takraṃ dadhimas tu tuṣodakam ||

7.8.21kaṭvaraṃkolasīdhuṃ vā dadhipakvarasaṃ tathā |
karkandhubadarāṇāṃ vāsīdhuṃ pīlupriyālayoḥ ||

7.8.22 bhavyapārāvatānāṃ ca mṛdvīkāmadyam eva vā |
bilvaśigrukapitthānāṃ rasānvā saha pāyayet ||

7.8.23 ayaṃ hi śaṅkhinīkalpomayā tu samudāhṛtaḥ |
ya evaṃ samprajānātisa rājñāṃ kartumarhati || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele kalpasthāne ' ṣṭamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || navamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athātaḥ śyāmātrivṛtkalpaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

7.9.1 śyāmāyāstrivṛtayāś camūlānyuddhārayed bhiṣak |
kalyāṇadeśajātāyāḥ kuśarohiṣasaṃskṛte ||

7.9.2 kṛṣṇamṛtsnāprame vāpihyathavā svarṇamṛttike |
mūlāny etāni saṃgṛhya sūkṣmacūrṇāni kārayet ||

7.9.3 sthirākaṣāye saṃsṛjya pāyayet tu yathābalam |
viricyate tena sādhunāyogo nātiyogitā ||

7.9.4 triphalārasamātreṇa drākṣāpīlurasena vā |
āloḍya vāpi payasā sarpiṣā vāpi pāyayet ||

7.9.5 hariṇasaya rasaṃ dadyānnyaṅkoś ca mahiṣasya ca |
khaḍgasya kalaviṅkasya tittirerlāvukasya ca ||

7.9.6 rasamanyatamaṃ teṣāṃtrivṛcchyāmāprayojitam |
yathābalaṃ pāyayet tu susnigdhaṃ sveditaṃ naram ||

7.9.7 śyāmāyāstrivṛtāyāś ca kṛtvā cūrṇāni sūkṣmaśaḥ |
tridhā vibhajyatatraikaṃ svayaṃ guptaṃ nidhāpayet ||

7.9.8 rasena tu priyaṅgūṇāṃ dvau bhāgauścyotayed bhiṣak |
bhājane tu parisrāvya suprasannamanāvilam ||

7.9.9 pariyogamadhiśrity a pācayenmṛdunāgninā |
tasmiṃs tathā pacyamāne cūrṇāny etāni dhāpayet ||

7.9.10priyaṅguṃ tagaraṃ caiva tālīsaṃ naladaṃ tathā |
hīberaṃ caiva mustāṃ ca balāṃkālānusāribām ||

7.9.11 aśokapuṣpacūrṇāni padmasaugandhikāni ca |
nalinaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ ca pippalīmūlam eva ca ||

7.9.12 madhunā saha saṃsṛjya lihyāt pāṇitalonmitam |
susnigdhojīrṇabhaktaś ca yathāśāstraṃ yathābalam ||

7.9.13 viricyate tena sādhu nāyogo nātiyogitā |
candanaṃ padmakaṃ nīpaṃ sālaṃ saptacchadaṃ tathā ||

7.9.14 punarnavāṃ tupalalaṃ kirātaṃ tiktam eva vā |
ye cānye tiktamadhurā rasāḥ pūrvaṃ prakīrtitāḥ ||

7.9.15 teṣāṃ kaṣāyairyojyaṃ syāt paittikānāṃ virecanam |
pārāvatān kapotāṃś ca krauñcabarhiṇakukkuṭān ||

7.9.16 kuraṅgān hariṇāneṇān haritān kālapucchakān |
vartakān tittirīṃścaiva śaśalāvakapiñjalān ||

7.9.17 rasais tair upayuñjīta paittikasya virecanam |
sārāḥphalāni cūrṇāni patrāṇi ca payāṃsi ca ||

7.9.18 ya uktāḥ sthāvarāḥ pūrvaṃ tathaiva mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ |
pānāniphalaniṣkvāthakaṣāyādidravān rasān ||

7.9.19lehān bhakṣyāṃś casānnādīn tebhyaḥ samabhikalpayet |
parūṣakasya drākṣāyā rasaṃ samadhuśarkaram ||

7.9.20 trivṛdakṣasamāyuktaṃ pītvā sādhu viricyate |
sādhayeccharkarāyuktaṃsahaiva madhunā bhiṣak ||

7.9.21śīte tasmiṃstrivṛccūrṇaṃ yathākoṣṭhaṃ samāvapet |
tataḥ kampillakāccūrṇaṃ dveca te tindukasya ca ||

7.9.22āragvadhaphalānmadhyabhāgāś cākṣasamāstathā |
trivṛccūrṇasya dharaṇaṃ śarkarāmadhukaṃ madhu ||

7.9.23 maricaṃ nāgapuṣpaṃ catvakpatraṃ ca sucūrṇitam |
etat sarvaṃ samāyojya modakaṃ kārayed bhiṣak ||

7.9.24 atha vā kārayellehaṃ tena sādhu viricyate |
drākṣārasasya kuḍavaṃ parūṣakarasasya ca ||

7.9.25 madhunaḥ kuḍavārdhaṃcaśarkarāpalam eva ca |
trivṛccūrṇakṛto lehastena sādhu viricyate ||

7.9.26etadutsannadoṣāṇāmīśvarāṇāṃ virecanam |
śarkarāmodakaṃ vāpi guḍakaṃmāṣapūrakam ||

7.9.27 anena vidhinā kuryāt paittikānāṃ virecanam |
trivṛccūrṇāni pippalyāḥ phalānyāragvadhasya ca ||

7.9.28 kalkānakṣasamānetānpibeddhīro virecanam |
trivṛccūrṇasya dharaṇaṃ śarkarā madhukaṃ madhu ||

7.9.29 etadakṣasamāyuktaṃ pītvā sādhu viricyate |
trivṛccūrṇāni pippalyo yavakṣāro mahauṣadham ||

7.9.30 śleṣmakopaśamārthāya lihyāt tena viricyate |
avimūtramajāmūtramuṣṭrasya mahiṣasya ca ||

7.9.31 mṛgasya mūtraṃ gomūtraṃ gardabhasya dvipasya ca |
etānyaṣṭau prayuñjīta pṛthagvā yadi vā saha ||

7.9.32 trivṛccūrṇavimiśrāṇivilihyānmadhunāpi vā |
ajātāni camadyāni tīkṣṇāni niśi tāni ca ||

7.9.33 trivṛccūrṇavimiśrāṇi pītvā sādhu viricyate |
trivṛccūrṇaṃ yathākoṣṭhaṃślaiṣmikaḥ pātumarhati ||

7.9.34 trivṛtāyāḥ kaṣāyeṇa sakṣaudraṃ sāmlavetasam |
atha vā dadhimaṇḍena kolakānāṃ rasena vā ||

7.9.35 kulutthamudgayūṣair vā satīnaciribilvayoḥ |
yavakolakayūṣeṇa pibetkaulatthameva vā ||

7.9.36 yuktaṃ vā taintraṇīkena sāmlavetasadāḍimam |
yūṣeṇa śigrukolāhvāmūlakānāṃ rasena vā ||

7.9.37rasenāmalakānāṃ vā bījapūrārjakasya vā |
kapittharasamaṇḍena karamardarasena vā ||

7.9.38 yaccānyadapi vā kiñcitphalamamlam iti smṛtam |
pibettatsvarasair vāpi pañcamūlīrasena vā ||

7.9.39 kaṭukalkavimiśraṃ vā yavakṣāreṇa saṃyutam |
mṛdvīkāphalakalkena lehārtham upakalpayet ||

7.9.40 pratyekasya phalānāṃca pūrvoktānāṃ cikitsakaḥ |
sujātānāṃ supakvānāṃ pratyagraṃ grāhayed rasam ||

7.9.41 tatrāmlalvaṇībhūte viripyāt saindhave bhavet(?) |
lehe ' smin trivṛtaścūrṇaṃ yathākoṣṭhaṃ samāvapet ||

7.9.42 sakṣaudraṃ saguḍaṃ vāpi lihyāt sakaṭukaṃ tathā |
etena vidhinā kuryānmodakān ṣāḍabānrasān ||

7.9.43 pānāni ca phalāmlāni bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca saṃskṛtam |
etad rājñāṃ samākhyātam īśvarāṇāṃ virecanam ||

7.9.44 vidhimevaṃ prayuñjītatvimaṃ cānyaṃ cikitsakaḥ |
śāṇamāmalakānāṃ ca vibhītakaphalāni ca ||

7.9.45tilvakassaptalā dantī śaṅkhinī caturaṅgulaḥ |
harītakīnāmekaṃ ca yavakṣārovacaiva hi ||

7.9.46 pippalīnāṃ caśāṇassyādviḍaṅgācchāṇa eva ca |
trivṛccūrṇasyatriśśāṇāstat sarvamavacūrṇayet ||

7.9.47 tāni cūrṇāni madhunā sarpiṣā vā guḍena vā |
lehaṃ vā vidhinā |.. |.. |.. |.. || || siddhisthānam || ||prathamo ' dhyāyaḥ |

8.1.1 riktakoṣṭhasya vamane mārutaḥ samprakupyati |
plīhāpracalati sthānāttasmād doṣānnihantyasūn ||

8.1.2 peyāṃ maṇḍaṃ pibettasmāt susnigdhaṃ lavaṇānvitam |
saumye tithau muhūrte ca nakṣatre karaṇe śubhe ||

8.1.3 śuklavastraḥ śucirbhūtvāhyarcayitvā dvijanmanaḥ |
tato ' smai vamanaṃ deyaṃ pūjayitvā bhiṣagvarān ||

8.1.4 prāṅmukhena tupātavyaṃ nivāte śaraṇe śubhe |
na cāsya kuryād āyāsaṃ maṇḍaṃ bhojyaṃ praśasyate ||

8.1.5 vidhireṣa bhavetkāryo vamane ca virecane |
niṣkvāthasya trayaḥ prasthāḥ māgadhās tu kanīyasi ||

8.1.6 jyeṣṭhe tu puruṣe jyeṣṭhaṃ vamanaṃ na kanīyasi |
catuḥprasthaṃ tumadhyaṃ syājjyeṣṭhaṃ prasthās tu te nava ||

8.1.7kanīyo madhyamaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ trividhāni pṛthak pṛthak |
apītapūrvaṃ vamanaṃ vireko vāpi yena tu ||

8.1.8 kanīyasā pramāṇena parīkṣeta ca buddhimān |
tripalaṃ śreṣṭham ākhyātaṃ kanīyas tu palaṃ bhavet ||

8.1.9 madhyaṃ dve pale vidyāditi me niścitā matiḥ |
viṣakuṣṭhahatā ye tu kāsaśvāsaprapīḍitāḥ ||

8.1.10 taruṇā balavantaś ca vāmayed uttamena tān |
madhyame prāṇavayasi madhyamaṃ tatra kārayet ||

8.1.11 kanīyasikanīys tu tathā prāṇe kanīyasi |
viparītaṃ prayuñjāno na rogānvijayiṣyati ||

8.1.12 upadravānvājanayed āturaṃ vā vināśayet |
aṅkolasyātha nimbasya niṣkvāthaṃ sādhu yojayet ||

8.1.13 sarpiṣā bheṣajaiścemaiḥ sukhoṣṇaṃ śītam eva vā |
madanasya phalaṃ piṣṭvā devadālīphalaissaha ||

8.1.14 nimbapatrāṇi sārdrāṇi saindhavaṃ maricāni ca |
saindhavena samāyuktaṃ takramaṇḍena vā punaḥ ||

8.1.15 bandhujīvo ' tha pippalyo madanaṃ sarpireva ca |
tatkaṣāyeṇa saṃyuktaṃ pradhānaṃ vamanauṣadham ||

8.1.16 madanaṃ bandhujīvaś ca śatapuṣpā śukānanā |
saindhavena samāyuktaṃ pradhānaṃ vamanauṣadham ||

8.1.17 madanasya ca patrāṇi puṣpāṇi saphalāni ca |
saindhavaṃ bandhujīvaś ca rājakośātakāni ca ||

8.1.18evaṃ pracchardano yogaḥ pradhānaṃ vamanauṣadham |
śreṣṭhaś ca viṣayukteṣu kāsaśvāse tu pūjitaḥ ||

8.1.19 yadā tu vamanaṃ pītaṃna chardayati mānavam |
kiṃ tatra bheṣajaṃ kuryāt kathaṃ vaidyaḥ samācaret ||

8.1.20 darśayet tasyatu bhiṣak pālitāni pṛthak pṛthak |
makṣikākeśacūrṇāni tac ca maṇḍe niyojayet ||

8.1.21 etena tu prayogeṇa kṣipraṃ chardayate naraḥ |
eṣā kriyā samākhyātā durbalānāṃ viśeṣataḥ ||

8.1.22 hṛdayaṃ pṛṣṭhadeśaṃ ca vigṛhya ca vamen naraḥ |
tathāsya calatisthānātpītaṃ hy asminnupakrame ||

8.1.23 kaphaṃ hi pūrvaṃ vamati tataḥ pittamanantaram |
pittasthānte bhavedvātaḥ tato vamati śoṇitam ||

8.1.24 lakṣaṇāni tu vakṣyāmi samyagvāntasya dehinaḥ |
laghurāmāśaye śuddhirhṛcchuddhiś cāpy atandritā ||

8.1.25 kṣutpipāse yathākālaṃsrotaḥśuddhiryathāgnitā |
ślaiṣmikāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ vyādhīnāṃ vinivartanam ||

8.1.26 na ca vairasyamāsyasya samyagvāntasya lakṣaṇam |
hṛllāso ' tha sirāharṣo manyā kaṇṭhaś ca dīryate ||

8.1.27 atyudgārastamaḥ kāso hikkā śvāsaḥ svarakṣayaḥ |
vātajvaraḥ śuṣkavamistṛṣṇā śūlo hy anidratā ||

8.1.28 āsyahṛcchoṣaṇaṃ caivakṣatāc ca rudhirāgamaḥ |
indriyāṇyuparudhyante mūrcchā cāsyopajāyate ||

8.1.29 hanustambhaś ca kampaś cahyativānte pravartate |
ūrdhvaraktī pramehī ca gulmī cārśobhagandarī ||

8.1.30 udarī pāṇḍurogī ca hṛdrogī kṛmikoṣṭhakaḥ |
apasmārī viṣārtaś caśophastambhaś ca vātikaḥ ||

8.1.31 viṣamajvaravīsarpī vātaśoṇitikaś ca yaḥ |
arśo ' tiviṣamāgniś ca kuṣṭhaśvayathupīḍitaḥ ||

8.1.32 udāvartī tathonmādīpipluvyaṅganipīḍitaḥ |
pittaśleṣmasamutthānā vyākulā ye ca dhātavaḥ ||

8.1.33 sannipātasamutthāś ca yoniduṣṭāś ca yāḥ striyaḥ |
śūlārtā raktagulminyoyāś ca saumyena pīḍitāḥ ||

8.1.34asnigdhāraktatāṅgānāṃ lāghavaṃ gātramārdavam |
hṛdayodgāramūtrāṇāṃ śuddhirvātānulomataḥ ||

8.1.35 prasannasvaravarṇatvaṃbubhukṣā vyādhinigrahaḥ |
śleṣmaṇā ca svayaṃ sthānaṃ suviriktasya laksaṇam ||

8.1.36 udaraṃ vātasampūrṇaṃ kaṇḍūmaṇḍalasambhavaḥ |
piṭakājanma gātreṣu bhramaṇaṃ jvarasamplavaḥ ||

8.1.37 hṛdayāveṣṭanaṃvahneḥ sādassyāt kukṣigauravam |
kṛcchraviṇmūtravātatvaṃ durviriktasya lakṣaṇam ||

8.1.38pārśvaśūlaṃ gudabhraṃśaḥ śākhāsaṃkocasambhramaḥ |
vātavṛddhirvisaṃjñatvaṃ gudaśūlastṛṣā klamaḥ ||

8.1.39 śūnyatā jarjarībhāvastataścimacimāyanam |
rūpāṇyativiriktānāṃśūlaḥ śophaś ca jāyate ||

8.1.40 gauravedurviriktasya yadajīrṇaṃ tadullikhet |
sātmyaṃ tu peyaṃ bhaiṣajyaṃ nirūhogāḍhavarcasām ||

8.1.41rūpāṇyativiriktasya haretkṣīraghṛtādibhiḥ |
snehaiścaivopanāhaiś casābhyaṅgaiś ca bhiṣagjayet || |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. || dvitīyo ' dhyāyaḥ || |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |..

8.2.1 avapīḍānuvāsāś ca dhūmāḥ pradhamanāni ca |
caturvidhaṃ nasyam āhuḥ pṛthaktvena tu me śṛṇu || 8|

8.2.2galagraho rohiṇikā śaṅkhako ' rdhāvabhedakaḥ |
pratiśyāyaś ca kāsaś ca śvāso hikkā biḍālikā ||

8.2.3 mukharogo hy apasmāro dantatālukavidradhī |
dantapuppuṭakaś caiva pūtināsāmukhaṃ tathā ||

8.2.4 abhiṣyandāś ca catvārastandrā yenetrasaṃbhavāḥ |
sārbudāś cāpy adhīmanthāḥ nāsārśaś cabhagandarāḥ ||

8.2.5 upajihvā galagranthiḥkaṇṭhaśālūka eva ca |
galaśuṇṭhikālasake kāryaṃ śīrṣavirecanam ||

8.2.6 maricāni vilaṅgāni pippalyo ' tha phaṇirjakaḥ |
kṣavako yavanaś caivaśigrubījaṃ mayūrakaḥ ||

8.2.7 hiṅgu sauvarcalaṃ bhārṅgīnaktamālaphalāni ca |
jyotiṣmatī śṛṅgiberaṃ śairīṣaṃ bījam eva ca ||

8.2.8 etacchīrṣavirekārthamuktavyādhiṣu yojayet |
avapīḍe ' tha dhūme vā dvandvaśaḥ sarvaśo ' pi vā ||

8.2.9 etair eva uṣadhagaṇais tailaṃ dhīro vipācayet |
avimūtreṇa saṃyuktaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ śīrṣavirecanam ||

8.2.10 dhūmaṃ ca sarvagandhānāṃnatakuṣṭhavivarjitam |
dhūmavartiṃ pibettāvacchreṣṭhaṃ śīrṣavirecanam ||

8.2.11 śirasas tu virekeṇa karṇajihvākṣināsikāḥ |
viśudhyante yathādoṣaṃ mukhanāsāvaheṣu ca ||

8.2.12vivṛtiḥ kheṣu viśadā na ca śleṣmā prasicyate |
samyak śirasi saṃśuddhe vedanā copaśāmyati ||

8.2.13 vyādhau ca bhaṅgacūrṇatvaṃ(?) srotasāṃ suviśuddhatā |
tathaivātiviśuddheṣusrotassvāyasyate śiraḥ ||

8.2.14 dantacāle hanustambhe manyāstambhe śirograhe |
vādhirye karṇaśūle ca karṇamūlāc ca bhedane ||

8.2.15 apatantre keśasāde ' prabodhe dṛṣṭivibhrame |
hikkānetramukhāsrāve svarabhede ' thavāggrahe ||

8.2.16 gaṇḍoṣṭhamukhacāleṣukāceṣu timireṣu ca |
daurgandhye mukhanāsābhyāṃ pālity e vāpy akālaje ||

8.2.17 ūrdhvajatrugatā ye ca rogāssamparikīrtitāḥ |
nasyakarma hitaṃ teṣāṃ tailaṃ vā sarpireva vā ||

8.2.18 jīvakarṣabhakau drākṣā pippalyo madhukaṃ balā |
prapauṇḍarīkaṃ medā ca śarkarā nīlamutpalam ||

8.2.19 nidigdhikā cāṃśumatī nīlikā saindhavaṃvacā |
rāsnā śvadaṃṣṭrā mañjiṣṭhā bṛhatī sapunarnavā ||

8.2.20 ebhiḥpalasamaiḥ siddhaṃ tailaṃ vā yadi vāghṛtam |
caturguṇena payasā nasyaṃ tatparamucyate ||

8.2.21 nasyataḥ snehapānenakṛṣṇaromā dṛḍhendriyaḥ |
avalīpalitavyaṅgaḥ cakṣuṣmāñjāyate naraḥ ||

8.2.22 karṇākṣināsāvaktrāṇāṃ snehenāvṛtya tarpaṇam |
indriyāṇāṃ vimuktatvaṃ prasādaḥ svaravarṇayoḥ ||

8.2.23 srotasāṃ vimalatvaṃ cajñeyaṃ saṃsnigdhalakṣaṇam |
asnigdhaliṅgaṃ rūkṣatvaṃ srotasāṃriktatā tathā ||

8.2.24 śiraso guruduḥkhatvaṃ srotasāṃ snehapūrṇatā |
karṇatālūpadehaśca nasyātisnigdhalakṣaṇam ||

8.2.25 nājīrṇe nārdraśirasi panthānaṃ gantumicchataḥ |
na pītamātre pānīye jvaritasya na dāpayet ||

8.2.26 na maithunaṃ gatavataḥ madyapītasya naiva ca |
nātibhuktasya nāsnigdhasvinnasyānirvṛtes tathā ||

8.2.27 samyaṅ nirūḍhasyanarugujā samyak praśāmyati |
yato mūtrapurīṣāmyāṃvāto hy asya nivartate ||

8.2.28 nirūḍhaṃ taṃ bhiṣagvidyādanirūḍhasya lakṣaṇam |
tathaiva vyādhirādhmānaṃ śūlaṃ viṇmūtranigrahaḥ ||

8.2.29 pūrṇakukṣitvamānāho durnirūḍhasya lakṣaṇam |
nirūḍhasya punaryasya śoṇitaṃ sampraduṣyati ||

8.2.30 atīva tu nirūḍhasya niṣpurīṣasya mārutaḥ |
śūlenāveṣṭyamanasya sarvagātrāṇi pīḍayet ||

8.2.31 iti pañcavidhaṃ coktaṃ vyākhyātaṃ samupācaret |
pañcakarmavidhānajño rājārho bhiṣagucyate || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele dvitīyo ' dhyāyaḥ || ||caturtho ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto daśavyāpadīyāṃ vamanavirecanasiddhiṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

8.4.1 adhobhāgordhvabhāgāni bheṣajāni prayatnataḥ |
kalpayenmatimānvaidyo viṣaśastranibhāni tu ||

8.4.2 kaṭutiktakaṣāyāṇividāhīnītarāṇi ca |
sūkṣmāṇyuṣṇāni tīkṣṇāni viṣyandīni gurūṇi ca ||

8.4.3 tāni samprāpya hṛdayaṃdhamanīḥ pratipadyahi |
tiryagūrdhvamadhaś caiva doṣānniṣyandayantyapi ||

8.4.4sūkṣmāñcharīrāvayavān saukṣmyādanusarinti ca |
visrāvayanti dhātūṃś ca vimārgaurapi dehinām ||

8.4.5 ānayantīva hṛdayaṃ doṣāṃstānatimūrcchitān |
āmāśayaṃpūriyitvāhyūrdhvabhāgabhavāṃs tathā ||

8.4.6evam eva cabiṣyandīnyāpūryāmāśayaṃ punaḥ |
adhobhāge pravartante vikāreṣv iha dehinām ||

8.4.7 viṣyandayanti doṣāṃś ca yāvattiṣṭhanti dehinām |
saṃśodhayantyataḥ paścādūrdhvaṃ vā yadi vāpy adhaḥ ||

8.4.8 teṣāṃ tu duṣprayuktānāṃ vibhrāntānāṃ vidhāvatām |
ayogāccātiyogācca jāyante vyāpado daśa ||

8.4.9 parisrāvastathādhmānaṃ vibandho gudaniḥsravaḥ |
hṛdrogaś caiva śūlaṃ ca tathaiva parikartikā ||

8.4.10 jīvādānaṃ śirorogo daśamī ca pravāhikā |
tāsāmekaikatassiddhiṃ vyāpadāṃ tu nibodha me ||

8.4.11athaiti pītaṃ vamanaṃtac ca tīkṣṇataraṃ pibet |
anupānānnasiddhiś ca saṃśodhyāsthāpayennaram ||

8.4.12 asidhyati vireke ' pi bhūyastamanuvāsayet |
asminnapi jarāṃ yāti tryahādūrdhvaṃ pibed ghṛtam ||

8.4.13 snehasvedopapannaś ca laghu ca pratibhojitaḥ |
virecanaṃ ca vamanaṃ narastīkṣṇataraṃ pibet ||
8.4.14 yadā virecanaṃ pītaṃ vamanāyopapadyate | prayoga evaṃ vamane vireke ' pi cayaḥ smṛtaḥ ||

8.4.15 snehasvedavimuktaṃ ca krūrakoṣṭhaṃ ca dehinam |
ajīrṇe cauṣadhaṃ pītamādhyāpayati mānavam ||

8.4.16 laṅghitasya subhaktasya rūkṣasyānaśanasya ca |
parikartaḥ parisrāvaḥpralepo ' sveditasya ca ||

8.4.17 snehasvedavimuktasya mṛdukoṣṭhasya dehinaḥ |
doṣāstathāvaśiṣṭās tu janayantipravāhikām ||

8.4.18 atiraukṣyādatisvehādauṣadhānāṃ ca sambhramāt |
nṛṇāṃ śūlaṃ prabhavati gudasraṃsaś ca dāruṇaḥ ||

8.4.19 vamane recane vāpipīte vegavidhārite |
vātapittakaphāḥ kruddhāḥ kurvanti hṛdayagraham ||

8.4.20 tasya gātrāṇisīdanti klamaḥ śūlaś ca dāruṇaḥ |
śirograhaś cakoṣṭhārtirvisaṃjñaś ca bhavaty api ||

8.4.21 svinnasya mṛdukoṣṭhasya snehitasya virecanam |
atimātrauṣadhaṃpītaṃjīvādānāya kalpate ||

8.4.22sṛjecchuklaṃ sa śakṛtā kṛṣṇaṃ vā raktam eva vā |
lodhrapuṣpasavarṇaṃ vā bhaṇḍipuṣpanibhaṃ tathā ||

8.4.23 pravirikto yadā śītāṃ kriyāṃ samupasevate |
śaraṇāni ca śītāni vāri śītaṃ ca sevate ||

8.4.24 srotāṃsi kupito vāyus tasya cāvṛtya tiṣṭhati |
kharībhavati tenāsya doṣāḥ skandanti dehinaḥ ||

8.4.25 vātamūtrapurīṣāṇāmapravṛttistṛṣā jvaraḥ |
vibandha eṣa vyākhyātobhiṣajāṃ buddhivibhramāt ||

8.4.26 asnigdhaṃ tuyadā rūkṣamauṣadhaṃ pāyayed bhiṣak |
gṛhṇāti kupitas tasya sarvagātrāṇi mārutaḥ ||

8.4.27 kaṭipṛṣṭhaśirogrīvāhṛdayaṃ ca yadānilaḥ |
prapadyatetadā mohaṃ cittanāśaṃ ca gacchati ||

8.4.28 daśaitā vyāpadaḥ proktā rūpairnānāvidhaiḥ pṛthak |
cikitsāṃ tāsu kurvīta yathātreyasya śāsanam ||

8.4.29 tatrāyoginamabhyajya tailena lavaṇena ca |
saṅkaraprastarasvedairnāḍīsvedairathapi vā ||

8.4.30 samyaṅ nirūḍhaṃ viśrāntaṃpariṣicya sukhāmbunā |
jāṅgalena rasenaiva bhojayenmṛdumodanam ||

8.4.31 phalatailena koṣṇena tatastamanuvāsayet |
ādhmānaṃ parikartaśca parisrāvaś ca śāmyati ||

8.4.32 sālo rubūkastriphalā dantī citraka eva ca |
sarpirebhir vipakvaṃ ca pāyayec ca yathābalam ||

8.4.33 tatsnehapītaṃ susnigdhaṃ svedakarmopapāditam |
vamanaṃ recanaṃ vāpi pāyayet tīkṣṇamauṣadham ||

8.4.34 hṛdrogo gātraharṣaś ca śīrṣaskandhagrahas tathā |
vibandhaḥ parikartaśca śūlaś cānena śāmyati ||

8.4.35 parikartaḥ parisrāvo yathātattvena śāmyati |
kaṣāyavastiṃpraṇayetpicchāvastimathāpi vā ||

8.4.36śṛtaṃ madhughṛtaṃ vāpi kṣīravastiṃ pradāpayet |
jīvanīyopasiddhena sarpiṣā cānuvāsayet ||

8.4.37 eraṇḍamūlaṃ triphalā drākṣā kāśmaryameva ca |
ebhiḥ śṛtaṃ payo dadyādvividhair apimiśrayet ||

8.4.38 yāvaśūko bhavetkṣāraḥ saindhavaṃ sāmlavetasam |
hiṅgu dāḍimasāraś ca pippalyo viśvabheṣajam ||

8.4.39 sarpiṣā payasā vāpi madyenoṣṇodakena vā |
pītaṃ nivartayecchūlaṃ tīvraṃ ca parikartikām ||

8.4.40 devadāru sabilvaṃ ca rāsnā karkaṭakāhvayā |
eraṇḍo ' pyatha pūtiśca tailamebhir vipācayet ||

8.4.41 tenānuvāsayeccainaṃ tadā sampadyate sukham |
gātrastambhaś ca śūlaś caparikartaś ca śāmyati ||

8.4.42 upadravāṇām eteṣāṃ śāntir yadi na vidyate |
teṣāṃ cikitsitaṃ kuryād yathāsvaṃ svaṃ cikitsitam ||

8.4.43 evaṃ cikitsitaṃ proktam ayoge vistareṇa me |
atiyoge tu vakṣyāmi vyāpadāṃ yac cikitsitam ||

8.4.44 atipravṛttau vamane virecanam upācaret |
virecane cātiyukte vamanaṃ pāyayed bhiṣak ||

8.4.45 vamane cātiyukte tu kāryam āsthāpanaṃ bhavet |
ubhayor atiyoge tu stambhanaṃ hitamucyate ||

8.4.46ullikhetkṣaudrayuktena sa narastaṇḍulāmbunā |
pādauca secayed dhastau tathā vāpy avagāhayet ||

8.4.47 lāmajjakamṛṇālaiś ca candanaiś ca sapadmakaiḥ |
sandihyāt sarvagātrāṇi kaṣāyaiś cāvasecayet ||

8.4.48 dhātakī madhukaṃ lodhraṃ padmaṃ mocarasas tathā |
nīlotpalaṃ samaṅgā ca kaṭphalaṃ padmakesaram ||

8.4.49 etairlohitaśālīnāṃsiddhāṃ peyāṃ suśītalām |
pibenmākṣikasaṃyuktaṃtadasya sthāpanaṃ param ||

8.4.50 lākṣālodhrassamaṅgā ca mākṣikaṃ kamalotpalam |
ājena payasā pītaṃraktastambhanamucyate ||

8.4.51 rasaṃ kapitthapatrasya pāyayenmadhusaṃyutam |
payasā bādaraṃ drākṣāṃ madhunā ca piben naraḥ ||

8.4.52 rasāś ca jāṅgalā deyā vyaktā dāḍimasārakaiḥ |
ghṛtadāḍimasaṃyuktā deyāḥ syuḥ kṣīravastayaḥ ||

8.4.53 atipravṛtte rakte tu raktam evānuvāsayet |
śāśaṃ mārgamathaurabhraṃchāgaṃ māhiṣam eva vā ||

8.4.54 odanaṃ payasā++āmṛdya paripūtaṃ samākṣikam |
pibed ikṣurasair vāpi parimardyaudanaṃ punaḥ ||

8.4.55 nyagrodhodumbaraplakṣavetasāśvatthajais tathā |
śṛṅgairathaiṣāṃ kṣīreṇa yavāgūḥ sthāpanaṃ param ||

8.4.56 padmaṃ śālmaliniryāsaḥ samaṅgā dhātakī tathā |
jambvāmrasāro madhukaḥ lājā lākṣā priyaṅgavaḥ ||

8.4.57etaiḥ śṛtaṃ payaḥ peyaṃ yavāgūṃcāpi pāyayet |
taṇḍulodakayuktāni pibedvā madhunā saha ||

8.4.58 odanaḥ koradūṣāṇāṃ madhunā sasyasaṃbhṛtaḥ |
palaṅkaṣāsamāyuktaś cātisāraṃ nivartayet ||

8.4.59 saṃyuktaṃ tilatailena saptarātrasthitaṃ dadhi |
koradūṣaudanopetamatisārapraṇāśanam ||

8.4.60 saptarātraṃ sthite takre mūlakaṃ sādhayed bhiṣak |
koradūṣaudano yojyaḥ tenātīsāranāśanaḥ ||

8.4.61 vaṭāṅkuro mocaraso lodhramāmrāsthikandakaḥ |
taruṇāni ca bilvāni dhātakīkusumāni ca ||

8.4.62 pañcarātrasthite takre yūṣamebhis tu kārayet |
koradūṣaudano yojyaḥ tathātīsāranāśanaḥ ||

8.4.63 nīlotpalaṃ nīlatilāḥsamaṅgā lodhram eva ca |
kṣīraṃ vipācayed ebhir atīsāravināśanam ||

8.4.64 tilatailaṃ tathā lodhramājaṃ kṣīraṃ vipācayet |
pravāhikā gudabhraṃśaḥ sarvametena śāmyati ||

8.4.65 balā cātibalābilvameraṇḍaścorakas tathā |
ebhir vipācayet kṣīraṃ kaphapittapraṇāśanam ||

8.4.66 hanustambhe ca pātavyamarśaḥśūle ca dāruṇe |
anenaiva ca kalkena kuryād ācchāditaṃ śiraḥ ||

8.4.67 tena mūrcchā bhramaś caiva praśāmyati śarīriṇām |
upadravāś ca ye ' pyanyeteṣāṃ tattaccikitsitam ||

8.4.68 śarkarāpadmakośīranyagrodhodumbarāstathā |
ebhir vipācayet kṣīraṃ tṛṣṇādāhapraṇāśanam ||

8.4.69 kṣīravastiṃ vidadyāc ca picchāvastimathāpi vā |
atiyoge praśasyante śītāś ca ghṛtavastayaḥ ||

8.4.70 jīvādānacikitsāyāṃ yatpūrvaṃ parikīrtitam |
tatkartavyaṃ gudabhraṃśe tathā sampadyate sukham ||

8.4.71 vātaśūle tu sañjāte saṅkaraprastarādikān |
svedāṃścaivopadehāṃścasvabhyaktānāṃ prayojayet ||

8.4.72vacāṃ śvadaṃṣṭrāṃ pūtīkāṃ pañcamūlīṃ ca sādhitām |
yadi vā++āsthāpanaṃ dadyāt sukhoṣṇaṃ cānuvāsanam ||

8.4.73kṣāraiḥ kṣāraghṛtaiś cāpi śūlaghnaissamupācaret |
dādhikaṃ ṣaṭpalaṃ vāpi pāyayenmātrayā ghṛtam ||

8.4.74 evam eva vibandhe ' pi vidhiṃ kuryāc cikitsakaḥ |
yāś ca vyāpattayaḥ paścādvamane ca virecane ||

8.4.75 tāścikitseta matimānyathā sve sve cikitsite |
grāmyān paudakaṃ māṃsaṃ snehito yo ' pi sevate ||

8.4.76kaphe pravṛddhe tasyāśu vireko vamanaṃ bhavet |
ajīrṇe cauṣadhaṃpītamalpaṃ vā yadi vā bahu ||

8.4.77utkleśe cordhvavāte ca duryukte vāpi bheṣaje |
evaṃ virecanaṃ pītaṃ vamanāyopapadyate ||

8.4.78karśite rūkṣite vāpi sukumāre sudāruṇe |
asaṃjātakaphasyaiva naca snigdhasya dehinaḥ ||

8.4.79 chardanaṃ vāsthitaṃ kṣubdhaṃ virekāyopapādayet |
tatrānupānamevāhuḥkecitkecittvasāmpratam ||

8.4.80 bheṣajaṃ hy atimātraṃ tu jīvādānāya kalpate |
ūrdhvaṃ daśāhātparataḥ snehasvedopapāditam ||

8.4.81 pāyayet tīkṣṇamevaitaṃ bheṣajaṃ kalpakalpitam |
siddhirvirecanasyaiṣā vamanasya ca kīrtitā |
vyāpadaś ca cikitsā yā yathāvadanupūrvaśaḥ || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
itibhele siddhisthāne caturtho ' dhyāyaḥ || || pañcamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto vastimātrīyāṃsiddhiṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

8.5.1 saṃsṛṣṭabhakte śaṃsanti vastikarma cikitsakāḥ |
virikteṣv apare vaidyā nirūḍhe tvapare janāḥ ||

8.5.2 trīṇyetānyavarāṇyāhuḥ na śaṃsanti viśāradāḥ |
mataṃ teṣāmahaṃ samyagvyāhaniṣyāmi hetubhiḥ ||

8.5.3satatantu viriktasya śītībhavati pāvakaḥ |
hṛdāśrayāṇi srotāṃsi gudakoṣṭhāśrayāṇi ca ||

8.5.4 pravṛddho mārutastasyapakvādhānaṃ pradhavati |
śītīkaroti kāyāgniṃ balaṃ cāsyāpakarṣati ||

8.5.5 srotassuśuddhāśuddheṣu yadi vastiḥ pradīyate |
sa gambhīro gataḥ kāye sarvaśo na nivartate ||

8.5.6 chardiṃ pipāsāṃ hṛdrogaṃ pāṇḍutvaṃ śvayathuṃ tathā |
janayed iha tasmād dhi viriktaṃ nānuvāsayet ||

8.5.7 saṃsṛṣṭabhaktasya punaḥ jātadoṣasya dehinaḥ |
srotassu malalipteṣu bhavetsneho nirarthakaḥ ||

8.5.8 tīkṣṇetaranirūheṇanirūḍhasya śarīriṇaḥ |
samutkliṣṭeṣu doṣeṣu snehavastirna śasyate ||

8.5.9 kecic cāpi śarīrasya rātriparyuṣitasya ca |
praśāntā doṣasaṃjñānaḥ(?) praśaṃsantyanuvāsanam ||

8.5.10 vastikarmavidhānaṃ tu śṛṇu me nirupadravam |
snehitasya yathānyāyaṃ viriktasya ca kalpaśaḥ ||

8.5.11saṃsṛṣṭabhaktasya tathā punaś ca snehitasya ca |
pañcarātrātparaṃ tasya kārayed anuvāsanam ||

8.5.12noparyasnigdhakoṣṭhasya kartavyamanuvāsanam |
vāto hyūrīkṛtas tasya hṛdaye paritiṣṭhati ||

8.5.13ucitādbhaktamānādapyardhamātraṃ tu bhojayet |
tanunā mudgayūṣeṇa jāṅgalena rasena vā ||

8.5.14bhuktvā kṛtasamāśvāsaḥ śakṛnmūtre visṛjya ca |
savyena pārśvena naraḥ saṃviśecchayane same ||

8.5.15 saṃkocayed dakṣiṇaṃ ca sakthi vāmaṃ prasārayet |
vāmopadhānaṃ kurvīta śirasyupahitaṃ naraḥ ||

8.5.16athāsya praṇayed vastiṃ pṛṣṭhavaṃśānugaṃ sukham |
yathākarmabalaṃ caiva nadrutaṃ na vilambitam ||

8.5.17 nirvyalīko mṛdurvastirvyapanītānilastathā |
gāḍhānilānubandho ' syāpraśasto vastikarmaṇi ||

8.5.18netraṃ vastimukhe dhṛtvā samyagekena pāṇinā |
prapīḍayeccāpareṇa hastau cāpi na kampayet ||

8.5.19 pūrvaṃ cagudamabhyajya yantraṃ hastau ca mānavaḥ |
pravartayed athottānaṃ pādau vāsyaprasārayet ||

8.5.20muhūrtānna nigṛhṇīyāddatte vastau yathāsukham |
tataḥ paramato vegānāgatānna vidhārayet ||

8.5.21 avibandhassavātaśca sapurīṣassa sidhyati |
dattamātre punaryasya tailavastirnivartate ||

8.5.22 na sa karyakaraḥ proktastasyānyaṃ praṇidhāpayet |
tṛṣitassa tathā rātriṃ kālyamuṣṇodakaṃ pibet ||

8.5.23 ekāntare ca dātavyo bastirna satataṃ nṛṇām |
abhyaṅgonmardanaṃ caiva koṣṇatoyāvasecanam ||

8.5.24 uṣṇodakānupānaṃ ca vastikarmaṇi śasyate |
caturṣutriṣu vā vaidyo yāvadvā snigdhatā punaḥ ||

8.5.25 snehavastiṣu datteṣu kuryād āsthāpanaṃ tataḥ |
ārdrīkṛteṣu srotassu snehena vihitena ca ||

8.5.26 śuddhaye srotasāṃ dadyānnirūhānyuktitaḥ sukham |
aśuddhe maline koṣṭhe snehavastiḥ prayojitaḥ ||
8.5.27 pradarśayati vaiśiṣyaṃ śukle parvavyayīkṛtam |(?) virecanopacāraśca kartavyo vastikarmaṇi ||

8.5.28 yavāgūpratipānaṃ ca bastikarmaṇi varjayet |
caturviṃśatisaṅkhyātāḥ nirūhāssānuvāsanāḥ ||

8.5.29 etatkarmetinirdiṣṭamūrdhvavāte pradāpayet |
mṛdumadhyamatīkṣṇeṣu rogeṣu kuśalo bhiṣak ||

8.5.30 mṛdumadhyamatīkṣṇaṃca vastikarma ca kārayet |
grāmyānūpaudakaṃ māṃsaṃ piṣṭānnaṃ palalaṃ dadhi ||

8.5.31 amlaśākavikārāṃś ca bhakṣyāṇi vividhāni ca |
śītodakasya pānaṃ ca tathā śītāvagāhanam ||

8.5.32 gurūṇicānnapānāni vastikarmaṇi varjayet |
śāliṣaṣṭikamudgāṃś ca bhojanārthaṃ pradāpayet ||

8.5.33 vyañjanārthaṃ pradeyāḥ syuḥ śaśatittirilāvukāḥ |
jñānavānsumitāhāro vaidyaśuśrūṣureva ca |
yaś cavastimupāsīta sa jīveccharadāṃ śatam || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele siddhisthāne pañcamo ' dhyāyaḥ || || ṣaṣṭo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāta upakalpasiddhiṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

8.6.1 upakalpamato vasternetraṃ snehaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ |
teṣāṃ prayogayuktiṃ ca kriyāṃ karma ca me śṛṇu ||

8.6.2 bālānāmatha vṛddhānāṃ yuvamadhyamayostathā |
svasthānāmāturāṇāṃ ca vastikarma praśasyate ||

8.6.3 sauvarṇaṃrājataṃ tāmraṃ kāṃsyaṃtrapujamāyasam |
śṛṅgavaṃśāsthivaṃśāgrāṇyāhurnetrāṇi paṇḍitāḥ ||

8.6.4yathākramamathaitāni pradhānānītarāṇi ca |
uttamādhamamadhyeṣu manuṣyeṣu prayojayet ||

8.6.5 gulikāsyaṃ tu netraṃ syādanūnadvādaśāṅgulam |
aṅgule karṇikāvāsaḥ tāṃ ca nakramayed gude ||

8.6.6 tatra gopucchasaṃsthānaṃ suślakṣṇaṃ sukhakarṇikam |
pradeśinīparīṇāhaṃdānaṃ tena praśasyate ||

8.6.7 tatra mātrāśataṃ sthitvāsvenaiva vinivartate |
yadyakāle navasneho madyamāṃsaprakalpitaḥ ||

8.6.8 nyūnakālanivṛttaśca śīghratvānna nirūhati |
tatas tumadhyamaḥ kiñcinnivartetaśataistribhiḥ ||

8.6.9 evaṃ kālagatikrānto yo vastirna nivartate |
tīkṣṇenāsthāpanenaivaṃ kṣipraṃ pratinivartate ||

8.6.10 tasmāt tīkṣṇataraṃ vastiṃ pūrvamevopakalpayet |
prāṇasaṃdhāraṇe hyuccairvibandho na praśasyate ||

8.6.11 tasmāt kālaṃ ca yo vyādhiṃ nirūhāṇāṃ balābalam |
pūrṇarūpaṃ cayo vetti sa mohaṃ na nigacchati ||

8.6.12. natathā hy anyato hanyānnāśanirna hutāśanaḥ |
duṣprayuktoyathā vastiḥprāṇaissadyoviyojayet ||

8.6.13śastaḥ prāṇihito vastissadyo rogaharas tathā |
samyaṅ nivṛtto,rogaughairhyanivṛttas tu prāṇahā ||

8.6.14 sa nivṛttas tu vegena doṣān gambhīramāsthitān |
unmārgasthānnayenmārgaṃ mārgasthāṃś cānulomayet ||

8.6.15 vastivego ' nilaṃ hanti parjanyaṃ ca yathānilaḥ |
kaphapittavikārāhi sarvevātavaśānugāḥ ||

8.6.16 aśītirvātikā rogāścatvāriṃśat tu pittajāḥ |
viṃśatiḥ ślaiṣmikāś cāpi saṃsṛṣṭānāmasaṃgrahāt ||

8.6.17 sarveṣām eva caiteṣāṃ rogāṇāṃ saṃgrahaissadā |
arditānāṃhi bhūtānāṃ vastiragryaṃ parāyaṇam ||

8.6.18 anilaprabhavā hyete sarve vastivaśānugāḥ |
tasmād ardhaṃ cikitsāyāḥ sarvaṃ vā vastir ucyate ||

8.6.19 yas tu vastiṃ niṣeveta cāturmāsyaṃ sadā naraḥ |
rogāssaṃvarjayeyustaṃ siṃhāvāsaṃ yathā gajāḥ ||

8.6.20 ete guṇaviśeṣāś ca vyākhyātā vastikarmaṇi |
nirūhasyāsya sāmarthyam upacāraṃ ca me śṛṇu ||

8.6.21 svinne paryuṣite jīrṇe tvatyantaṃ ca nirūhayet |
so ' sya mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ ca śleṣmāṇaṃ cāpakarṣati ||

8.6.22 vātānulomyaṃ kurute balaṃ sañjanayaty api |
viṣasthiraṃ doṣabalaṃ yac canāḍīṣu saṃsthitam ||

8.6.23 viśodhayati tat sarvaṃ nirūhaḥ sa prayojitaḥ |
rogānīkasya sarvasyaparo nāsti hi tatsamaḥ ||

8.6.24 vyākulānāṃ ca keśānāṃ sīmantakaraṇaṃ yathā |
tathā bhṛśaṃ vyākulānāṃ doṣāṇāṃ syānnirūhataḥ ||

8.6.25 nirūho hi samāyuktassamyagvīryassamairguṇaiḥ |
vyādhīnathoddharetkṣipraṃ puṇyaṃ yuktaṃ naraṃ yathā ||

8.6.26 kṛcchramūtrapurīṣāṇāṃśūlināṃ vātagulminām |
virecanādyudāvarte hṛdroge pārśvaśūlini ||

8.6.27 udareṣu prameheṣu kuṣṭheṣu kṛmikoṣṭhiṣu |
śleṣmaṇā saha saṃsṛṣṭe śoṇitena ca dūṣite ||

8.6.28 saṃsṛṣṭeṣu ca sarveṣu sannipātodbhaveṣu ca |
gambhīrādhātugā ye ca teṣāṃśreṣṭhaṃ nirūhaṇam ||

8.6.29 yadā kaphaṃ viricyeta śaṅkhasphaṭikasannibham |
ṛte mūtrapurīṣābhyāṃtannirūhasya lakṣaṇam ||

8.6.30suśodhitaṃ nirūheṇanātiparyuṣitaṃ tathā |
sukhoṣitaṃ samāśvastaṃ bhojitaṃ cānuvāsayet ||

8.6.31 ekato vastikarmāṇi hyekato ' nyaccikitsitam |
amṛtārthaṃ vastikarma kurutesuprayojitam ||

8.6.32śuklaṃ bahvavarodhasya nakṣayaṃ yāti dehinaḥ |
strīṣupradharṣaṇaṃ kuryānnarāṇāṃ kṣīṇaretasām ||

8.6.33 vastiprayogāt ṣaṇḍo ' pi pumān bhavati sarvaśaḥ |
kṛśānām apimartyānāṃ māṃsasaṃjananaṃ smṛtam || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele siddhisthāne ṣaṣṭho ' dhyāyaḥ || || saptamo ' dhyāyaḥ |
|
athātaḥphalamātrāsiddhiṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

8.7.1phalamātraṃ nirūheṣu śreṣṭham āhur manīṣiṇaḥ |
teṣāṃ tu madanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ pravadanti cikitsakāḥ ||

8.7.2 jīmūtakaṃ praśaṃsanti keciddhāmārgavaṃ tathā |
kṛtavedhanam ity eke kuṭajaṃ prāhurapyatha ||

8.7.3 garhitā ssarva evaite vādāḥ pratyekaśaḥ smṛtāḥ |
bheṣajānāṃ casaṅghāto nirūheṣu praśasyate ||

8.7.4 vātapittakaphagnāṃstu nirūhāṃś cānupūrvaśaḥ |
vyākhyāsyāmo yathānyāyaṃsannipātahitāś ca ye ||

8.7.5 dvai pañcamūlyau kolāninaladaśśuṣkamūlakam |
dvipalīnāni sarvāṇi jaladroṇe vipācayet ||

8.7.6 aṣṭabhāgāvaśeṣaṃ tu kaṣāyamavatārayet |
kalkapeṣyāṇi cemāni bheṣajāni samāvapet ||

8.7.7 nikuñcikāṃ kharapuṣpāṃ pippalīṃ saindhavaṃ vacām |
trapusorvārubījāni śatapuṣpāṃ yavānikām ||

8.7.8 kuṣṭhaṃ ca tagaraṃ caiva yaṣṭīmadhukam eva ca |
sakṣīrassakaṣāyaś ca sagomūtraśca kīrtitaḥ ||

8.7.9 satailaś ca nirūhaḥ syādvātarogavināśanaḥ |
paṭolapatramūlaṃ ca picumandaṃ śatāvarīm ||

8.7.10 trāyamāṇāṃ balāṃ rāsnāṃ bṛhatīṃ kaṇṭakārikām |
guḍūcīṃtriphalāṃ śyāmāṃ sāribāṃ vaṃśakatvacam ||

8.7.11 dvipalīnān pṛthagbhāgān pūrvakalpena sādhayet |
madhukaṃ vaṃśakaphalaṃ śatapuṣpāṃ durālabhām ||

8.7.12 mahāsahāmaṃśumatīṃ kalkaṃ kuryāt pṛthak pṛthak |
kṣīreṇātha kaṣāyeṇa ghṛtena madhunā tathā ||

8.7.13 kalpamiśraḥ sumathito nirūhaḥ pittanāśanaḥ |
daśamūlī karañjau dvau dantī citrakam eva ca ||

8.7.14 ekāṣṭhīlā turaṅgī ca triphalā devadāru ca |
pūtikaṃ rauhiṣaṃ śyāmā mūrvā rājatṛṇāni ca ||

8.7.15 pṛthak pañcapalānetān sādhayetsarvakalpavit |
adhobhāgordhvabhāgdravyaissādhayetsādhu yojitaiḥ ||

8.7.16 mūtratailayutaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ nirūhaḥ śleṣmanāśanaḥ |
aśvagandhāṃ balāṃ rāsnāṃ śvadaṃṣṭrāṃ sapunarnavām ||

8.7.17 paṭolapañcamūlyau ca bhārṅgīṃ śyāmāṃ śatāvarīm |
guḍūcīṃ triphalāṃ śigruṃ karṇikāyāḥ phalāni ca ||

8.7.18 uśīraṃ rajanīpatraṃ pūtikaṃ kattṛṇāni ca |
pṛthak pañcapalānetān khaṇḍaśaśchedayed bhiṣak ||

8.7.19 jaladroṇe vipaktavyamaṣṭabhāgāvaśeṣitam |
madhukaṃ śatapuṣpāṃ ca saindhavaṃ sarṣapān guḍam ||

8.7.20 hapuṣāmajamodāṃ ca madanasya phalāni ca |
vacāmaśokabījāni pippalīkuṣṭham eva ca ||

8.7.21 etāni kalkapeṣyāṇi bheṣajāni pṛthak pṛthak |
kṣīratailasamāyukto ghṛtamūtrasamanvitaḥ ||

8.7.22 khajena mathitaḥ pūtaḥ sa nirūhaḥ praśasyate |
ekena yadi vā dvābhyāṃ tribhir vātipramāṇataḥ ||

8.7.23kiṃcinnyūnātiriktaṃ vā jñātvā vyādhibalābalam |
kuryāt , viṃśativarṣāṇāṃ tatra prasthapramāṇataḥ ||

8.7.24 atha dvādaśavarṣāṇāmardhaprasthaṃ prayojayet |
kaṣāyakuḍavaṃ cātra ṣaḍvarṣāṇāṃ prayojayet ||

8.7.25 yuktaṃ lavaṇatailabhyāṃ kṣīreṇa madhunā tathā |
kaṣāyavastiṃ kurvīta svehād dviprasṛtaṃ bhiṣak ||

8.7.26 prasṛtaṃ madhyame kuryāt prasṛtārdhaṃ kanīyasi |
nātiśītaṃ na vātyuṣṇaṃ kaṣāyam upakalpayet ||

8.7.27 vāyuḥ kupyati śītatvād atyuṣṇaṃ tu gudaṃ dahet |
atisāndrātigrathito doṣeṇa sahi mūrchati ||

8.7.28 madapravego bhavativyāpaccāsyopajāyate |
athavāpi tanuryasya kaṣāyoyojito bhavet ||

8.7.29 so ' lpaṃ harati doṣaṃ ca na ca saṃśodhayed gudam |
parikartaṃ ca śūlaṃ ca janayec ca pravāhikām ||

8.7.30 atyarthamadhurodatto vidagdhaḥ stambhaved anām |
grahaṇīṃ raktamarśāṃsi pāṇḍurogaṃ bhagandaram ||

8.7.31 atitīkṣṇas tu duryuktaḥ kṣipraṃ pratinivartate |
na nirharati doṣāṃś ca jvaraṃ mūrchāṃ karoti ca ||

8.7.32 jvaritaṃ dahyamānaṃ ca mūrchamānaṃ ca mānavam |
śītairmadhurasaṃyuktairyojayetkṣīravastibhiḥ ||

8.7.33 yasyātha lavaṇaḥ koṣṭhe nirūhaḥ paittikīṃrujām |
janayet tatrapeṣyaṃ syānmadhureṇa nirūhaṇam ||

8.7.34 nirūho madhuro yasya śleṣmāṇaṃ parikopayet |
kaṭukaiś ca kaṣāyais taṃ nirūhedyasya mārutaḥ ||

8.7.35prakupyedadhikaṃ tatra mārutaghnaṃ nirūhaṇam |
tasmāllavaṇayuktāni dravyāṇi madhurāṇi ca ||

8.7.36bhiṣagdadyānna śītānitathoṣṇāni vivecayet |
pitte śīto nirūhaḥ syāduṣṇas tu kaphavātayoḥ ||

8.7.37 praśleṣmaṇi pravāte vāpyuṣṇamāsthāpanaṃ bhavet |
madanasya phalaṃ piṣṭvātailenācchena sādhayet ||

8.7.38 tannirūhe praṇaṃsanti phalatailaṃ cikitsakāḥ |
gomūtrayuktametat tu phalatailanirūhaṇam ||

8.7.39 nirūhaṃ lavaṇaṃ kuryāc chreṣṭhamānāhabhedanam |
bilvairaṇḍaphalaṃ vāpi paced dviprasthasammitam ||

8.7.40amlaṃ salavaṇaṃ sādhyamaṣṭabhāgāvaśeṣitam |
kaṣāye tatra pīlūni kalkapeṣyāṇi yojayet ||

8.7.41 phalatailayuto vastirdeya ānāhabhedanaḥ |
eṣa sarvānudāvartānśophagulmān bhinatty api ||

8.7.42 athaiva vastirādhmānamudāvartaṃ vināśayet |
oṣṭhajihvaṃ pṛṣṭhaccūrṇaṃ(?) bṛhatīṃ kaṇṭakārikām ||

8.7.43 candanaṃ padmakaṃ caivavṛntaṃ puṣpaṃ caśālmaleḥ |
khaṇḍitānāṃ yavānāntu kuḍavaṃ tatra yojayet ||

8.7.44 tadaikadhyaṃ pacet sarvaṃ jale cāṣṭaguṇe bhiṣak |
ghṛtena madhunā caivapicchāṃ saṃyojya śaktitaḥ ||

8.7.45 nirvāhikāyāṃ śaṃsanti picchāvastim imaṃ budhāḥ |
atas tu ṣoḍaśī caiva pale dveca punarnave ||

8.7.46 kaṭāhake pañcamūlīṃ yavaiḥ saha vipācayet |
upodakāyāḥ kṣuṇṇāyāḥ svarasaṃ ca supīḍitam ||

8.7.47 yuktaṃ tena kaṣāyeṇa ghṛtena saha yojayet |
mākṣikeṇa ca saṃyukto vastis tu yavamūrcchitaḥ ||

8.7.48 picchāvastir iti khyātaḥ śūle nirvāhikāsu ca |
taruṇaṃ śiṃśupāpatraṃ karbudārasya pallavam ||

8.7.49 kṣuṇṇaissahayavaissiddhaiḥ saṃpiṣṭo ghṛtasaṃyutaḥ |
mākṣikakṣīrasaṃyuktaḥ savastir yavamūrcchitaḥ ||

8.7.50 nirvāhikāṃ vātaśūlaṃ kṣatakṣīṇasya nāśayet |
ete nirūhā vyākhyātāḥ sarvarogavināśanāḥ |
vyākuleṣuvikārais tu tān bhiṣak saṃprayojayet || ity āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |
iti bhele saptamo ' dhyāyaḥ || |
|aṣṭamo ' dhyāyaḥ || athāto daśavyāpadāmāsthāpanānuvāsanasiddhiṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ |

8.8.1 snehavastirnirūhaś ca dvividhaṃ yāti vibhramam |
na yujyate vā duryukto yukto vāpy atipūryate ||

8.8.2 teṣāṃ vipratipannānāṃ vastīnāṃ vyāpado daśa |
tāsāṃ rūpaṃ cikitsāṃ ca pravakṣyāmyanupūrvaśaḥ ||

8.8.3na māti vā gude yuktovātādigadapīḍite |
purīṣeṇāvṛte vāpi sa na gāḍhaṃ prapīḍitaḥ ||

8.8.4arśasā pratisaṃruddhaḥ śleṣmaṇāpihite gude |
guruyantrayuto vāpi netre vā jīrṇasarpite ||

8.8.5 na gacchati gude vastirvibhrānteṣu ca dhātuṣu |
tam ayogam itibrūyādatiyogaṃnibodha me ||

8.8.6 vātābhibhūtapitte vā śleṣmaṇā vā ' hitaśinaḥ |
purīṣeṇābhibhūtaś cadūraṃ cātiprapīḍitaḥ ||

8.8.7 napratyāyātyadhovastirbhītasyonmathitasya vā |
gudavalyāṃ tṛtīyāyāmarśobhir vā nivāritaḥ ||

8.8.8 virecitasya vāntasya madyaśokākulasya ca |
napratyāyāty adho vastirūrdhvaṃ vātipravartate ||

8.8.9 teṣām upadravā ghorājāyante vastivibhramāt |
jīvādānaṃ tṛṣācchardiḥ hṛdrogaḥ śvayathus tathā ||

8.8.10 śūlamarśāṃsi pāṇḍutvaṃ śvāso ' tha parikartikā |
eṣāṃ pratyekaśo rūpaṃ cikitsāṃ ca nibodha me ||

8.8.11 gurukoṣṭhasya rūkṣasya bahudoṣasya dehinaḥ |
asnigdhasya guruvyādheryadi vastiḥ pradīyate ||

8.8.12 atyalpo vātha rūkṣo vā śītavīryauṣadhastathā |
lavaṇasneharikto vā tanussāndro ' tha vā bhṛśam ||

8.8.13sambaddhabahudoṣasyadoṣān utkleśayaty api |
tatrasthā yatra sarpanti doṣāstepīḍitā bhṛśam ||

8.8.14 kaṭāvasthyūrujaṅghe capādapṛṣṭhodare tathā |
prasyandante bhavec cāsya saśūlamudakodaram ||

8.8.15 vastiśūlamudāvarto gudaśoṣo jvaras tathā |
niṣṭhīvakāsahṛllāsā bhaktadveṣo vivarṇatā ||

8.8.16 snigdhasya tasya svinnasyasaṃkaraprastarādibhiḥ |
nirūhaṃkārayet tīkṣṇamamoghāprativāraṇam ||

8.8.17 bilvāgnimanthasyonākakāśmaryāśca sapāṭalāḥ |
rāsnā balāgokṣurakayavakolakulutthakāḥ ||

8.8.18 etat sarvaṃ samāhṛtya jaladroṇe vipācayet |
caturbhāgāvaśiṣṭaṃ taṃ kaṣāyamavatārayet ||

8.8.19 kalkena sarṣapāṇāṃ ca pīlūnāṃ madanasya ca |
sayavāsakaṣāyaṃ tu tattailalavaṇena ca ||

8.8.20 mūtrāṇi ca yathālābhamatha samyaṅ nirūpayet |
yathā tṛtibalā |.. |.. |.. |.. ||

8.8.21 tatravāditraśabdāṃś caśreyasaś ca svanānapi |
śāntiṃ puṇyāhaghoṣāṃś ca kuryāc cāpi pradakṣiṇam ||

8.8.22 taṃnidhāya śubhe kumbhe vastiṃ dadyāt pramāṇataḥ |
devaprasādatovastirarditānāṃ mahāguṇaḥ ||

8.8.23 sarvarogaharo vṛṣyaḥkṣatakṣīṇarujāpahaḥ |
vātapittasamutthānā rogā ye parikīrtitāḥ ||

8.8.24kāsadāhajvarādyāṃstānnāśayed aviśaṅkitaḥ |
tribhāgamākṣiko hyeṣa valīpalitanāśanaḥ ||

8.8.25 rūpavarṇakaraḥ puṃsāṃ balamāṃsavivardhanaḥ |
śatāvarīṃ sahacaraṃ rāsnāṃ gokṣurakaṃ balām ||

8.8.26 śataṃ śataṃ kalpayitvā toyadroṇaśate pacet |
droṇāvaśeṣitaṃ tac ca paripūtaṃ nidhāpayet ||

8.8.27 barhikukkuṭahaṃsānāṃ māṃsāny api pṛthak pṛthak |
vasā māhiṣavārāhameṣāṇāṃ prasthasammitam ||

8.8.28 vidāryāmalakekṣūṇāṃ rasaprasthāḥ pṛthak pṛthak |
tatra tailaghṛtaprasthau kṣīramaṣṭaguṇaṃ bhavet ||

8.8.29 tadgomayāgnināyuktyā kalkenānena sādhayet |
tugākṣīryāmalakyau ca drākṣāmadhukacandanaiḥ ||

8.8.30 madhūlikāpaṭolābhyāṃ patraṃ nīlotpalasya ca |
viśālāṃ ca mṛṇālaṃ ca kapikacchuphalāni ca ||

8.8.31kharjūraudanapākyau ca śītapākīṃ nidigdhikām |
salāmajjatvacaṃ patraṃ hvīberaṃ samahāsaham ||

8.8.32 jīvakarṣabhakau medāṃ pippalīś cāpi saṃharet |
tatsiddhaṃ śītalīkṛtya kṣaudraprasthe niyojayet ||

8.8.33 tatra vāditraśabdāṃś ca kuryāt svastyayanāni ca |
gajaskandhaṃ samāropya śvetacchatrānupālitam ||

8.8.34celāvṛtaṃ ca kurvīta sādhuśabdāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ |
tato ' smin dāpayed vastiṃ puṇye ' hani rasāyanam ||

8.8.35 vastinānena dattena gacchennārīśataṃ naraḥ |
na vātra yantraṇā kāciduktānārīvihāragā ||

8.8.36 vṛṣyo balakaro vastirāptaāyurvivardhanaḥ |
valīpalitakhālity aṃ sevamāno niyacchati ||

8.8.37 ṣaṇḍāṃś ca puruṣān kuryāllakṣaṇāḍhyān guṇānvitān |
kṣīṇān kṣatānnaṣṭaśuklān viṣamajvarapīḍitān ||

8.8.38 yonīnāṃ vyāpado vandhyāṃ vastireṣa niyacchati |
guḍūcīsvarasaprasthaṃgrāhayed yantrapīḍitam ||

8.8.39 śatāvarīrasaprasthaṃ tadvatsahacarasya ca |
vidāryāmalakekṣūṇāṃ drākṣākharjūrayor api ||

8.8.40 pṛthak kuryād rasaprasthaṃprasthau dvau tailasarpiṣoḥ |
ājamāhiṣagavyāni kṣīrāṇi dviguṇāni ca ||

8.8.41kṣuṇṇapiṣṭāni cemāni peṣayitvā vipācayet |
vadhūṭikāmuccaṭāṃ ca madhukaṃ pippalīm api ||

8.8.42 śṛṅgāṭakaṃ puṣkarikāṃ kāṇḍaṃ nīlotpalasya ca |
jīvakarṣabhakau medāṃ balāṃ nīlotpalāni ca ||

8.8.43 tugākṣīrīṃ mahāmedāṃ puṇḍarīkasya kesaram |
vṛṣameṣacakorāṇāṃ haṃsakukkuṭayor iha ||

8.8.44jīvañjīvakamattākṣakurarīkrauñcabarhiṇām |
vasā majjā ca sattvānāṃ meṣamāṃsarasaissaha ||

8.8.45 tribhāgaṃ mākṣikaṃ caivayuñjyāt samyagvipācite |
śaṅkhabherīninādaiś ca paṭahair vāmurīsvanaiḥ ||

8.8.46 āropayed gajaskandhe śvetacchatradhvajāyutam |
siddhānāṃ paramaṃ devaṃ maharṣigaṇasevitam ||

8.8.47 śaraṇaṃ sarvabhūtānāmarcayed vṛṣabhadhvajam |
āśīrbhir maṅgalāśaṃsistutibhir devatārcanaiḥ ||

8.8.48 rasāyanāni sidhyantiviparītāni cānyathā |
taṃ snehaṃ gamayed vastiṃrāsāyanikam uttamam ||

8.8.49 athāhāravihāreṣu na cainaṃyantrayed bhiṣak |
vyāpannayonayo vandhyā raktagulminya eva ca ||

8.8.50 yāvā ' patyaṃ mṛtaṃ sūte yāś ca naṣṭārtavās tathā |
naṣṭaśuklakṣatakṣīṇā viṣamajvarapīḍitāḥ ||

8.8.51prakṣīṇamāṃsarudhirā valīpalitapīḍitāḥ |
āśu praśamayed rogān tānāyurmāṃsavardhanam ||

8.8.52 rasāyanam idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ narāṇāmamṛtopamam |
rasāyanavidhānāni proktāny etāni yāni ca ||

8.8.53 sahasraśatapākāni kāryāṇi vibhave sati |
madhukaṃ saindhavaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ śatapuṣpā hareṇavaḥ ||

8.8.54 madanāni ca rāsnā ca bhārṅgī, nīparakajvalam(?) |
mari |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. ||

8.8.55māyūraṃkaukkuṭaṃ vāpi veśavāraṃsukuṭṭitam |
sahitaṃ daśamūlyā tu jaladroṇe vipācayet ||

8.8.56 rasasya tasya pūtasyaprasthārdhaṃ capradāpayet |
vasātailaghṛtānāṃ tu madhunaḥ prasṛtadvayam ||

8.8.57hapuṣāśatapuṣpāṇāṃ mustānāṃ cāpi kārṣikam |
kalkapeṣyaṃ punardadyādvastiṃ salavaṇaṃ sukham ||

8.8.58 pādagulphorujaṅghāsu trikavaṅkṣaṇabastiṣu |
śiśne vṛṣaṇayoś caiva vātarogaṃ niyacchati ||

8.8.59 mṛgāṇāṃ tittirāṇāṃ ca tathaiva bilavāsinām |
ānūpānāṃ khagānāṃ cakalpamevaṃ prayojayet ||

8.8.60 tulyaṃ madhu ca tailaṃ ca tasmād uṣṇodakaṃ samam |
dvaukarṣau śatapuṣpāṇāṃ karṣaś ca lavaṇottamaḥ ||

8.8.61 eṣa rāsāyano vastirdīpanīyo ' tha bṛṃhaṇaḥ |
balavarṇakaro vṛṣyoyāpano nirupadravaḥ ||

8.8.62gulmodavartitādhmānapramehakṛmikoṣṭhinām |
nityaṃ gāḍhapurīṣāṇāṃ vastireṣahitaḥ smṛtaḥ ||

8.8.63 ghṛtaṃ madhu ca tailaṃ cateṣāṃ mānaṃ samaṃ bhavet |
pūrvakalkena deyāni sa vastirbalavarṇakṛt ||

8.8.64 vastau meḍhragate doṣevastyasātmyacikitsite |
paittike mūtrakṛcchre ca pittavyādhiṣu cottamaḥ ||

8.8.65tulyaṃ ghṛtamatha kṣaudraṃ tayor māṃsarasassamaḥ |
akṣamātraṃ ca mustānāṃ sa vastiḥ pūrvakalpavat ||

8.8.66gulphorujānupṛṣṭheṣu sarvataḥ stambhiteṣu ca |
balāsapādaharṣeṣu vastiḥ praśamanaḥ smṛtaḥ ||

8.8.67vastau vṛṣaṇameḍhreṣuśūlamāśu niyacchati |
trikajānūrupṛṣṭhādivedanāṃ cāpakarṣati ||

8.8.68 mṛdutvānnanivatantekṣubhyantevastayaś ca vā |
tīkṣṇairāsthāpanaṃ kāryaṃ kṣipraṃ pratinivartayet ||

8.8.69 mṛdutvād yāpanānāṃ tu kecidvibhramabhīravaḥ |
dīpanānāṃ kaṣāyeṇa yojayanti cikitsakāḥ ||

8.8.70 evamanyeṣu vibhrāntau sanirūheṣu vā punaḥ |
vastayaḥkalpadṛṣṭā hi yathā kāle sukhāvahāḥ ||

8.8.71 kṣīṇātiriktā dūṣyante tasmād yogaṃ samāharet |
nityaṃ nārīvihārāṇāṃ kṣīṇānāmalparetasām ||

8.8.72 evam eva vidhānaṃ ca retobalavivardhanam |
svecchāvihārān vakṣyāmivastīn śuklavivardhanān ||

8.8.73 rasaḥ karkaṭakānāṃ tu śarkarāmastusaṃyutaḥ |
ghṛtasaubarcalayuto vastirvṛṣyatamaḥ smṛtaḥ ||

8.8.74 haṃsasārasalāvānāṃ tittirikrauñcabarhiṇām |
kalpenānena kartavyā vājīkaraṇavastayaḥ ||

8.8.75 payaḥ kukkuṭamāṃsena vipakvaṃ madhusaṃyutam |
caṭakāṇḍarasaś caiva kukkuṭāṇḍarasastathā ||

8.8.76 ghṛtamākṣikasaṃyuktaḥ śarkarāsaindhavairyutaḥ |
eṣavastiḥ smṛto vṛṣyaḥ māṃsaśuklavivardhanaḥ ||

8.8.77yataś śataṃ vā ṣaṣṭiṃ vā nārīr gacchati mānavaḥ |
eṣa varṇabalotsāhaḥsthavire ' pi pradṛśyate ||

8.8.78 timiṅgile vā makare pāṭhīne nakramīnayoḥ |
dugdhaṃ kūrme+athakumbhīre kalpayecchiśumāravat ||

8.8.79 vārāhabastavṛṣaṇau vṛṣaṇau govṛṣasya ca |
caṭakarkaṭakāṃś caiva kṣīreṇa saha sādhayet ||

8.8.80 tannirūhaṃ tu śukreṇabastānāmatha miśrayet |
uccaṭekṣurakaṃ cātra kalkapeṣyaṃ samāvapet ||

8.8.81 ghṛtamākṣikasaṃyuktaṃ praṇītaḥ śarkarāyutaḥ |
kiṃcillavaṇito vastir gamayet strīśatāny api ||

8.8.82 eṣa nārīvihārāṇāṃbahvantaḥ puravāsinām |
retobalakaraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ krīḍāvastiranuttamaḥ ||

8.8.83 ātmaguptāphalaiḥ kṣīram uccaṭekṣurakaiḥśṛtam |
bhojane vānupāne vā vṛṣyārthaṃ samprayojayet ||

8.8.84 rasāyanā vastayas tu ye mayā pūrvadarśitāḥ |
tān etair māṃsaniryūhair yojayet kalpakalpitān ||

8.8.85 babhrusūkarakhaḍgāś cachāgagomahiṣās tathā |
krauñcakāraṇḍavāḥ krauñcacakravākabakāstathā ||

8.8.86 nirūhameṣāṃ saṃhṛtya lābhatassādhu yojayet |
kṣīraṃ panasabījānikapikacchūphalāni ca ||

8.8.87 uccaṭekṣurabījāni madhukaṃtālamastakam |
pippalyaśśāribā drākṣā kharjūro madanāny api ||

8.8.88 jīvakarṣabhakau medā bījaṃ nīlotpalasya ca |
garbheṇānena saṃsiddhaṃ caṭakāṇḍarasāyutam || Bhṣ8.8.? |
śarkarāmadhusaṃyuktaṃ |.. |.. |.. |.. |.. ||
